yali kanjayiji walku.  Mantarlalparlipa makiti kurlarda-kurlu."

"Kulalparna kijikarla pirliji yali kanjayiji," Storm Boy-ji
wangkaja.  Pirli-pardu manu walyangka manu kujurnu ngapa mangkuru
kurra-pinangu.  Pirliji wantija pirntinyarra-wana-juku.  "Yali
nyangkarlu," wangkaja nyanunguju.  Ngulajangkaju Mr Percival-ju
paarr-pardija nyanungurra wanaju-juku manu yanu kankarlani yangka
kuja pirli wantija kijirninja-warnu ngulangka warru paarr-pardija
kankarlani. Nyangulpa ngapa kulangantalpalurla manyu-karrija
nyanunguku.  Kulangantalurla nyanunguku kujurnu pirliji
maninjininjaku; ngulajangkaju manngu-nyanjarla pina yaninjarla
pirri-manu pirntinyarrarla.  Storm Boy-jirla purlanja-karra
purlanja-karra parnkanja-yanu nyanungukuju.

"Mr Percival!  Mr Percival-rlu-kula kajika kanyi ruupuju!
Nyanunguju paarr-pardimi-jangarra ka!"  Hideaway-rliji nyanjarla
manngu-nyangu.  Pina parnkaja yujuku-kurra manu parlu-pungu-jana
jirrama marda marnkurrpa yawu-kurlangu kirrirdi-patu ruupu-patu.
Warurnu-jana muku pulyangkajuku walyangka tarlangka.
Ngulajangkaju manu rampaku-nyayirni yangka yarturlu-piya wita,
manu warurnu ruupurla, manurla yungu Mr Percivaj-ku.

"Yali-kirra pawurtu-kurra!"  nyanungujurla wangkaja
jiily-ngarrirninja-karra manulpa-nyanu waku-jarra kankarlu-manu
manu kanunju-manu jurlpu-piyarlu nganta.

"Kangka pawurtu-kurra!"

Mr Percival-ju paa-karrijalpa.  Kulangantalpalu jinyi-jinyi-manu
yawuku maninjaku.  Ngulajangkaju kilpirli-jarra-nyanu
jungarni-maninjarla paarr-pardija ngapa mangkururla kankarlani.

"Pawurtu-kurra! Pawurtu-kurra!" purlajalurla Mr Percivalkuju.
Ngayilpa nyanunguju paa-karrija.  Wurnturu-nyayirni paarr-pardija
jinta-purdanjijiki, kujurnu ruupuju yawu-kurlanguju ngapangka
mangkururlajuku manu pina yanurnu.

"Walku," wangkaja Hideaway-ji, kuli-nyayirni.  "Puta kujurnu kuja
ngayi wiyarrparlu," Storm Boy-ji wangkaja, kuja Mr Percival
pirri-manu.  Yungulkurla yawu manu jarnturnulku kakarda.
"Ngurrju," nyanunguju wangkaja, "Ngurrju Mr Percival.
Jalangu-karirliji kapunpa yarda kijirni".

Walku-nyayirni ngayi puta kujurnu yarda.  Mr Percival-rluju
jingi-jingi paarr-pardija pawurtu-kurra pinangu, kala ngayi
juulpa-yanu.

"Nyuntujunpa ngurrju walanypirri.  Putanpa kujurnu wiyarrparlu.
Jirri-mardarnulpa Mr Percival-ju jipilyaku wirijarlu-piya manurla
yungu jinta-karilki yawu.  Yardalpa kujurnu, yarda kujurnu,
walkujukulpa juulpa-kujurnu.  Kamparrujulpalu wati-patuju
pawurturlaju paa-karrija-wiyi, ngakalkulu manngu-nyangu
kujalpa-jana nyanungurraku puta-puta kujurnu, manulpalu nyangu
ngarrurdarlulku kujalpa yarda-yarda kujurnu puta.

Storm Boy manu Hideaway-jipalarla kuli-jarrija-nyayirni kala
ngayi wiljingkijukulpa-pala yilyaja Mr Percival-ju.  Mr
Percival-rlangu kula mata jarrinjarla jupu karrija.
Paarr-pardijalpa kujapurda manu kalkurnupurda, kujapurda manu
kalkurnupurda.  Ngulajangkaju ngakarra-ngakarralku kujurnu
jungarnirliji.  Wirijarlurlu mayawunparlu kankarlu-maninjarla
kujurnu jinta-purdanji-kirra.  Kujurnu-nyanu kilpirli wiri-jarra,
manu kuja jungarni-jarrija kankarlani pawurturla.  Kujurnulku
ruupuju.  Wantija ruupuju pawurturlajuku.

"Nyurrunpa kujurnu!  Nyurrunpa kujurnu!"  Storm Boy, Hideaway
manu Fingerbone-julu-muku purlaja kuja Mr Percival pirri-manu
pirntinyarrarla.  "Nyuntujunpa ngurrju, wukarranji-wangu,
pinarri-nyayirni walanypirri!"  Manulpalurla yulkajalku,
manulpalurla yungu parljalku, manulpalurla warru-kirdi-kirdi
jurrka-pungu tarnnga-nyayirni kujalpa Mr Percival-ju paa-karrija
nyarrpa jarrija kuja nyanungu ngurrju-nyayirni. Manulpa
tarnngangka wantiki manu lirraju manurlpa ngarnu panu-jarlu
yawuju. Kala ngayili wankaru-maninjakuju jalangu-kula
rdirri-yungu.


Yangka pawurtu-kungarduyurlu paajurlu puuly-mardarnu yangkaju
yawu-kurlangu ruupu kuja wantija pawurturla, manulparla pardarnu
ngapa-karikilki wiriki, manu warurnulku yangka ruupu
jinta-kari-kirra yarnma-kurra ruupu-kurra.  Pulyangku
pulya-nyayirnirli nyanungurluju kanunju-manu ngapa mangkuru-kurra
manu-palangu rdaka-rdaka-jarrija Hideaway-ki manu Fingerbone-ku
rarra-maninjaku ruupuku.  Pulya-nyayirnirlijili
rarra-maninja-yanu ruupuju, kala kajilpalu kiljingki
rarra-mantarla, kajika ruupuju larra-yani manu kajikalu
yangka-piya-yijala rdirri-yinyi, yangka-piyarlu kaji kalu Mr
Percival waarn-pinyi.  Kala ngayirli walku pulyangkujuku
rarra-maninja-yanu.

Ngakarra-ngakarralku ruupuju kankarlu-jarrinja-yanu pulyajuku
ngapa-ngurluju. Fingerbone-ju parnkaja maninjaku, manulpa
jurrka-pinajarla rdaka-rdaka-jarrija wardinyi-nganta.  Yangkangku
pawurtu-kungarduyurlu paajurlu warurnu ruupu
pirrjirdi-nyayirnilki jirrirdi-piya yawu-kurlangu ruupu-kurra
yangka-kurra, manu panu-karirli wati-patu-karirli
kanunju-maninja-yanulu ruupuju kujalpa ngapaju
warraly-warraly-wantijajuku pawurtu-kurraju.

Ngulajangkaju Storm Boy-rli, Fingerbone-rlu manu Hideaway-rliji
pirntinyarra-kurra manulkulu yangkaju wirijarlu ruupu.
Ngulajangkajulu rarra-kangu kapankurlu kankarlarra jilja-kurra
yangka-kurra kujalu juka-yirrarnu watiya nyanja-kurlangu, ngula
Hideaway-rli warurnu pirrjirdi-nyayirnirli warru-kirdi-kirdi
watiyarlaju.  Ngula-purulpalu yangka wati-patu-karirli warurnu
jiya ruupu-kurra.  Jintangku wati-karirli-nyanu warurnu
nyanungurluju, manu wankiri-manu Hideaway-ji rarra-maninjaku
ruupuku. Ngulalpalu-jana kujarlujuku rarra-maninja-yanu.

Ngapaju mangkuruju ngayilpa kankarlu-jarrija manulpa-jana kuja
nganta jujungku kartirdi kardirrirli puta-puta manu watiji
ruupurlaju.  Yangka kuja kala ruupu kanunju-jarrija ngapangka
wati-kirli palka-kurlu, ngapangkuju kala muru-pungu
kanunju-nyayirni.  Storm Boy-rliji kala marnpurnu ngarrurda-kurra
manu mirr-mirr-karra yangkaju yawu-kurlangu jirrirdi-piya kuja
kala ngapangku warru-kirdi-kirdi ngurn-ngurn-manu.  Kala yalingki
watingki wurrangku-juku mayawunpaju manu pina ngapangkaju.  Manu
kala warrujuku kankarlu-jarrija ruupurlajuku.  Hideaway manu
Fingerbone-rlu kalapala rarra-manu ruupuju tarnnganku kuja
kalapala wirliyaju nyanungu-jarraju yukajalku kaninjarra
walyangka walyirirlaju, manu yangka pulku nyanungu-jarra-nyangu
kuja kala kankarlu-jarrija ngulaju kulanganta ruupu-piyalku
kujalpapala rarra-manu nyanungu jarrarlu.  Manu ngulajangka
rarra-manujukulu yangkaju wati ngapa wiri-ngirli mangkuru-ngurlu
pirntinyarra-kurra, ngulangka-nyanu jurnta rurruny-manu ruupuju
wiriji manu wantijalku walyangka walyirirla pirntinyarrarla.
Nyanungujulpa mirr-mirr-karrijalpa pirriya-kurlanguju
mata-nyayirni, kujalu wankaru manu.  Storm Boy-rliji parnkanjarla
manu nyanunguju watiji manu kangu yujuku-kurra.

Ngula-purulpalu panu-karirli wati-patu-karirli pina rarra-manu
yangka jiya pawurtu-kurra manu jinta-karilki wati-kari warrkarnu
jiyangkaju manu pirntinyarra-kurra jarrija.  Nyanungu-wanaju
jinta-karilki yanu, wantinjarlalpa yanu mata-nyayirni manu
rampaku-nyayirni pirntinyarrarlaju.

"Kapanku," nyanungu wati wangkaja.  "Pawurtuju ka
larra-yaninja-yani manu kalu marnkurrpalku watiji karrijiki
pawurturlaju!"  Hideaway-kurlangu ngalya mukarni-kirli
jarrijalku, manu Fingerbone-julpa mata jarrinja-yanulku
kujalpapala wirliyaju yukaja walyangka walyirirla
rarra-maninja-karra.

"Kapanku!"  nyanungujulpalu mata-nyayirni wangkaja.  "Pawurtuju
ka larra-yaninja-yani."

Ngakarra-ngakarralkulu-jana rdaka-pala wati pirntinyarra-kurra
manu wankarujuku jintakulkulpala karrija walkuju yangkaku pawuju.
Ngula-jangkaju nyanungurlukulu yampija pawurtuju manu yarda
rdirri-yungu rarra-maninjakuju.  Nyanungurluju pawujurlu ngulaju
wiringki kanunju-manu ruupuju, manu Hideaway manu Fingerbone
ngulajulpapala mata jarrija-yanulku.  Ngulajangkaju ruupujulpa
larra-yaninja-yanulku.

"Kapanku!"  Hideaway-ji purlaja.  "Nyanunguju ka yurirrimilki."
Storm Boy-rliji maninjarla ruupuju rarr-manulpa.

"Kapanku!"  purlaja yangkaju pawuju.  "Nyanunguju ka yanilki."
Jinta marda jirrama yangka wati kujalpa pirrjirdijiki wapaja
ngulangkuju puuly-mardarnu jirrirdi-piyaju yawu-kurlangu manulpa
rarra-manu.  Pulyangkujukulpalurla jirrnganja rarra-manu ruupuju
paajukuju manulu pirntinyarra-kurra maninjarla rarra-manu
nyanunguju, yangka-piya-wangulku yingirri-pinkiji ngapa-jangka.

"Wankaru," nyanungujulpa warrarda wangkaja rampaku-nyayirni,
"Wankaru manunkujulu nyurrurlarlu manu walanypirirli."

Hideaway-rli manu Storm Boy-rli mardarnulu-jana yujukurla
nyanungu-nyangurla parraku jintaku yangkaju paaju manu
nyanungu-nyangu rdaka-pala wati-patu-kari.  Yungulu-jana
mangarri-pinki manulu-jana parduna-manu wawarda nyanungu-nyangu.
Mungalyurruju ngapa manu mayawunpajulpa raa-jarrijalku manu
wantalkulpa miril-karrija Coorong-rlaju.  Ngulajangkaju
Hideaway-rliji jungarni-manurlpa pawurtu nyanungu-nyangu kanjaku
wati-patuku Goolwa-kurraku.

Yaninjakungarntirliji paajuju wuruly-wangkajarla Hideaway-kiji
kuja, "Nyunturlulu manu nyuntu-nyangurlu wungu-warnurlu yalirli
yapangku wankaru-manunkulu-nganpa, manu wirriyarlu manu
jurlpurlangurlu. Wangkarnalu-nyanu, "Nyarrpa-jarri
yungurnalu-nyarra nganimpalku kujankulu-nganpa wankaru-manu?"
Hideaway-ji kujarlaju karrarda-jarrija.  "Kuja
manngi-nyanja-wangulu nyinaya," nyanunguju wangkaja.

"Nyurrurnalu-nyanu wangkaja nganimpaju," wangkaja paajuju.
"Wangkajarnalu yungurnalurla payi-mani ngulaku wirriyaku
kuurlu-kurraku yaninjaku Adelaide-rlaku."  Hideaway-ji
wajampa-jarrija.  "Nyanunguju kaji ka yirraru nyina manu
ngajurlangu.  Nyanungu-nyangu rduku-rduku kaji ka nyurnu-jarri
mayawunpa-ngurlu, ngapa-ngurlu manu Mr Percival-ngurlu."
"Ngula-kula ngayi," wangkaja paajuju.  "Nyanunguju ka nyina
karlarla mayi, kapu karlarla manu jinta?  Ngakaju kapu wirilki
nyina, manu kula milyapinjarla yirrarni pukungkaju
nyanungu-nyangu jaruju,walku.  Warla-pajirninja-wangu yilyaya
kuurlu-kurra."

Hideaway-ji jurru kaninjarrakari jarrija.  "Yuwayi,jungajuku
ngulaju.  Yantarla nyanunguju."

Kala ngayi kujalurla purlanjarla yimi ngarrurnu Storm Boy-ki
nyarrpa kujalpalurla nyanunguku wangkaja kuurlu-kurraku
yaninjaku, kula ngampurrpa jarrija yaninjaku, walku.

"Walku!" nyanunguju wangkaja karrarda-nyayirni.  "Ngajulurluju
kularna yampinja-yani Mr Percival!"

"Storm Boy ..."

"Kajilparna Mr Percival palkajuku ngulanya kaji karna yani
kuurlu-kurraju."

"Milyapinyijala kanpa, kulalpanpa kangkarla walku!"

"Ngulajuku, kularna yani-yijala ngajuju."

Ngulajangkaju paajuju wangkaja. "Ngulajuku," nyanungujurla
wangkaja Hideaway-kiji. "Ngaka marda".

"Kapurnalu ngakarra-ngakarraju yirrarnijiki kuurlurlaju."
Ngulajangka-jana jakuru-pungulku yaninja-kurrarlu manu janturnu
Mr Percival kakarda.  "Nyuntujunpa wirijarlu, yuntardi jurlpu,"
wangkajarla nyanunguju.  Kankarlarra-karirli nyangu Hideaway.
"Kaji palimi yilyaya Museum-kirra kapurnalurla yirrarni yirdi
pakujurlaju nyanungu-nyangurlaju Nyampurlu walanypiri kuja-jana
wankaru-manu jilkarla-pala wati-patu.  Hideaway-rliji pina nyangu
kapankurlu.  Wardinyi jarrija kujalpa Storm Boy karrija
waparlkujuku purda-nyanja wangu.  Kula purda-nyangu paaju
kuja-kurra wangkanja-kurra.


Tarnngalkulpalu kardiyaju wardinyi nyinaja.  Yangka ngapa manu
mayawunpa wiri ngulajulu pina yanu marlirri-kirra kurlirra,
wantangkujulpa purlku manulku jilja-warriji, ngurujulpa yukurilki
karrija manulpalu pardija jalyirrpa manu wita-wita.

Ngulajangka yukurijilpa karrija jipilyakuku luwarninjaku yangka-
piya-yijala.  Coorong-rlajulpalu kardiyalku-juku wapaja makiti-
kirli, ngurnngu-wangkajalpa yangkaju makiti-jangka luwarninja-
warnu kankarlu manu kanunju ngapangka, manu parntijalpa ngawu
ngati-nyanu mangarri-kirlangu-piya kunjuru.  Mungalyurru-kari
mungalyurru-kariji kalalu jurlpulku-juku yulaja manu purlaja.
Storm Boy-rliji kala-jana nyangu jurlpuju wantinja-kurra.  Marda
murru-murru-rlangu kalalu paarr-pardinja-yanu ngurra-kurra
nyanungurra-nyangu-kurra yangka-kurra jurlpu-kurlangu-kurra.

Yangka-warnurlu kujalu luwarnu wita-wiyi Mr Percival.
Ngulajulpa-jana nyuru-nyuru jarrija kardiyakuju luwarninjaku-
ngarduyuku kala-jana rdapa karrkaja jiliwirri nganta manu kala-
jana liirlki-nyangu tarnngangku.  Ngulajangka kalalu wajili-
pungu kuli-karrarlu.  Kala julyurl-wantija warru pawutu
nyanungurra-nyangu-wana wakurturdu-maninja-karda.  Kala
ngulajangkaju tarnnga paarr-pardija warru kankarlumparra warru-
kirdi-kirdi pinta-pinta-piya yangka kuja kalalu puta wuruly-
nyinakarla.  Kujarluju kala-jana warnkiri-manu jipilyaku-warri
wurnturuku yaninjaku makiti-kijaku luwarninja-kujaku.

Ngulaju kalalu milya-pungulku jipilyakurlu kuja kala-jana Mr
Percival-rlu warnkiri-manu, manu kalalu wurnturulku yanu.  Wati-
patu yangka makiti-kirli kalalurla kuli-jarrijalku.

"Walku-nyayirni kajana yalirli paa punkungku warnkiri-mani,"
wangkaja kalalu.  "Palka-juku ka warru yanirni.  Punku-nyayirni
jiili-piya-wangu yawu-kurlangurla nitingka."

"Warra-warra-kanyi kangalpa nurungkarlu," wangkaja wati-kariji.
"Kularlipa-jana jipilyakuju luwarni palkangka nyanungurlaju."

Kuja-juku ngayi kala-jana kapa-kapa-manu parra-kari
parra-karirli, jintaku parraku yirraru-nyayirniki February-rla
mungalyurru.  Storm Boy-jilpa karrija kankarlarni jiljangka,
nyangulpa wanta kankarlu jarrinja-kurra ngapa mangkuru-ngurlu
japu-japu warlu- kurlu-piya.  Ngulajangka nyangu-palangu
wati-jarra parntarrinja- kurra yuwurrkurla Coorong-rla.
Pululu-nyayirnirli-pala-jana pardarnu jipilyaku-warriki kujalpalu
julyurl-wantija ngapangka kajili-nyanurla kutu jarrija.
Ngulajangka Mr Percival-lku yanurnu .  Paarr-pardinjarni-yanu
kankarlumparra wati-jarrarla, manu yangka jipilyaku-warri
yulajalu ngarruda, manulu kilji- nyayirni paarr-pardija
ngapa-ngurluju kankarlarra.

Wati-jarraju-pala kuli-nyayirni purlaja.  Jinta-kari juurl-pungu
yarlu-kurra yuwurrku-ngurluju, kankarlu manu nyanungu-nyangu
makiti manu jiily-ngarrurnulpa jungarnirli-jiki Mr Percival-
kurra-juku luwarninjaku-ngarntirli.  Storm Boy nyangu yaliji wati
makiti-kirli manu kilji-nyayirni purlaja yulanja-karra.

"Luwarninja-wangu!  Luwarninja-wangu yampiya-pala!  Ngulaju Mr
Perc--"

Nyanungu-nyangu linpakujurla wapirrija yangka makitirli kuja
ngurnngu-wangkaja.  Mr Percival-jilpa rdarr-rdarr paarr-pardija
kulangantalpa paarr-pardija wuurlu kirlaji-jangka-piya-kurra.
Ngulajangkajulpa wantinja-yanurnulku walya-kurra.  Storm Boy-
jilpa parnkanja-yanu jingi-jingi yulanja-karra, wantinja-karra,
juurl-pinja-karra, ngaal-ngaal-karrinja-karra, nyanungu-nyangu
rduku-rduku juurl-juurl-pungulpa kilji-nyayirni.

"Mr Percival!  Luwarnurlujulu Mr Percival!" tarnnga-jukulpa
purlaja.  "Mr Percival!  Mr Percival!"

Hide Away-rlijilpa jungarni-jungarni-manu mangarri ngarninjaku
kuja Storm Boy-lki yukajarra yulanja-karra. "Mr Percival!
Luwarnulu Mr Percival!"  Hide Away-rliji pina nyangu
ngarrurdarlu, kujurnu puurnu kujalpa rdakangka mardarnu, manu
parnkaja kilji-nyayirni yungu-palangu parlu-pinjarla ngarrikarla
wati-jarra makiti-kirli.  Kala ngayili nyurru-juku yanu.
Kurnta-karra manu wukarra-karra, kapanka yanulu kujarninginti-
kari-kirra Coorong-rla, manulu warrkarninjarla yanu
rarralykajirli.

Hide Away-ji pina yanurnu kulu-nyayirni.  Manu ngulajangkajurla
puntarnu Mr Percival Storm Boy-ki manulpa warru nyangu nyarrpara-
wana kujarlujulu luwarnu.  Rduku-rduku-rlangu nyangu manulpa
jungarni-manu pinkirrpa.  Mr Percival-jilpa pulya-nyayirni puta-
puta wangkaja manurlpa kapanku-kapanku ngaany-kujurnu.  "Kapu
mayi....wankaru nyina?"  Storm-boy-jilpa puta-puta wangkaja.

Hide Away-rlirla pina yungu nyurnuju jurlpuju manu ngulajangkaju
karrijalpa tuwangka, nyangulpa warru yirri nyarrpara-wana kuja-
pala yanu wati-jarra luwarninja-warnu jawajardu.  Kulalpa nyarrpa
jaruju wangkayarla; putalparla warrurnu jarukuju.

Parra-wiri Storm Boy-rlijilpa mardarnu Mr Percival-ju.  Purranja-
kurlangu wanarlulpa mardarnu wurdungu-nyayirnirli wajamparlu,
kujalpa yangka ngulangkarlu nyurruwiyi mardarnu yangka
luwarninja-warnu-yijala.  Fingerbone-rlujulpa puta-puta wardinyi-
manu, manu Hide Away-rli putalparla yungu mangarri ngarninjaku,
walku ngayilpa-nyanu Storm Boy-rliji jurru yurnku-yurnku manu,
manulpa nyinaja wurdungu manu yurirrinja-wangu tarnnga-juku.
Jalangu-kari jalangu-kari kala marnpurnu manu jungarni-manu
pinkirrpaju Mr Percival-kurlanguju, marda kala jungarni-manu
kilpirli ngawu-purdanji.  Nyanungu-nyangurla rduku-rdukurla
milya-pungulpa Storm Boy-rliji kujalpa palinja-yanu Mr Percival.
Mr Percival-jilpa rampaku-nyayirni ngaany-kujurnu manu kapanku-
kapanku, nyanungu-nyangu palka manu kakardajilpa wantijalku,
manulpa-nyanu tarnnga-nyayirnirli majarnu kujalpa paniya-jarra
larrapa-wangu-juku ngunaja.  Ngulajangkaju, kala paniya-jarraju
larrapa jarrija-yijala, manu kala-nyanu puta-puta wantiki-manu
lirraju pulyangku wajampa-nyayirnirli yinka-karrarlu-nganta,
yangka kuja kala pina jarda jarrija.

"Mr Percival," Storm Boy-ji jaalypa wangkaja, "nyuntujunpaju
ngurrju-nyayirni wungu-warnu ngajuku."

Wuraji-wurajilki wantajulpa kanunju-jarrija-yanu, manu yama-julpa
yurirrinja-yanu wilypiri-ngirli.  Kankarlarra jilji-julpa miril-
karrija wuraji-wuraji wanta jiilyparla, manulpa ngulajangkaju
walku-jarrija mungangkaju.  Hideaway-rli kula ngunti-manu ngiji.
Ngayilpalu marnkurrpa nyanungu-patu nyinaja warlu-kurlangu-wana
--Hide Away, Storm Boy manu Mr Percival -- munga-purulpalu
nyinaja yujukurla manulpalu yanjilypirriji miril-karrija warraja-
nyayirni.

Manu ngulajangkaju mungangka Mr Percival-ju palijalku.

Ngaka ngulangka Hideaway-ji yurirrija.  Nyanunguju karrinja-
pardija pulya-juku, manu pulyangku, pulya-nyayirnirli,
puntarnurla Mr Percival Storm Boy-ki.  Ngulajangka Storm Boy-
rliji-nyanu kujurnu pangki-kirra manulpa yulaja pulya-nyayirni.
Tarnnga-nyayirnilpa yulaja, ngaka kujarla Hide Away yanumpa
manurla rdaka yirrarnu jimantarla.

"Junga kujaju kuja kanparla yulami Mr Percival-ku," wangkajarla
nyanunguju, pulya-nyayirni, "kala ngayi tarnnga yulanja-wangu
nyinaya, Storm Boy."

"K-Kala nyiya jangkarlulu luwarnu Mr...Mr Percival?  Kulalpa-jana
murru-murru-manu nyanungurraju, ngayilpa-jana warnkiri manu
jipilyaku warru."

"Nyampurla ngurungku," Hide Away-ji wangkaja wajampa-karra,
"kapulu watiji kuja-juku nyina punku kulinypa mari-wangu,
jalangu-jalangu-piya, kuja kalu wati nyina punku, marda warungka,
marda pinangkalpa marda ngurrju-nyayirni.  Jalangurlu
nyangunpa-jana wati nyarrpa-jarri kuja kalu."  Ngulajangkajurla
parnta-yirrarnu pirlangkiti Storm Boy-kiji manurla wangkaja
pulya-nyayirni, "Jarda jarriyalku."

Walku ngayi Storm Boy-ji kula jarda ngunaja.  Munga-wiri
yakarralpa nyunaja, jirri-mardanulpa nyanungu-nyangu katarlpi
jirrmilypa-jangka.

Mungalyurruju Hide Away-jirla wangkaja Storm Boy-kiji. "Yangkarra
wati-patu kuja-jana Mr Percival-rlu wankaru manu wangkajalu
yirrarninjaku Mr Percival-ku museum-rla-nganta, pipa-kurlu jaru-
kurlu kuja-jana wankaru-manu nyanungurra --- kuja-nyanu
nyanungurlu wankaru waja-waja manu.  Ngampurrpa mayi kanpa kuja
nyinami?"

Storm-Boy-rliji-nyanu yurnku-yurnku-manu jurru.

"Mr Percival-ju kulalpa ngampurrpa nyinayarla kuja-kuju,"
wangkaja nyanunguju.  "Ngamingka yirrarninjaku kardiyaku
liirlki-nyanjaku.  Walku kula!"  Manu ngulajangka maninjarla
kangu pangirninja-kurlangu kankarlarra jilja-kurra yangka-kurra
kuja ka juka karri watiya.  "Mr Percival-ju ngampurrpaju marda ka
nyina milyingka- yirrarninjaku nyampurlaku," wangkaja nyanunguju,
"nyanja- kurlangu watiya-wanaku.  Nyampuju kapurla walyaju nguna
nyanunguku tarnnga-juku."  Manu rdirri-yungu pangirninjakulku.

Hide Away-ji yurnku-yurnku jarrija jurru.  Ngulajangkaju
nyanungurlangurlu manu pangirninja-kurlangu manu yanu kankarlarra
pangirninjaku.

Junga-juku-pala milyingka-yirrarnu Mr Percival kaninjarra yangka
nyanja-kurlangu watiya-wana kankarlani jiljangka kuja ka miril-
karri wanta-jangka wuraji-wuraji, pirntinyarra kanunju-kurlu manu
walya kuja ka miril-karri manu ngapa pirntinyarra kara-kurlu kuja
ka warraly-wanti walya-kurra yalirla parra wiri manu munga wiri
--- manu warru-kirdi-kirdi nguru wantiki, manu mayawunpa nyampu
ngurungku, manu kulinypa yirraru mayawunpa yuwurrkurla.

Ngulajangka kuja-pala walku-jarrija pangirninjaku, Storm Boy-
jilpa karrija tarnnga-nyayirni, warru nyangulpa yirri warru-
kirdi-kirdi nyanungurla.  Ngulajangkajurla jungarni jarrija Hide
Away-kiji.

"Yanilkirna."

"Nyarrpara-kurranpa yani?"

"Kala mayi kuurlu-kurra!  Kujalu yangka wati-patu wangkaja."

"Yuwayi!  Yuwayi!"

Hide Away-rliji milya-pungulpa ngula kujalpa Storm Boy-ji
yalirlaju nyinayarla Mr Percival-wanguju.  Jirrama-juku-pala
yaninja-yanu kaninjarra-kari jiljangka yujuku-kurra.

"Yampimirra karli pawutuju Goolwangka parra-patu," Hide Away-ji
wangkaja.  "Kanyi karnangku ngajulurlu Adelaide-kirra.  Jungarni
maninjini karnangku kuurluku-ngarnti."

Manu kuja kula Storm Boy-ji yanu kuurlu-kurraju.  Hide Away-ji
pina yanu yujuku-kurra Coorong-wana, pardanulparla Storm Boy-ki
ngaka kaji pina yanirni yalatayi-puru.  Jalangurluju kanpa nyanyi
nyanungju.  Parrangkaju, Fingerbone-ju kala yanirni wangkajaku,
kala mungangkaju ka karrimi jinta yangka-wana watiya
nyanja-kurlangu-wana manu nyanyi ka ngapa mangkuru manu mangkurdu
kuja yanirni karlarni-ngirli; manu wurnturu-nyayirni Adelaide-
rla, Storm Boy ka nyinami kuurlurla wintawu-wana manu kajana
watiya-warri manu nguru mayawunpa-kurlu nyanyi.

Manu yangka nyiya-kanti-kanti mardarni kalu rduku-rdukurla ---
jaru mayawunpa-kurlangu manu jaru ngapa-kurlangu, manu yirdi-
warri walyangka; Coorong-rlangu, kuja ka parntimi kara
pirntinyarrarla; yujuku-rlangu, manu kujalpalu wardinyi nyinaja
parra-kari, parra-kari.  Manu nyanungu-jarrarlurla kankarlani
manngi-nyanyi kapala, kujarlu kapala nyanyi kilpirli-jarra
mangkurdurla --- jirrama kilpirli-jarra kardirri-jarra nguyu-
nguyu-kurlu --- yitipirla-wantiki jarrinja-kurra ngurungka.

Kujarra-piya jurlpu Mr Percival-piya kula kalu junga palimi.


Kuja wangkaja Wes Lanhupuy Batchelor-rla D-BATE-ki Graduation-rla
[[Osborne-1 file WLAN87.SPE, November 1987]] [[D-BATE is
Deakin-Based Aboriginal Teacher Education. There was a graduation
ceremony for the first graduates in mid-1987.]]

Nyampuju marrka-nyayirni kajilpa milyapinyi yangka kujalu yapa-
paturlu manu university degrees Northern Territory-rla. Yapa
yangka ngalipa-piyarlulu manu pinarri-paturlu. Nyurruwiyi kula
nganangku yapa jinta-karirli nyampu piyaju manu walku, ngakalu
nyampurra-paturlu yapa-paturlu manu university degrees-ji ngulaju
ngurrju-nyayirni.

Ngampurrpa-jarri karna-nyarra kajinkirli yapangku manngi-nyanyi
yimi yangka kardiya-kurlanguku pina-jarrinjaku Australia-rla manu
nyampurla Northern Territory-rla.

Nyurruwiyi nyampu Ausrtalia-walya kujalu-nganpa puntarnu
kardiyarlu nguru-kari-wardingki-kirli, yangka kuurlu-kari kuurlu-
kari nyampurla Australia-rla, jaru-kari jaru-kari kujalpalu
wangkaja kuurlurla ngulaju yangka yapa-kari kardiya kujarlu
nganpa jangkardu yanurnu jarukurlu nyanungu-nyanu-kurlulku pina-
maninjaku. Yapangku manu kardiyarlu yangka nyurruwarnu-paturlu
ngulaju kalu wurrangku-juku milya pinyi manu nginyii-nyinyirla
mardarni nyampuju jaruju nyampurla Northern Territory-rla, manu
kuurlu-kari, kuurlu-karirlaju kalu nyampurra-piyaju mardarni-
juku.

Walku-nyayirnilpa karrija nyurruwiyiji, kuurlu-kari, kuurlu-
karirlaju kardiyarluju kalalu-jana yapaju kurdu-kurdu puta pina-
manu. Kuruwarri nyanungurra-nyangu jaruku kardiya-kurlanguku
wangkanjaku. Ngulaju kuurlu-kari, kuurlu-kari warding-kirli
Australia-wardingkirli kuja kalu-jana puta pina-mani yapa kurdu-
kurdu nyanungurra-nyanguku kuruwarriki.

Nyurruwiyi kujalu yanurnu yapa-kari kardiya nguru-kari-wardingki
nyampu-kurra Australia-kurra ngulajurlu-nganpa kuruwarri ngalipa-
nyangu jurnta waja waja manu.  Jaru ngalipa-nyangu yapa- kurlangu
kuruwarri manu jukurrpa.

Milyapinyi-juku-karlipa manu karlipa nginyinginyirla-juku
mardarni yangkaju yimi ngaliparluju yapangku yangka
Government-rli kujalu-ngalpa puta-pungu ngalipa-nyangu kuruwarri.
  
Yapangkuju manngi-nyanyi manu ngamurrpa karlipa nyina kuja
karlipa-nyanu mardarni-juku ngalipa-nyangu yapa-kurlangu
kuruwarriji.
 
Marrka-nyayirni wiri-nyayirni nyampuju kuja karlipa-jana kurdu-
kurdu ngalipa-nyangu pina mani kuurlurla. Kuruwarri ngalipa-
nyangu-rlangu yungurlu pinarri-jarri nyanungu-rlangu.
   
Kuurlu-kari, kuurlu-karirla yangka kurdukurdu kuja kalu pina-
jarrimi, ngulaju jirrama-kurlu jaru-kurlu. Marda ngawu, marda
ngurrju kujarluju kalungalpa ngatinyanuju manu jajinyanuju
wajampa mani.

Jinta yapa kuja kalu milarni ngulaju marda wangkanjaku yangka
mitingki-rla-ku manu kuurlu-rla-ku manu yampinjaku kurdukurduku
jalpi-ki nyinanjaku kapakapa-jarrinja-kujaku yapa-kurlangu
kuruwarri-ki, marda jurnta yaninjaku kardiya-kurlangu kuurlu-
ngurlu.

Yangka yapa kuja kalu-jana milarni yangka kuja kalu milya-pinyi
kardiya-kurlangu kuruwarri ngulaju kalu pina-jarrimi yungulu
warrki-jarrimi nyiya kanti-kanti-rla warrkingka yangka ngurrara-
kari, ngurrara-kari warlaljarla.

Kuurlu-yangka kuja kajana pina-mani, ngulaji-kajana kanyi yapa-
kurlangu kuruwarri, yungurlu milyapinyi kuurlurla. Jinta-kari
jinta-kari kalu puta-puta milyapinyi yapa-kurlangu manu kardiya-
kurlangu kuruwarri kuurlurla. Kujalu kardiya wiri-jarrija
witajangka kula kalu yapa-kurlangu kuruwarri milya-pinyi, kala
kalu jintangka-wiyi warrki-jarrimi ngakaju kala kalu jinta
karirlalku warrkijarrimi.

Ngampurrpa-nganta kalurla yapa-kuju nyina yangka kuja kalu
nyanungurra-wiyi warrkijarrimi, ngaka kaji kalu jana nyanungurra-
kulku puntarni warrkiji kardiyalulku yirrarninjaku.

Nyampu jungajala kuurlurlaju kujakalu-jana kardiya kuurlurla
pina-mani nyanungurra-nyangu kuruwarri yapaku kalu-jana yinyi.
Kuja kajana kurdu-kurdu yapa puta-puta kapa-kapa-mani kuja kalu
kardiya- kurlangurla kuurlurla nyina.

Kurdu kurdurlu yangka yapangku kalu milya pinyi warrki-jarrinjaku
kardiya-kurlangu kuurlurla manu kuurlu kuruwarri-kirli. Kajirli
jirramalku kuruwarri milya-pinyi kuurlurla. Kardiya-kurlangu manu
yapa-kurlangu.

Kajirli kardiya-kurlangu kuurlu yapa-kurlangu-piya-kurra mani
manu ngulajangkaju kardiya manu yapa kajirlipa jinta-kurra-jarri
yungurlu milya-pinyi jirrama kuruwarri yapa-manu kardiya
kurlangu.

Kajirli palka-mani ngakalku,ngulaji nyarrpa-jarrimi kapurlu
Education Department-wardingki marda kalu ngampurrpa nyina, marda
kalu walku ngampurrpa-wangu nyina. Yungurlu yapangku ngampurrpalu
milya-pinyi.

Yapa tijaku yungulu-jana kurdu-kurdu nyiya-kanti kanti pina mani
manu nyarrpangku yungurlu jana yapa-kurlangu kuruwarri milki-
yirrarni manu pina mani. Kuja kalu nganpa purlka-purlkarlu manu
muturna muturnarlu yimi ngarrirni kajilpa-jana yapa kurdukurdu
pina mani kuurlurla.

Yangka kujarnalu kardiya-kurlangu kuruwarri pina-jarrija
kuurlurla, ngulaju yungurnalu tarnngangku-juku mardarni yangka
wangkanjaku kapumanu-ku.

Nyampuju kapirlipa-jana jirrama jaru-kurlangu manu pina-jarrinja-
kurlangu pina mani kurdukurdu kajirlipa yapa wangkami manu
ngarrirni nyarrpangku kapirlipa-jana pina mani kajirlilpa-jana
kurdu-kurdu pina mani ngalipa yapa tija-rlu kuurlurla.

College-rla kuja kalu-jana yapa pina mani, ngulaju kajirli
kardiya-kurlangurla-mipa milyapinja-kurlangurla manu ngurrju-
maninja-kurlangurla pina jarrimi.

JUJUMINYIMINYI-KIRLI

Nyampu jujuminyiminyi yapa-kurlangu, ngula karnalu palka-mani manangkarrarla, wardijirla kanunju ngulaka pardimi.  Wardijirla ka pardimi panu-jarlu-nyayirni.  Manangkarrarla, marna-wana ka pardimi.  Marnangka ka karrinjayani.  

Ngula-juku karnalu pajirnilki.  Pajirnilki karnalu, parnti-yirrarni karnalu-nyanu.

Kurduku karnarla parrajarla yirrarni, yungurla parntinjayani.  Tirnngi-yirrarni karnalurla mulyu-kurra.

Wiri-wirirli karnalu-nyanu yirrarni manangkarra-wanarlu nyurnukujaku.  Manangkarra-wana karnalu-nyanu parnti-yirrarni nyampuju jujuminyiminyiji, miirnta-kujaku -- kuntulparlu kujaka-nganpa pakarni.  Kuntulpakujakuju, ngurrju-mani ka-jana nyampurluju.  

Wiri-wiri, wita-wita, kurdu-kurdu yangka jalangu-warnu, parrajarla kujaka ngunanjayani, jujuminyiminyiji karnalu-jana yirrarni parrajarlaju, yungurla ngunanjayani jurrungka.  Manu karnalu-jana rdukurdukurla yirrarni wita-witakuju jalangu-warnukuju.

KARRINYARRA

Cymbopogon ambiguus

KARRINYARRA-KURLU    

Nyampu yirdi, marna-jala karrinyarra.  Puturr-puturrpa-kurlangu, minjiyi-kirlangu-yijala, miirnta-kurlangu.  Puyu-pinyi kalu nyampuju, purra kalu-nyanu.  Purraja kala-rnalu-nyanu nyurruwiyiji. 

Pamarrpa-wana ka nyampuju karrimi.  Ngula kala-rnalu pamarrpa-wana nyampuju pajurnu karrinyarra, kala-rnalu puyu-punyu kurdu-kurduku, wiri-wiriki, wita-witaku.  

Puyu-pinjarla kala-rnalu-jana minjiyi-jangka maparnu puturr-puturrpa.  Mirriji-pinki kala-rnalu-nyanu maparnu.  Ngurrju.  Mirrijini-yijala nyampuju.    

Kijikiji ka pardimi manangkarrarla, manjangka manu watiyarla kankarlarra.  Kapurdu-nyayirni ka pardimi, wajirrki manu yulyurdu-yulyurdu.  

Ngula kalu pajirni yapangku, lampunu-piya ka karlimi.  Ngula kalu-jana kijirni kurdu-kurdu puturr-puturrpa, wijini-kirli kijikiji-kirra.  Maparni kalu-jana pajirninjarla kijikijirli, lampunu-piyarlu.  Maparninja-warnu kalu ngurrju-jarrimilki, lawa-jarrimilki kalu wijiniji kijikiji-jangkaju.

Majardimajardi
Ngirlangirla

Majardimajardi-kirli, Ngirlangirla-kurlu

Majardimajardi, ngirlangirla, mirrijini-yijala nyampuju kujakalu puyu-pinyi, puyu-pinyi, puyu-pinyi.  Ngula-jangkaju kalu-nyanu rdukurduku purrami.  

Kalalu nyurruwiyiji mardu-kurra-jala puyu-pungu manu pangurnu-kurra yangka wita mardu-kurra-wiyi, parraja-piya wita.  Ngami, ngulangkaju kala-rnalu puyu-pungu nyurruwiyiji. 

Lampunu-piya-yijala nyampuju mirrijini, minjiyi-kirlangu, wijini-kirlangu, mijilypa-piya-yijala.  Nyampurrarla-kula kalalu nyurruwiyi-nyurruwiyiji purlka-purlkaju wiri-jarrija, majardimajardirla, ngirlangirlarla.

Manangkarrarla ka pardimi nyampuju, wantiki rdaalyparr-nyina wantiki.  Wantimilki ka, ngamarna-piyalku nyampuju.  Yarla yangka kujaka ngamarna nguna, ngula-piya ka wanti nyampuju.


Mijilypa nyampuju, wijiniki, minjiyi-kirlangu.  Wiri-wiri yangka kujaka japirnparlu mani, wiri-wiri yangka japirnpa-jangkaku wijiniki, ngula puyu-pinjarla, pangurnu-kurra, parraja-kurra kalu puyu-pinyi.  Ngula kalu-nyanu yirrarni, yirrarni, yirrarni jurrungka.  Karlangu-jangkarla kalu-nyanu parnta-yirrarni, mirriji-jarrarla.  Maparnilki kalu-nyanu palkalku nyampurluju. 

Linji-jarri ka, nyanungu-juku ka lurlurl-wanti. Ngapa-piya kujaka karlimi, kanyi kalu-nyanu yangkaju linji. Pangurnu-kurra, parraja-kurra kalu yirra-yirrarni. Pantirni kalu, parraja-kurra kalu rdakurl-yirrarni. Kanyilkili-nyanu. 

Yangka kujaka karlimi, ngulaju kalu-nyanu wirlinyi-wapangurlu maparni mijilyparluju. Wapurnungku, wirrkali-warnu, karli-karlimi ka yangka ngarntarlku-jangka larra-jangka. Karlimi ka, ngulangku-juku kalu-nyanu mapa-maparni mijilyparlu.

Mijilypa nyampuju, wijiniki, minjiyi-kirlangu.  Wiri-wiri yangka kujaka japirnparlu mani, wiri-wiri yangka japirnpa-jangkaku wijiniki, ngula puyu-pinjarla, pangurnu-kurra, parraja-kurra kalu puyu-pinyi.  Ngula kalu-nyanu yirrarni, yirrarni, yirrarni jurrungka.  Karlangu-jangkarla kalu-nyanu parnta-yirrarni, mirriji-jarrarla.  Maparnilki kalu-nyanu palkalku nyampurluju. 

Linji-jarri ka, nyanungu-juku ka lurlurl-wanti. Ngapa-piya kujaka karlimi, kanyi kalu-nyanu yangkaju linji. Pangurnu-kurra, parraja-kurra kalu yirra-yirrarni. Pantirni kalu, parraja-kurra kalu rdakurl-yirrarni. Kanyilkili-nyanu. 

Yangka kujaka karlimi, ngulaju kalu-nyanu wirlinyi-wapangurlu maparni mijilyparluju. Wapurnungku, wirrkali-warnu, karli-karlimi ka yangka ngarntarlku-jangka larra-jangka. Karlimi ka, ngulangku-juku kalu-nyanu mapa-maparni mijilyparlu.

Nyampu mingkirri, kurdu-kurlangu, wita-kurlangu.  Kujaka mardarni kurdu wita, jalangu-warnu pirltirrka, purranjarla kalu puyu-pinyi, parrajarla kalu puyu-pinyi.  Kurdu wita-wiyili maparni mingkirrirli nyampurlu.  

Ngulajangkaju, ngati-nyanurlulku maparni.  Ngulangka karla yinyilki kurduku witaku jalangu-warnu pirltirrkaku.  Rdakangku karla julyurl-yirrarni, yinjayani kalurla, ngarninjayani ka wita jurnkungka.  Mingkirrirlaju kalu-jana purrami pirrjirdi-karda.  Ngati-nyanu, kurdu kalu-jana purra.  Ngulaju ka kurdungkuju witangkuju ngarni nyampuju.  Ngati-nyanurlu, kurdungku ka witangku ngarni.  Jurnkungkarlu-juku-pala ngarni pirrjirdi-karda.  Yinjayani kalurla mina-kurlurlu wita-kurlurlu.  Rdakangku karla julyurl-yirrarni, witakurla piirl-piirl-karlimi.  Pirrjirdi-mani-jiki ka.  

Maparnilki kalu-jana, jurru-langu kalu-jana maru-karda, kirdily-kirdilypa-karda-nyayirni maparni kurdu witaju, nyampurlu mingkirrirliji.  Ngati-nyanurlu ka-nyanu maparni pirrjirdi-karda miyalu, kurdu-jangka, karrmilypa.  Wakurlu-karda kalu maparni witaju kurduju.

Nyampuju mungkurr-mungkurrpa, manangkarrarla-yijala kujaka pardimi, manu ka pamarrparla-ngayingayi nyina yangka wirringka ka pardimi nyampuju.  Yankirri-kirlangu, marlu-kurlangu-yijala nyampuju -- ngarninja-kurlangu.

Mirrijini-yijala nyampuju.  Maparninja-kurlangu karnalu puyu-pinyi.  Wanta-kurra kijirni kalu, linjilki kalu puyu-pinyi.  Puyu-pinyi kalu, yirrarni kalu.  Ngula-kurlurlu kalu-nyanu nyampu-piyarlu parljirnilki.  Purra kalu-nyanu yangka jurru karlangu-jangka, karrparnu-jangka.  Ngula-jangka kalu-nyanu purra, kanunju-mani kalu-nyanu jurruju --  wijini-jangka-rlangu. 

Junma-jangka, purrami kalu-nyanu nyampurlu-juku.  Purrami kalu-nyanu yangka kali-nyanu-kali-nyanurlu warlaljarlu.  Yunparnu kalalu-jana.  Junmaju kala pamarrpa kala ngunaja yapa-kurlanguju nyurnu-nyurnu-kurlangu.  Ngulangku-wiyi kalalu-nyanu pajurnu, ngulajangka kalalu-jana nyampurlu-juku purraja, mungkurr-mungkurrparlu.

Kalalu-jana purraja junma-jangka, karrparnu-jangka, minjiyi, puturr-puturrpa.
Munyuparntiparnti, kurdu-kurduku-yijala yangka wita-wita-kurlangu, wiri-wiri-kirlangu.  Munyuparntiparnti nyampuju.  Kuntulpa-jangkaku-yijala karnalu-jana yirrarni nyampuju, yangka kujakalu kuntul-pinyi warrarda, ngulajangka karnalu-jana yirrarni.  

Kala-rnalu-nyanu yirrarnu wiri-wirirli mulyu-kurra, jurru-kurra, rdukurduku-kurra.  Parraja-kurra kala-rnalu-jana yirrarnu wita-witaku yangka jalangu-warnuku kurdu-kurduku.  Kuntulparlu yangka kala-jana pungu, kala miirntarlu, kalalu yangka kuntul-karrija wita-wita, mulyu-kurra kala-rnalu-jana yirrarnu, parraja-kurra, kala-jana parrajarla-juku parntija.  Kurdu-kurdu wita-wita kalalurla jirrnganja ngunaja nyampuku-juku jintaku-juku munyuparntiparntiki.  Kalalurla jirrnganja ngunaja parrajarla-juku, jurrungka-kurlu.  

Wiri-wirirli kalarnalu-nyanurla tirnngi-yirrarnu miirnta-jangkarluju.  Nyampu-juku jinta kala-rnalu-nyanu yirrarnu mirrijini-wangurlaju nyampu-juku jinta manangkarra-wana.

Yangka kujaka watiya karrinjayani patutu, ngulaju manangkarrarla.  Manangkarrarla ka pardimi.  

Kurdu-kurlangu, jurnku-kurlangu purranja-kurlangu nyampuju.  Ngati-nyanu, kurdu kapala janka jintangka-juku jurnkungka kunjururla pirrjirdi-karda -- jalangu-warnuju.  Lampunu karla janka kurduku ngarninjaku witaku.

Ngurlju-pinki, rdukurduku-purdanji ka wardu-karri, miyalu-purdanji ka wardu-karri ngati-nyanuju.  Mirntilyi, jaka ka janka kurdu-jangkaju.  Kurdu ngulayijala witaju.  Karrmilypa, jalangu-warnu, purrami karnalu-jana nyampurlu patuturlu wita-jangka.

Nyampuju wardarrka, ngatinyanu, kurdu kalu-jana julyurl-kijirni pirltirrka.  Jurnkungka kalu-jana purrami ngamarlanguju karrmilypa.  Karrmilypa-jarrimi ka, nyampurlu kalu-jana wardarrkarlu purrami jurnkungka.  Pirrjirdi-mani kalu.  Ngatinyanu, kurdu pirrjirdi-nyayirni nyampu-jangkaju.   

Lampurnu, tarltu-karda ka janka. Tarltu-karda kalu-rnalu-jana kurdu-kurduku jankaja. Wardu-karri kalu nyampurla wardarrkarla.  Janka kalu purturlu-purdanji, miyalu-purdanji kalu janka, jaka-purdanji kalu janka mirntilyi, pirdingka rdakungka.  

Kurdulku, ngati-karirli ka kurduju purrami jintangka-juku-jala.  Yulyurdu ka ngarninjayani.  Ngupalaku-ngupalaku purrami kalu kurduju nyampurluju wardarrkarluju.  


Nyampuju wariyi, manangkarrarla-yijala kujaka pardi, kurdu-kurlangu, purranja-kurlangu.  Jurnkungkuju, purrami ka wariyirli jintangka-juku.  Wijini-kirli, miyalu murrumurru yangka kurdu-jangka, jurnkungku nyampurlu kala jankaja.

Puyu-pinyiyijala kalu nyampuju.  Jurnku-kurlangu-juku-jala ka karri tarnnga-juku nyampuju. Kurdu-kurlangu, ngatinyanu-kurlangu, kalu-jana kurdu-kurdu jalangu-warnu purrami jurnkungka rdakungka. Ngula-kurlangu ka karri nyampuju. Pirrjirdi-karda ka janka miyalu kurdu-jangka. 

Lampunu karla janka, wiri-karda karla lampunu janka, yungu pirrjirdi-nyayirni nyina miyaluju kurdu-jangkaju, kunjuru-jangka nyampu-jangka wariyi-jangka.  Ngurrju-nyayirni yinga nyina.


Nyampu wartarurru ngulaka manangkarrarla pardimi, ngulaju kurdukuyijala jalangu-warnuku.  Jurnkungka kapalangu ngamarlangu janka, karrmilypa.   Ngatinyanu, kurdu kapala janka kunjururla jurnkungka.  Patuturla, wardarrkarla, wartarurrurla, marnkurrparla ka janka.  Ngamarlangu-juku kapala jankami kunjururla.  Wiringka kalu-jana kunjururla purra.  Lampurnuju karla janka, wardu-karri ka, ngunami ka rdakungka, nyinami ka kurdu ngamirljirla, janka ka.  

Kunjuruju ka rduyu-karri wiri-jarlu -- wardarrka, wartarurru.
Nyampu yukunkardi, mirrijini nyampuju wijini-kirlangu, minjiyi-kirlangu yangka kujakalu-nyanu jarnturnu, lakurrurlu kalarnalu jaarn-jaarn-pakarnu.  Wita-wita-mani karnalu, julyurl-pinyilki
karnalu.  Puyu-pinyi karnalu.  

Jurruku, rdukurdukuku, miyaluku, palkaku, maparni karnalu-nyanu kuja-kurlurlu-juku.  Parla-kurlurlu-juku karnalu-nyanu maparni.  Yarda karnalu julyurl-yirrarni yukunkardi nyampuju. 

Nyampu yukunkardi, mirrijini nyampuju wijini-kirlangu, minjiyi-kirlangu yangka kujakalu-nyanu jarnturnu, lakurrurlu kalarnalu jaarn-jaarn-pakarnu.  Wita-wita-mani karnalu, julyurl-pinyilki
karnalu.  Puyu-pinyi karnalu.  

Jurruku, rdukurdukuku, miyaluku, palkaku, maparni karnalu-nyanu kuja-kurlurlu-juku.  Parla-kurlurlu-juku karnalu-nyanu maparni.  Yarda karnalu julyurl-yirrarni yukunkardi nyampuju. 

Yulkardi nyampuju ngulaju marluku.  Marlu-kurlangu nyampuju ngarninja-kurlangu yulkardiji.  

Jurru-kurralku kala-rnalu-nyanu yirrarnu yangka karrparnu-jangka-languku.  Nyampu kalarnalu walyka-manu nyampurluju.  Wiri-wiri yikalu ngunanjayani, ngulangku kalarnalu-nyanu walyka-manu jurru.  Kalarnalu yangka puyu-pungu nyampuju wita rdakangku.  Kalarnalu-nyanu maparnu.  Jurru-kurra kalarnalu-nyanu walyka-yirrarnu nyampurluju yulkardirli.  Wijinirla kalarnalu-nyanu yirrarnu.  

Parntirr-karrija pirrjirdi-nyayirni.

Kurdu-kurdulpalu pina-pina-jarrija kuruwarriki kijirninjaku manu wirntinjaku.  Purlka-purlkarlulpalu-jana jukurrpa yirri-puraja manu milki-yunparnulpalu-jana.  

Yanulu wirlinyi Palkakarrinya-kurra manu Waturlpunyu-kurra manu Yarripilangu-kurra.  Wiri-wirirlilpalu-jana jukurrpa yimi-ngarrurnu kurdu-kurduku.  

Nyangulpalu Jangala kujalparla manu kuna, manu kujalpa yulu pajurnu marlu mungangkarlu Wayililinyparla.  Julyurl-kujurnu marluju warlungka yumurru jankanjaku, manu yumurruju kirlka-manu.  Pajurnu ngirnti manu wirliya-jarra.  Marluju purrajalku yipangka.  Ngula yirnmi-jarrijalku, wilypi-manulku Jangalarluju manu jarnngi-jarnngi-manulku marluju manu-jana yungulku yapaku.

Wirlinyirnalu-jana kangu wardapiki manurnalu-jana ngarrurnu, ''Kajinpalu laja nyanyi rurrpa-kurlu, yampiyalu warna-kujaku.  Kala kajinyanu laja tirnngi-yirrarni ngulaju wardapiji palka ka ngunami."

Mungangkalpa-jana Jangalarlu yirri-puraja jukurrpa kuja-palangu puraja Jangala-jarra warlungku.  Nakamarrarlulpa-jana yimi-ngarrurnu Yajarlu-wardingki-patuku warna manu yarla. Yarripilangu-wardingki-patuku ngulajulpa-jana yirri-puraja Napaljarri-jarrarlu manu Japaljarrirli ngulaju wardapi kuja yanurnu Purturlu-ngurlu, Yarripilangu-kurra.

Mulju-kurralpalu-jana kangu Wayililinypa-kurra nyanjaku. Yarripirlangurlalu nyangu warnirri wiri-nyayirni.  Ngarna-kurralkurnalu-jana kangu.  Nyangulu marliri.  Kajili wiri-jarri yungulu manngu-nyanyi wiringkilki.

Karnta-karntakulpalu-jana jirrnganja pakarnu manja karlangu.  Ngulajangkalu majarnu karlanguju warlungka jungarni-karda.  

Jampijinparlulpa jarnturnu karli manu wirlki.  Kurdu-kurdulpalu nyinaja warru.  Nyangulpalu Jampijinpaju karli manu wirlki jarntirninjakurra.

Nancy Napurrurlarlu yirrarnu

Nyampu yimi ngulaju Barney Japangardi Brownurluju yimi ngarrurnu ngajuku.

Nyurruwiyi, yapa panu-jarlu kalalu nyinaja Purturlurla, yirdingka Puwarri-puwarrirla.  Kalalu manyu-karrija  Jardiwanparla yapaju.
Yapaju panu ngulajulu yanurnu kurlirra-ngurlu, kakarrara-ngurlu,
yatijarra-ngurlu, manu karlarra-ngurlu. Manyu-kurralpalu jinta-jarrija. Karnta-karntarluju ngulajulpalu-jana mangarri purraja wati-patuku. Kurdu-kurduju ngulajulpalu manyu-karrija panu-nyayirni.

Watingkijilpalu yunparnu kilji-nyayirnirli karli-kirlirli ngulalu-jana purda-purda-nyangu kardiyarluju yunparninja-kurra rayipulu-kurlurlu. Karnta-karnta manu kurdu-kurdu ngulaju wapalkulpalu nyinaja ngulalu-jana kankarlarra-karirli nyangu kardiyaju.

Muku luwarnulu-jana karnta-karnta manu kurdu-kurdu. Ngulajangka, kardiyaju, yanu-jana jangkardu wati-patukulku.  Luwarnulu-jana muku.

Japangardiki warringiyi-nyanurlu, yunparnu-nyanu kardiya-kujaku. Kardiyarluju luwarnu, luwarnu, luwarnu, luwarnu lawa-juku. Japanangkarluju, yunparnu-jukulpa-nyanu. Ngulajangka, Japanangkarluju  panturnu wurrumpuru-kurlurlu  kardiya jinta ngulajulu yirrarnu kawartawarrarla. Jiwirlki-ngunanja-yanulpa wurrumpuru-kurlu kurltu-wana-kurlu.

Jinta-karirli luwarnu kunka-warnurlu kardiyarlu Japanangkaju ngula lawa-jarrijalku. Kardiyarluju rdaku pangurnu wiri-nyayirni. Yirrarnu-jana wati, karnta, manu kurdu-kurdu rdakungka ngula-jana jutu-pungu-jirrnganja. Kardiyaju, ngulajulpalu-jana pardarnu wurnturu pirlingka yapakuju manu warru-nyangulpalu-jana yapaku lani-warnuku.

Marnkurrpa nyanjarla, parnkajalu kujalpalu-jana luwarnu.  Nyayili-jana yapaju jijajarra kardiyaku.  Luwarnulu-jana kardiyarlu. Yanulkulu wardinyilki kardiyaju.  Kardiya yangka wurrumpuru-kurlu ngurljungka-kurlu, ngulaju palija kurlirra Waturlpunyurla.

Kujalpalu-jana kardiyarlu  luwarnu yapa panu, yangka marnkurrpa yapa-patu, ngulajulu parnkaja lani pirli-kirra kardiya nyanjarla. Nyayili-jana yapaju kardiyaku jijajarra, luwarnulu-jana marnkurrpa-juku.

Pirli-ngirlirlili-jana luwarnu yapa-patuju ngulalpalu yanurra pirli-kirra. Kula nganta lawangka-juku. Kalalpalu-jana kamparru  pardarnu.  Ngulalu-jana yapaju muku luwarnu panu-juku.  Lawalkulpa karrija  Puwarri-puwarriji manu Purturluju yapa-wangu.  Kardiyarlu-jukurla pirdi-pirdi-pungu yapakuju.

Pina yanulu kakarraralku Yimampi-kirra kardiya-patuju yapa luwarninjarla.

[YAWULYU-KURLU MANU PURLAPA-KURLU]

Ngurrara-kurra-wiyi-rnalu-jana kangu nyanjaku kurdu-kurduju
nyanungu-nyangu-kurra.  Jilangka-rnalu ngunaja ngurrangkaju ngula kala-rnalu-jana kangu warru, parra-kari-parra-kari wirlinyirliji ngurrara-kari-ngurrara-kari-kirra nyanjaku.

Purlka-purlkarlu manu muturna-muturnarlulu-jana yimi-ngarrurnu jukurrpa manu kuruwarri, ngurrara-kari manu ngurrara-kari-kirli.  Kuja-jukulpalu-jana yimi ngarrurnu warru.

Ngula-rnalu-jana nyangu panu-juku ngurraraju: Puyurru, Purturlu,
Kanakurlangu (Mala Bore)  manu Yumurrpa.

Puwarri-puwarri-kirrarnalu yanu kujaka karrimi Purturlurla yatijarni-nginti.  Nyangurnalu mulju wiri manu marliri kujaka nguna ngapa wiri.

Kujarnalu yanu Kanakurlangu-kurra, yimi-ngarrurnu-nganpa jukurrpa Japangardirli nyampu-kurlu ngurrara-kurlu.

Ngularnalu yanu  Yumurrpa-kurra, warru-karrijalpalu kurdu-kurdu muljungka.  Rdakulpalu nyangu ngula-jana yirri-puraja jukurrpa Yumurrpa-kurlu Napurrurlarlu Yumurrpa-wardingkirli.

Ngakalu yawulyu manu purlapaju pungu ngurrara warru nyanja-warnurlu.

Karnta-karntaku-wiyili-jana yirrarnu yawulyuju Purturlu-wardingki manu Kanakurlangu-wardingki-patuku kirda-patuku. 
Napanangkaku manu Napangardikili-jana yirrarnu yawulyuju,
ngulaju Nangalarlu manu Nakamarrarlu kurdungurlurlu.

Jila-wardingki-patuku, kirda-patuku, Nungarrayiki manu Napaljarriki ngulajulu-jana kujurnu kuruwarriji, Napurrurlarlu
manu Nampijinparlu kurdungurlurluju.

Yumurrpa-wardingki-patukulu-jana kirda-patuku kujurnu yawulyuju, Napurrurlaku manu Nakamarraku ngulaju Nungarrayirli manu Napangardirli, kurdungurlurlu.

Puyurru-wardingki-patuku kirda-patuku Nangalaku manu Nampijinpaku, ngulajulu-jana kujurnu yawulyuju Napanangkarlu manu Napaljarrirli kurdungurlurlu.

Wati-patuku ngulaju ka kuja-piya-yijala karrimi karnta-karnta- kurlangu-piya kuruwarriji.  

Wati-paturlulpalu-jana yirrarnu wamulu wita-witaku wirriya-wirriyaku.

Yamparruju-rnalu-jana nyangu wati-patu manu wirriya-wirriya-wiyi purlapa pinja-kurra.

Kardiya-patu-langurlulu pungu Jungarrayi-jarrarlu manu Japangardirli. 

Maparnulu-jana jara-kurlurlu manu karrku-kurlurlu palka,  manu wamululu-jana yirrarnu.

Nyampu wamulu, pajurnulu  Yumurrparla kurdu-kurdurlu manu Japaljarrirli.  Nakamarra-langurlu pajurnu.  Yirrarnulu wanta-kurra pantirninjaku ngakaku purlapakuju.

Ngulajangkaju, yawulyurlalu wirntija karnta-karntaju. Kamparrujulu wirntija Jila-wardingki-patu Nungarrayi manu Napaljarri.  Kuruwarrili mardarnu ngulaju wati jukurrpa.

Napanangka manu Napangardili wirntija, Janyinki-wardingki manu Purturlu-wardingki-patu ngulaju karnta-karnta kujalu wirntinjayanurnu wurna.   Mardarnulu yawulyuju Janyinki-wardingki-paturluju ngulaju karlangu manu karnta jukurrpa.

Nampijinpa manu Nangala, Puyurru-wardingki-patu, wirntijalu nyanungu-nyangurla kuruwarrirla ngapangka, manulu mardarnu jukurrpaju ngulaju ngapa.

Nakamarra manu Napurrurla, wirntijalu Yumurrparla.  Yawulyulu mardarnu yarla jukurrpa ngulalpa-nyanu juta-yinjayanu.

Purlapalu pungu wati-paturlu manu wirriya-wirriyarlu ngulaju Yumurrpa-yijala.


Japangardirli manu Jangalarlu-pala pungu purlapa mungangkarlu ngularnalu-jana nyangu.   Watipaturlu panukarirli, ngulajulu-janarla yunparnu manu karli rdimpirl-pungu.  Karnta-paturlulpalu-janarla purrpurr-pakarnu.

Nakamarra ka  nyina warlu-wana manu wardapi ka ngunami 
warlu-wana kaji  Nakamarrarlu  purrami.

Nampijinparlu ka nyurlanjarla  purrami mangarri warlungka wayangka.

Kurdu-kurdurlu kalu mardarni kuruwarri Jilangka  pakuju kajili  yirrarni jukurrpa nyanungu-nyangu.

Nakamarra wita ka karrimi Yumurrpa-kurlu kuruwarri-kirli.

Napangardi ka karrimi 
kuruwarri-kirli  
Kanakurlangu-kurlu.

Napangardi jintakari wita ka karrimi kuruwarri-kirli 
Purturlu-kurlu.

Napaljarri  wita ka  karrimi  nyanunguku-palangu-kurlangu kuruwarri-kirli.

Jungarrayi ka  karrimi 
kuruwarri-kirli  nyanungu-nyangu warringiyi-kirlangu-kurlu.

Yanu-rnalu manjiki kurdu-kurdu-kurlu yungulu yangka pina-jarrimi nyanungu-nyangu warringiyi-kurlangu jukurrpaku.  Kurdu-kurduju, ngulaju-rnalu-jana kangu ngurrara-kari ngurrara-kari-kirra nyanjaku manu yungulu pina-jarrimi ngurraraku yijardu-nyayirni manu yungulu pina-jarrimi jukurrpaku.  Jarlu-paturlu,  ngulajulpalu-jana yimi-ngarrirninjayanu jukurrpa ngurrara-kurluju junga-nyayirnirli.  Kurdu-kurdurlu ngulajulpalu-jana purda-nyangu yimi-ngarrirninja-kurraju. Purlka-paturlu, Japanangkarlu, Jampijinparlu manu Japaljarri-jarrarlu ngulalpalu yunparnurlangu jukurrpaju manu yirri-purajalpalu-jana kurdu-kurdu-kuju.

Yanu-rnalu Pikilyi-kirra, Wapurtarli-kirra, Jangan-kurlangu-kurra. Nyangu-rnalu Yanjilypiri-langu ngula-rnalu yanu jingi-jingi-wiyi Wapurtarli-kirra.  Wapurtarlirlaju, mangarri-rnalu ngarnu. Ngulajangka, Nakamarra-paturlulu-jana yimi-ngarrurnu jukurrpa Wapurtarli-kirli kurdu-kurduku.  Nakamarra-patu, ngulajulu-jana kurdu-kurduku jirrnganja-warrkarnu pirlingka Wapurtarlirlaju. 

Ngulajangka-rnalu yanu Jangan-kurlangu-kurralku pirli wiri-jarlu-kurra manu kurdu-kurduju warrkarnulu yinyarlaju. Jarlu-paturlu ngulajulu-jana yimi ngarrurnu jukurrpa nyampu-kurlu ngurrara-kurlu kurdu-kurduku.

Nyampu-jangka ngulaju-rnalu yanu pina Pikilyi-kirralku.  Kurdu-kurdukujulu-jana milki-yirrarnu rdaku ngapa wiri-kirli ngula karla jitipayini jaarl-parntarrimi.  Nyanunguju Yaparaji.  Napanangkarlu manu Japanangkarlulu-jana milki-yirrarnu manu jukurrpalu-jana yimi ngarrurnu kurdu-kurduku. Jinta-karilangu-rnalu nyangu ngapa ngula ka ngunami pirlingka kurlarni-nginti nyanungu Pikilyi-nyayirnirla. Nyampu-jangka, ngula-rnalu pina yanu Yajarlu-kurra ngurra-kurralku. Wuraji-wuraji-rnalu pina yanu warru-nyanja-warnuju Yajarlu-kurraju.

Yajarlurlaju, jarlu-paturlulpalu-janarla yunparnu kurdiji  mungangkarlu, manu kamina-kaminalpalu  wirntija. Wiri-wiri-langulpalu-jana jirrnganja-wirntija muturna-muturna.  Kurdu-kurdurlu wirriya-wirriyarlu ngulajulpalu pungu jardiwanpa.  Purlka-pardurlu  Japaljarrirli-jana jirrnganja-pungu, manu  Japanangka-langurlu. Kamina-kamina ngulajulpalu wirntinja-yanu jardiwanparlaju. Napanangka-jarra manu  Nakamarralpalu-jana jirrnganja wirntija.   Kurdungurlu manu kirdalpalu wirntija. Yajarlurla, kardiyarlu film-wardingkirli-jana manu wirntinja-kurra   manu  yunparninja-kurra. Wiri-wirirli ngulalpalu yunparnu
manu kurdu-kurdu ngulalpalu wirntija.

Napanangka-paturlu ngulajulu-jana yawulyu-langu yirrarnu kamina-kaminakuju manu wirntijalu yawulyurlaju. Pikilyi kuruwarrili-jana kujurnu Napanangka-warnuku wita-witaku ngurrju-nyayirni, nyanungu-nyangu warringiyi-kirlangu jukurrpa.  

[ Warlpiri Bible Passages]






[JON Jonah Warlpiri  Swartz  Australia]
Jonah-kurlu

Parrangka jintangka YAHWEH wangkajarla yirdiki Jonah-ku Amittai-kurlanguku kurduku, kujalpa purda-nyangu Warlaljamarri Wiri-kirlangu YAHWEH-kirlangu yimi, wita purda-nyanjarla karlirr-parnkaja.

Mungangka jintangka, wangkajarla YAHWEH Jonah-ku, <<Yakarra-pardiya!  Purda-nyangkaju yirri-yirrirli!  Yani kanpa jalangu yali-kirra kirri wiri-kirra yirdi Nineveh-kurra.  Yanta, ngarrika-jana yapa parliya:  <Maju karna-jarna nyanyi, kapurna-jana jirriny-pinyirra nguru yalumpu-kurra Nineveh-kurra.> >>

Jonah wangka-nyanu, <<Nyarrpara-kurrarna wuruly-yani YAHWEH-kijaku Warlaljamarri Wiri-kijaku?>>  Kula yanu Nineveh-kurra, kala lawa.  Kala yanu Joppa-kurra.  Kuja yukajarra, nyangu pawurtu kujalpa wurdujarra-jarrija yaninjaku-ngarnti wurna Spain-kirra.  Yanurra Jonah-ju, pawurtu-wardingkiki wangkajarla, <<Nyampu karnangku maniyi yinyi yungurna yani Spain-kirra.>>  Ngula warrkarnu wati panungkajinta.  Yarnkajarralkulu.  Jonah-ju yungu-nganta wuruly-parnkayarla YAHWEH-kijaku, ngayi ngamanpaju-manu.

Kulkurru-kulkurrulkulpa yanurra pawurtuju wurnturu.  Ngula-puru yukaja Jonah-ju kanunju-kurra, kankarlu-ngurlu jitija kanunju-kurra pawurturlaju, jardalpa ngunanja-yanu.  Ngula-jangka, warlpa wiri manu ngapa wiri yilyajarni-jana jangkardu YAHWEH-rli.  Ngapangku-julpa pawurtuju yurnku-yurnku-manu, puta rdilyki-pungu.
Pawurtu-wardingki-patuju lani-jarrinjarla purlajalpa-lurla kurruwalpaku nyanungurra-nyanguku yungu-jana warra-warra-kanyi.  Ngula-puru, jurnarrpa-julpalu kijirninja-yanu walingki-maninja-kujaku rampaku-karda.

Watiji yanu pawurtu-wardingki wiri kanunju nyanjaku, ngula nyangulku Jonah-ju jarda-ngunanja-kurra.  Ngularla wangkaja Jonah-kuju, <<Nyarrpa kanpa nyuntu-pukanya jardaju ngunami?  Kala yinyangku-puka kuja [mayi?] kalu laningkiji jata-nyanyi.  Yakarra-pardiya!  Wangkaya-ngalparla nyuntu-nyanguku kurruwalpaku.  Kapu marda-ngalpa purda-nyanyi lani purlanja-kurra.  Kajika-ngalpa wankaru-mani marda ngapa-kujaku!>>

Pawurtu-wardingki-patu, wangkajalu-nyanu, <<Nyampurla-juku marda-ka yapa jinta nyina maju-parnta.  Jalangurluju karlipa pamarrpa yirdi-kirli-patu yirrarni ngamingka.>>  Ngula watingki jintangku-mipa manu pamarrpa yukanjarla yirdi-kirli Jonah-kurlu.
Ngulalu payurnu Jonah, <<Nyuntu-nyangu yirdiji nyampu-waja pamarrparla!  Nyarrpa-jarrijanpa nyuntuju? Nyiyaku-wajanpa yanurnu nganimpa-wanaju? Nyarrpara-ngurlunpa yanurnu?  Nyarrpara nguru nyuntu-nyanguju?  Ngana nyuntu-nyangu warlalja?>>

Jonah-rlu yalu-manu-jana, <<Ngaju-jurna Hebrew.  Ngaju karna pura yirri-yirrirli Warlaljamarri Wiri.  Nyanunguju Warlaljamarri Wiri kuja-ka nyina nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, kuja ngurrju-manu walya manu ngapa.

Ngajurnarla jurnta-parnkaja.>>
Kujalu pawurtu-wardingki-paturlu yimi purda-nyangu jurnta-parnkanja-warnu, pirlirrpa-julu ngarrurda-jarrijalku.  Ngula-lurla wangkajalku, <<Nyuntu-junpa maju-nyayirni! Nyiya-kunparla jurnta-parnkaja!>>

Warlpa manu ngapalpa-pala yarda kilji-jarrija.  Ngulalu payurnu pawurtu-wardingki-paturluju, <<Nyuntulurla marda majungka kuja-ka kilji-jarri yarda! Nyarrpa-manirnangkulu nyuntuju yungulpa-pala nyampu mangkuru manu warlpa yatarnpa-jarriyarla?>>

Jonah-nyanu jangku-wangkaja, <<Julyurl-kijika-julu ngapa-kurra.  Kapi yatarnpa-jarrilki.>>

Kala lawa, kulalu julyurl-kujurnu.  Ngula-jangkaju, pawurtulpalu puta yurnturnu watiya-kurlurlulu walya-kurra-jarriyarla-nganta yungulu.  Ngapangkulpa-jana warru jarrwara-manu.

Ngula-lurla Jonah-kurlanguku Warlaljamarriki YAHWEH-ki purlaja, <<Waraa!  Kajirnalu wati nyampu-wiyi julyurl-kijirni ngapa-kurra, kulalpanpa-nganpa pakakarla, yampiya-nganpa nganimpaju!  Nyuntu-kulanpa-nganpa jangkardurnu jirriny-pungu warlpa wiri manu ngapa.  Jonah-wajangku jurnta-parnkaja nyuntu-kujakuju nganimpa-wangu.>>

Ngula-warnuju, pawurtu-wardingki-paturluju, jarna-maninjarla julyurl-kujurnulu mangkuru-kurra.  Ngula-warnuju mangkuruju yatarnpa-jarrija.

Pawurtu-wardingki-patu-julpa-lurla lani-jarrija-nyayirni YAHWEH-ki.  Purranjarla yungu-lurla warntarri-nyayirni-wangu, wangkaja-lurla, <<Kapurnangkulu tarnngangku-juku purami.>>

Yangka kujalu julyurl-kujurnu Jonah ngapa-kurra, ngula-kurla jirriny-pungu yawu wiri-jarlu YAHWEH-rli, ngula muru-pungu wanapi-juku miyalu-kurra.  Yangka Jonah nyinajalpa yawungka kanunju parra-patuku.

Ngulalpa Jonah nyinaja miyalurla yawu-kurlangurla, ngula wangkajarla nyanungu-nyanguku Warlaljamarriki Wiriki,

<<Waraa, Warlaljamarri Wiri!  Ngajulparna kanunju-jarrinja-yanu ngapangka.  Ngajurnangku purlajarra yinpaju ngupa-karri.  Yuwayi, junga-jukunpaju ngupa-karrija! 
Kapurna paliyarla-waja.  Kujarnangku purlajarra, ngulanpaju purda-nyangu.
Nyuntu-junpaju julyurl-kurjurnu ngapa-kurra kaninjarra-nyayirni kujalpa rdarrjalku karrija kanunjuju.
Ngapa-julpa warru-kirdi-kirdi ngunaja ngaju-wana.  Ngapangku-julpaju ngardaly-kujurnu kuja-purda manu kujarni-purda.
Manngi-nyangulparnaju ngajuju, <God-rlu kaju mamparl-pinyi tarnnga-juku.  Ngajulurlu kularna nyanyi pina Warlaljamarri Wiri yalirla Maralypirla Jerusalem-rla.>
Ngapa kujaju wapirrijarni, ngula-puru-jukulkuju karrkarda-ngarnu waninja-kuju, manuju puta kurl-mardarnu.
Mangkururluju muru-pungu-nyayirni.  Yartura-piyaju marna-jangkarluju muku warurnu jurru-wanaju.
Yukajarrarna parlju-piya-kurralku kaninjarra, kuja-ka pamarrpa yintirdi karrimi yali kanunju-nyayirni, kuja-ka kankarlarra-kari warrkirni.
Yangkalpaju larlarl-mardarnu ngapangkuju rdaku-piyarla wuurnpa-nyayirni.  Kularna nyarrpa wilypi-pardiyarla.
Waraa, Warlaljamarri Wiri, God ngaju-nyangu! Nyuntulurlunpaju wankaru-manu!
Nyurru-jalalparna puta-palija, purlajalkurnangku nyuntuku.  Nguru-nyayirni-wangu maralypirlarlunpaju purda-nyangu!
Yapangku ngula kalu purami kurruwalpa, yali yapa kulalpa-jana muurlparlu-mardakarla palinja-kujaku.  God-rlu yungulpa-jana maju wati yali kurruwalpa-kurlangu-patu yimirirli-jiki mardakarla.  Kala lawa!  Nyanungurlu kalu mamparl-pinyi purda-nyanja-wangurlu.
Ngajulurlulku karnangku pulka-pinjarla yunparni.  Ngaju kapurnaju yinyi nyuntu-kurra warntarri-nyayirni-wangu.  Ngaju karnaju jangku-pinyi, kapurnangku tarnngangku-juku purami nyuntuju.  Kularnangku jiringki-yirrarni.  Warlaljamarri-jiki jinta-ka nyina yapaku muurlparlu-mardarninjaku!>>

Ngula purda-nyangu Jonah wangkanja-kurra, Warlaljamarrirli ngarlu-ngarlu-manu yawungku yungu pina yulkulyu-yirrarni Jonah walya-kurra.  Junga-juku, yawungku walya-kurra-manu.

Ngularla yarda wangkaja japaku-karilki YAHWEH-ji Jonah-kuju,
<<Yanta yali-kirra Nineveh-kurra kirri wiri-kirra.  Jangkardu yanta-jana, yangka yimi-jana wangkaya kujarnangku kamparru-wiyi wangkaja.>>
Yijardulkurla ngungkurr-nyinaja YAHWEH-ki Jonah-ju.  Nyanunguju yarnkajarra Nineveh-kurraju wurnturu-nyayirni.  Yaliji kirri ngulaju wiri-jarlu-nyayirni jarla-wana-wana.

Kala kuja yukajarni Nineveh-kurralku, ngula-julpa kulkurru-wanalku yaninja-yanu parrangka jingi-jingi, kuja-jana wangkaja parliya-kuju, <<Ngaka 40-pala parra-jangka YAHWEH-rliji kapi-nyarra jirriny-pinyirni nyurrurlaku manu ngurra-kari ngurra-kariki, kapu ngunami walya-mipa.

Ngula-lurla yapa Nineveh-wardingki-patuju yijardu-jarrija Jonah-ngku kuja-jana yimi-ngarrurnu yimi God-kurlangu, ngulalu ngarrurda-jarrija purda-nyanjarla, <<Waraa! Junga-waja!  Nyarrpa-jarrimirlipa?  Pinarlipa-nyanu kulpari-yinyi God-kurra.  Wurra, ngarninja-wangu-wiyirlipa nyina, manu puturr-puturrparla wawardarlarlipa yuka!  God-rlu yungu-ngalpa nyanyi, milki-yirrarnirlipa-nyanu kulpari.>>  Junga-juku, panu-jukulu ngarninja-wangu-jarrija wati, karnta, kurdu-kurdu, manulu yukaja wawardarla puturr-puturrparla.

Purlka yangka yali wiri Nineveh-wardingkirli purda-nyangu yimi yapa panu-kari-jana kujalpalu wangkaja mangarri ngarninja-wangu lawa-nyinanjaku.  Nyanunguju rarringki karrinja-pardija jiya-nyayirni-wangu-ngurluju, yalyi-manu-nyanu wawarda, ngula yukaja puturr-puturrparla wawardarla, ngula yaninjarla pirri-manu yurlpulyparla.
Ngula-jangka, panti-panturnulpa kuruwarri pipa-kurra, ngula yilyaja-jana kurdungurlu-patu warru-kirdi-kirdi Nineveh-rla pipa-kurlu yapa-patuku yungulu nyanyi.  Nyampunya-ka kuruwarriji karrimi:
Purlkangku wiringki manu nyanungu-nyangu kurdungurlu-watirli, panturnulu nyampu kuruwarri nyurrurlaku yapa panu parliyaku.  Nyurrurlarlu, purda-nyangkalu yijardurlu!  Nganangku-puka kulalpa nganjarla ngapa, kuyu, miyi.  Manu warla-pajikalu-jana puluku, jiyipirlangu nyiyarlangu ngarninja-kujaku.
Nyurrurla panu-jukulu yukaya wawarda puturr-puturrpa-kurra, manu puluku manu jiyipirlangulu-jana yukanja-yirraka wawarda-kirraju!  Manyu-wangu-lurla wangkaya murlarrpa-nyayirni God-ku.  Panu-juku-lurla kulu-wangu maju-wangu nyinaya jintangka-juku.
Kajika-ngalpa marda nyanungu-jarrinjarla mari-jarri.  Kajika-ngalpa marda ngurrju-nyinami kulu-wangu.  Manu kajika-ngalpa marda yampimi pinja-wangurlu.>>

Junga-juku, nyangu-jana God-rlu yapa kujalpalu nyanungu-kurra-jarrija.  Jungarnilkilpa-lurla nyinaja, manulu muku yampija punkuju.  Junga-juku, God-ju nyanungu-jarrinjarla mari-jarrija-jana.  Kapu-jana yamparruju pungkarla-wiyi.  Kala lawa, yampija-jana yapa panu-juku manu kirri manu puluku manu jiyipi.

Ngula Jonah-jurla kulu-jarrija kanunjumanyumpa-nyayirni YAHWEH-ki, yungu-nganta-jana muku pungkarla yangka yapa panu-juku.
Jonah-rluju ngula-julpa kuurljirri-mardarnu tarnngangku-juku YAHWEH-ji, ngularla wangkaja, <<Nyurru-wiyi kujalparna nyinaja ngurrararla ngaju-nyangurla, milya-pungulparnangku ngurrju-juku nyuntuju.  Manu warra-warra-kanyi kanpa-jana yapa panu, manu mari-jarri kanpa-jana.  Manu nganyu-nganyu-wangu kanpa nyinami yapaku pinjaku-ngarnti.  Kajingkili nyuntuku kalkurnu-purda-jarri, nyuntu kanpa-jana yawuru-jarrimi, pinja-wangu.  Yangka kujanpaju ngarrurnu yaninjaku Nineveh-kurra yapaku warnkiri-maninjaku, kulalparna ngampurrpa-nyinaja.  Ngula-kujaku-nyarna wuruly-parnkaja Spain-kirraju.
Ngula-jangkanya karnangku payirni yungunpaju pinyi ngaju.  Kula karnaju ngampurrpa purda-nyanyi wankaru-nyinanjaku.>>

YAHWEH-rli jangku-manu Jonah, <<Nyiya-jangka kanpaju ngajuju warlirrarni?  Kujaju kula ngurrju!>>

Jonah-ju yarnkajarra kakarrara kirri-ngirliji.  Kuja-nyanu yamalku nganturnu, ngula pirri-manu yamangka kanunju.  Ngulalparla pirr-pardija God-ku yungu nyanyi kaji nyarrpa-mani yali kirri Nineveh.

Ngula-jangkaju, YAHWEH God-kurla marlaja-pardija ngalyipiji yaruju-nyayirni kankarlumparra yungurla parntarri yama Jonah-ku wanta-kujaku walyka-karda.  Jonah-julpa nyinaja pukurl-pukurlpa-nyayirni ngalyipi-kiji.
Ngula-jangka, rangkarrkurlu parrarl-pantirninja-puru, God-rlu jirriny-pungurla jangkardu wayipi yungurla jurnta-ngarni yintirdi, ngula wayipirliji jurnta-ngarnurla kulkurru-wana yintirdi-wana yintirdiji.  Ngalyipji palija linjilki ngarninja-warnu.
Kuja wantalku kankarlu-jarrija, God-rlurla jangkardu yilyaja warlpa wiri kakarrara-ngurlu.  Ngula wantangku-julpa jankaja jurru kankarlarni.  Jonah-ju wanta-jangka mirri-mirri puta-wantijalpa.  Manu wangkaja, <<Yungurna palimi.>>

God-rla wangkaja, <<Nyiya-jangka kanpaju kuurljirri-mardarni kapi yangka kujarnangku jirriny-pungu wayipi?  Kujaju kula ngurrju!
Jonah-rla wangkaja, <<Yuwayi, kujaju ngurrju kuja karnangku kulu-jarri!  Kapurnangku tarnnga-juku jankami nyurnu-kurra-pinangu kajirna pali!>>

YAHWEH-rla wangkaja Jonah-ku, <<Nyampu ngalyipi kuja pardija jintangka mungangka, manu munga-pardu-karirlaju palijalku.  Kulanpa nyuntulurlu kardu-manu ngalyipi kuja pardija, manu kulanpa karrinja-yirrarnu.  Kala kuja ngalyipi palija, nyuntunparla wajampa-jarrija yapa-piyaku.
1 Kala nyiya-jangka kula kanpa-jana wajampa-jarri nyuntuju Nineveh-wardingki-patuku yapaku?  Ngulaju kalu-ngarra yirdiyi-paturla-jala parliya nyinami manu matirni yapaju 120,000-pala marda, manu marda 130,000-pala, manu pulukurlangu panu-yijala.  Nyuntu kanparla wajampa-jarri ngalyipiki yalumpuku.  Ngajuju karna-jana miyalu kanunjumanyumpa-nyayirni wajampa-jarrimi yapaku parliyaku Nineveh-wardingki-patuku.>>  Kuja-nyarla wangkaja Jonah-ju YAHWEH-ji.

[MAT  Matthew 4  Warlpiri  Steve Swartz  Australia]

Yali-jangkaji, God-kurlangurlu Pirlirrparlu kangu Jesus manangkarra-kurra.  Yalirla yinga-nganta Juju Wiri-jarlurlu karlirr-mardakarla God-kujaku.
Jesus-rli kula yarnunjuku ngarnu 40-pala-kari parrangka manu 40-pala-kari mungangka, manu yali-jangkaju nyanungu-julpa nyinaja yarnunjuku-nyayirni.
Ngula-jangkaju, Juju-Wiri-jarlu yanurnurla yinga-nganta karlirr-mardakarla God-ngurlu.  Juju Wiri-jarlu, wangkajalkurla Jesus-kiji, <<Kajinpa nyuntuju God-kurlangu Ngalapi-nyanu, wangkaya-jana nyampurraku payarrpaku, ngurrju-manta-jana mangarri-kirra, yinganpa ngarni.>>

Jesus-rliji jangku-manu Juju Wiri-jarluju, <<Bible-rlaju-ka kuja wangka, Kula kalu yapaju nyina mangarri ngarninjarla-juku, walku.  Purda-nyanyi kalu manu pura kalu yirdiji nyampu kuja-ka God wangka.> [Try, 'People cannot live without eating bread.  They also cannot live without listening to and following every word that God says to them.>>

Yali-jangkarluju Juju Wiri-jarlurlu kangu Jesus-ji ngurrju-nyayirni kirri-kirraju Jerusalem-kurra.  Juju Wiri-jarlu kangu Jesus-ji kankarlarni yuwarli maralypirla manu karrinja-yirrarnu yalirla pirnti-pirntirla-juku yuwarli maralypirla.[check frequency of usage of personal names]
Ngula-warnuju Juju Wiri-jarlu-jurla wangkaja Jesus-kiji, <<Kajinpa nyuntuju God-kurlangu Ngalapi-nyanu, jurl-pungka yuwarli nyampu-ngurluju walya-kurra, kulanpa-nyanu murru-murru-mani.  Kuja-ka wangka Bible-rlaju, <God-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyanguku marra-marra-patuku jina-mardarninjaku nyuntu.  Kajinpa jurl-pinyi kankarlarra-ngurlu yuwarli-ngirliji, kapingkili rdarri-mardarni nyuntuju nyanungu-nyangu rdakangka, kalakanpa-nyanu wantinjarla rdilyki-pinyi jamanaju pirlingkaju.>  Junga-juku, nyuntuju jurl-pungka manu kijika-nyanu nyampu-ngurlu yuwarli maralypi-ngirli.>>

Yali-jangkaji, Jesus-rli jangku-manu Juju Wiri-jarlu, <<Yaliji marda junga.  Kala Bible-rlaju-ka kujarlangu wangka nganimpaku:  <Kulalu God [Lord your God]miyalu maju-manta! [change to 'force him to save you]>) manu rdarr-kangka-kirli-nyanu ngaringki yinga-nganta-nyarra God-rlu nyanjarla wankaru-mani nyurrurla.  Kajika-nyarra kulu-jarrimi nyurrurla-kuju.>>

Yali-jangkarluju, Juju Wiri-jarlurlu kangu Jesus-ji kankarlarni purlungka kankarlu-nyayirnirla. Milki-yirrarnurla Jesus-kiji nguru panu-jarlu warru-kirdi-kirdi manu nyiya-kanti-kanti ngurrju-nyayirni nguru yali-paturla.
Juju Wiri-jarlurla wangkajalku Jesus-kiji, <<Kajinpaju parntarrimi manu pulka-pinyi ngaju, kapirnangku yinyi nyampurra nyiya-kanti-kanti ngurrju nyuntu-kulku.>>

Jesus-rliji jangku-manu nyanunguju, <<Juju Wiri-jarlu, yantarra ngaju-kujaku!  Bible kanganpa wangka kuja nganimpa-kuju:  Yapa-julpa-lurla parntarriyarla manu pulka-pungkarlajinta nyanunguku-juku God-ku. Nganimparlulparnalurla warrki-jarriyarla jinta nyanunguku God-ku.>>

Yali-jangkarluju Juju Wiri-jarlurlu yampijalku Jesus-ji, manu pardijarralku.  Ngaka-karilki marra-marra-patu-lurla yanurnu Jesus-ki jina-mardarninjaku.
Jesus-rlu-jana yirri-puraja God-kurlangu yapaku Galilee-rla

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-rliji yimi purda-nyangu ngulalu yurrkunyu-paturlu John the Baptist yirrarnu rdakungka.  Ngula pina-yanu nguru Galilee-kirra.
Kirri-kirra Nazareth-kurra-wiyi yanu, kula yalirlaji karrija.  Jingi-jingi-yanurra kirri-kari-kirra yirdi-kirraji Capernaum-kurra karra-karra-juku mangkururla Galilee-rla. Yali kirri Capernaum ngulaju warlalja-palangu turnu-warnu-jarraku Zebulun-kurlangu manu Naphtali-kirlangu.
Nyampuju yangka-juku jaru ngula Isaiah-rlu nyurru-wiyi yirrarnu Bible-rla.  Nyanungurluju yirrarnu nyampu jaruju nguru-kurlu:
<<Nguru warlalja-palangu Zebulun-kurlangu manu Naphtali-kirlangu, parntarrimi-ka karru Jordan-ngurlu Mediterranean-kirra ngapa wiri-kirra.  Nyampu nguruju yirdi Galilee manu yalirlaji kalu nyina Jew-wangu-patu yapa-patu.
Nyampurra yapa nyina kalu mungangku-juku, God-ju kula kalu manngi-nyanyi.  Ngaka-pardu-karirlaju kapulu jarra wiri-jarlu nyanyi.  Ngurungka yalirla kuja kalu nyina ngulaji munga-nyayirnirla, kula-nganta rdaku-piyarla. Ngakaju, jarra mungalyurrurla kapu-jana jarra-jarrimilki.>>
Nyampuju jaru kuja Isaiah-rlu yirrarnu Bible-rla.

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-lpa warru-yanu nguru yalirla-juku wangkanja-karra yapa-kuju, <<Nguru-nyayirni-wanguju, yalkiri-ngirli kapu yanirnilki nyampu-kurra.  Ngula-warnu-kujakulu-nyanu jungarni-manta kamparruju nginyi-nginyiji manu pina-yantarnirla God-ku.>>
Jesus-jana purlaja ['yajarnu'?] murntu-pala wati-patuku

Ngaka-pardu-karirlalku Jesus-jilpa wapanja-yanu pirnti-pirntirla-juku mangkuru Galilee-rla, nyangu-palangu Simon Peter manu nyanunguku-purdangka kukurnu-nyanu Andrew kuja-pala mardungka nyinaja. Nyanungu-jarra-pala yawuku-ngarduyu-jarra. Yinga-nganta-pala yawu rdarri-mardakarlarra yakuju-piya-parntarlu.
Jesus-palangu wangkaja, <<Purayaju-pala!  Yangka kuja kalanpala yawu manu, ngula-piya-yijala kapunpala pinarri-mani yapa God-kuju.>> [change: 'I will teach you to gather people into God's Kingdom']
Junga-juku, yalirla-juku Simon-rlu manu Andrew-rlu, yampija-pala yakuju-piyaju, yali-jangkarluju Jesus-lki-pala puraja.

Jesus-lpa wapanja-yanu-juku pirnti-pirntirla mangkururla Galilee-rlaju.  Parrparda-karirlalku nyangu-palangu jirrama-karilki James manu nyanunguku-purdangka John kuja-pala mardungka nyinaja. Nyinajalpa-pala nyanungu-nyangu-parnta kirdana-kurlu yirdiji Zebedee, manu nyanungurlulpalu nimirnimir-manu yakuju-piya yinga-ngantalu yawu mantarla.  Jesus purlaja-palangu yinga-pala purami.
Junga-juku, yampija-pala mardu manu nyanungu-nyangu kirdana ngulalpa yalirla-juku mardungka nyinaja. Jesus-lki-pala puraja.
Jesus-rlu-jana yapa-patuku yirri-puraja manu parlpuru-manu-jana.

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-lpa warru-yanu nguru Galilee-wana.  Nyanungurlu yapalpa-jana jungarni-manu jaaji-kari jaaji-karirla Jew-kurlangurla, manu-jana Ngurrju Yimi yirri-puraja Nguru-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu kuja-ka kankarlarra nguna.  Ngulalpa-jana yapaju murru-murru nyangu, ngula-jilpa-jana parlpuru-manunjunu.
Nyiya-warnulpalu-jana yapaju murru-murru kanja-yanurnu?  Yimiji Jesus-kirli warru-yanu nguru wana.  Yapa-jilpalu murru-murru nyiya-kanti-kanti-kirli yanurnu. Yapa-kari-jilpalu murru-murru maju-nyayirni-kirli nyinaja. Yapa-kari-rlilpalu juju ngawu-ngawu palkangka kaninjarni mardarnu.  Yapa-karirlilpalu wantija [possibly epilepsy]. Yapa-kari-jilpalu rdalji-jarrija.  Kula nyiya-piya, Jesus-rlu-jana muku parlpuru-manu.
Yapangku panungku pirda-ngirli purajalu Jesus. Yanurnulu Galilee-ngirli Ten#Towns-ngurlu, Jerusalem-ngurlu, manu nguru-kari-ngirli kakarrara karru Jordan-ngurlu.  Mukulu yanurnu puranjaku Jesus-ki.
[Matthew 5  Warlpiri  1st draft  8-4-91  Swartz]
Yapa ngula kalurla jungarni-nyina God-ku, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.

Ngula-jana nyangu Jesus-rli yapa panu-jarlu yaninjarni-kirra nyanungu-kurra, ngulaju-jana yampija purda-ngirli.  Ngula-jangkaju warrkarnu pirli-kirralku, ngulangkaju nyinajalkulpa.  Ngula-jangkaju, nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yaninjarla wungulkulpa-lurla jirrnganja-nyinaja.
Ngulangkaju, Jesus-rli yungu-jana pinarri-manu nyiya-kanti-kantiki God-kurlanguku, kuja-jana wangka,

<<Ngajulurlu yungurna-nyarra yimi-ngarrirni yapa Wapirra-kurlangu kuja kajana wardinyi-maninjarla raa-pinyi.  Yapa Wapirra-kurlangu kajilpa pirlirrpa rampaku-nganta nyinakarla, kajilparla God-mipaku wala-nyinakarla, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyina pirlirrpa rampaku-nganta, God-kurlangu Nguru-nyayirni-wanguju-nyarra nyurrurlaku.

Yapa ngula kalu mari yulami, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyina, ngulaju God-rlu yungu-nyarra ngamirlji-mani ngurrju-karda.

Yapa ngula kalu nyina ngurrju kulu-marda-wangu mari-jarrinja-palka, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyina, ngulaju nyiya-kanti-kanti nyampurla ngurungka nyurrurla-nyangulku.

Yapangku ngula kalu-nyanu yarnunjuku purda-nyanyi manu purraku, ngulangkuju kalu-nyanu manngi-nyanyi kuyu-mipaku manu ngapa-mipaku.  Ngula-piyarluju kajinkili manngi-nyanyi God-mipa junga-nyayirnirli yungunkulurla nyina, ngulaju God-rlu yungu-nyarra wurdujarra-mani.

Yapa ngula kalu-jana mari-jarrimi yapa-kariki yangka kuja kalu nyinami murru-murru marda, marlajarra marda nyiya-kanti-kanti-wangu, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyina mari-jarrinja-palka, kapu-nyarra God mari-jarrimi nyurrurlarlanguku.

Yapa ngula kalurla God-mipaku yulka, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni. Ngula-piya kajinkili nyinami, yungunkulu God-ju nyanyi.

Yapangku ngula kalu-jana ngarlkirn-mani yapa-kari kulungka, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyinami ngarlkinpaju, God-rluju yungu-nyarra kurdu-kurdu nyanungu-nyangu pajirni.

Yapa ngula kalu nyina jungarni God-kurlangu, ngula-kuju kajilpalu-jana yapa-kari yaninjarla nyuru-nyuru-jarriyarla, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-piya kajinkili nyinami kunka-maninja-wangu, God-kurlangu Nguru-nyayirni-wanguju-nyarra nyurrurlaku.

Yuwayi, ngula kankulu jungarni-nyinami puranjaku-ngarduyu ngaju-nyangu, ngulaju yapangku panu-karirli kajikalu-nyarra marda yangka jikarr-pajirni.  Kajikalu-nyarra marda pakarni.  Warlkangku marda kajikalu-nyarra yimi-ngarrirni warru.  Ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni. [questioned by Jerry; 'it doesn't matter'] Nyinaya-jukulu ngurrju milirl-pardinja-wangu!
God-kurlangu jaruku-ngarduyu nyurru-wiyi kuja kala-lurla marlaja-wangkaja, ngularra-kuju kalalu-jana yapaju nyuru-nyuru-jarrija-yijala.  Ngula-piya-yijala kankulu nyurrurlaju nyina jalangu jaruku-ngarduyu-piya.  Ngaka-kari kajinkili nyina yangka Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla God-kurlangurla, ngulaju kapu-nyarra warntarri-nyayirni-wangu yinyi ngurrju-nyayirni.  Ngula-warnurlaju, wardinyili nyinaya nyuru-nyuru-puruju.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu nyina ngurrju kara-piya manu jarra-piya.

 Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyampurla ngurungka nyurrurla yungunkulu-jana nyinami kara-piya yapa-kariki yungulu nyinami jungarni nyurrurla-piya-yijala.  Ngula kanpa kuyu ngarni kara-kurlu, ngulaju ngurrju kanpa pajarni.  Kala kara walya-kurlu, ngulaju lawalku linpa-wangu.  Walya-kurralkulu kijikarra yungulu yapangku katirni kankarlumparrarnu.

Nyurrurlarluju yapangku kankulu jarra-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu mardarni kaninjarni.  Ngula-kurlurlu yungunkulu-jana milki-yirrarni God-ju yapa-kariki.  Nyurrurla-junkulu yuwarli-piya yangka kuja-ka jarra-kurlu parntarrinja-yani pirlingka kankarlarni, kulalpa nganangku palu-pungkarla.  Ngula-piya-yijala yungunkulu jarra-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu nyina jungarni tarnnga-juku yungulu-nyarra nyanyi panungku yapangku.
Ngula kalu yapangku warlu yarrpirni ngurrangka mungangka, kula kalurla nyiya-kanti-kantirli parnta-yirrarni.  Yirrarni kalu yarlungka yungulu nyanyi.
Ngula-piya-yijala jarra-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu nyinayalu ngurrju yungunkulu-jana God milki-yirrarni yapaku panuku. Wuruly-mardarninja-wangurlu milki-yirrakalu-jana mirirl-mirirl-karrinja-karrarlu.  Ngula-warnuju kajili-nyarra nyanyi jungarni-nyinanja-kurra, ngulaju kapulu-nyarrarla pulka-pinyi God-kulku ngula-ka nyinami Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu Moses-kurlangu kuruwarriki.

Wangkajalpa-jana kuja, <<Kulalu ramparl-manngi-nyangka Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri, jalanguju-ka karrimi yangka-juku wiri-nyayirni-juku nyurru-warnu ngularla God-rlu yungu Moses-ku.  Manu jaru ngula-jana God-rlu yungu jaruku-ngarduyu-patuku, jalanguju wiri-nyayirni-ka karrimi-juku tarnnga-juku.  Kularna yanurnu kuruwarriki manu jaruku jurnta-kijirninjaku, lawa.  Ngarirna yanurnu kuruwarriki pinarri-maninjaku yungunkulu jungarnirli God-kurlangu purami.
Ngajulu karna-nyarra yimi-ngarrirni junga-nyayirni Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri.  Ngaka-kari nguru nyampu manu yalkiri kapu-pala marra-pardi.  Ngula-wangurlaju kulalpa nganangku mirrikarla witarlangu kuruwarri Moses-kurlangu.  Kajirna warrki muku walku-mani nyampurla walyangka, ngulaju Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri kapu marra-pardimilki.
Ngulaju junga.  Nganangku-puka ngula-ka jawirri-purda-nyanyi witarlangu Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri puranja-wangurlu, jawirri-purda-nyanja-warnurlu kajilpa-jana yapa-patu-kariki pinarri-mantarla nyanungu-piyaku nyinanjaku, ngulaju maju.  Ngaka-kari God-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla ngulaju kula-jana wiri-nyina yapa-kariyi-nyanuku.  Nganangku-puka yapangku kaji purami Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri nurnangku, puranja-warnurlu kajilpa-jana yapa-patu-kariki jungangku pinarri-mantarla nyanungu-piyaku nyinanjaku, ngulaju ngurrju.  Ngaka-kari God-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla kapu-jana wiri-nyina yapa-kariyi-nyanuku.
Purda-nyangka-julu!  Jungarni-lirla nyinaya God-ku!  Kulalu kuruwarriki-ngarduyu-patu-piya manu Pharisee-patu-piya nyinaya ngula kalu jungarnirli-nganta kuruwarri purami Moses-kurlangu ngularla God-rlu yungu nyurru-wiyi.  Ngulaju kulalu junga.  Kajilpankulu rampal-yantarla nyanungurra-piya, ngulaju kulankulu yukamirra God-kurlangu-kurra Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurra.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu nyina kulu-wangu.

Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri ngula-jana pinarri-manu yapa nyurnu-nyurnu nyurru-wiyi.  Kuja-nganta-jana pinarri-manu:  <Nyinayalu ngurrju linjarrpa-wangu.> Kujarlangu-nganta-jana pinarri-manu:  <Jinta-karirli kajilpa pakakarla nyurnu-kurra yapa, ngulaju nyanungulku yungulu pakarni nyurnu-kurra.>
Kala jalanguju ngaju karna-nyarra pinarri-mani nyampu:  kajirla ngana-puka jinta-kariki kulu-jarri, ngulaju God-rlu ngarra nyarrpa-mani.  Kaji nganangku-puka maju-pajirni <Punkunpa!> jinta-kariji, kangkalu Jew-kurlangu-kurra kuwurtu-kurra Jerusalem-kurra.  Kaji nganangku-puka juyurdurlu-yunparni yardangku, ngulaju God-rlu yaliji yapa ngarra kijirni warlu wiri-kirra.>>

Kuja-rlangu-jana wangkaja Jesus-ji, <<Mardanparla jintaku yapaku rdujurnu, ngulaju nyuntu-kuju kangku kulu-juku nyina muntuku-nyayirni. Ngula-puruju kajinpa ngampurrpa-nyinami warntarri-nyayirni-wanguku purranjarla yinjaku God-ku maralypirlaku, ngulaku-ngarntirli yampiya warntarri-nyayirni-wangu maralypirla.
Ngula-jangkaju, pinarla yanta yungunpa yalala-yirrarni yungunparla nyinami ngurrjulku kuja-jarra kuja-jarra.  Ngula-jangkaju, pina-yanta maralypi-kirra warntarri-nyayirni-wangu yungunparla purranjarla yinyi God-ku.>>

Kujarlangu-jana wangkaja Jesus-ji, <<Mardanparla kulu-jarrija jinta-kariki yapaku nyiya-jangka marda.  Kalakangku kanyi marda kuwurtu-kurra, kajikangku yinyi kuwurtuku-ngarduyuku wiriki. Ngula-jangka kalakangku kuwurtuku-ngarduyurlu wiringki yinyi yurrkunyu-kurra, ngulangkuju kalakangku yirrarni rdaku-kurra. Ngula-kujakuju, yarujurla pina-yanta yangkaku ngulanpa kuluku-kuluku-manu yungunpa yalala-yirrarni yungunparla nyinami ngurrjulku kuja-jarra kuja-jarra.
Yalala-yirrarninja-wangurla, kalakangku kuwurtuku-ngarduyurlu wiringki jinyi-jinyi-mani talaku wiriki yinjaku yangkaku ngulanpa kuluku-kuluku-manu.  Kalakangku tala-wangurlaju rdaku-kurra kijirni. Tala-wangurlaju lawangka ngulaju marda kalakanpa tarnnga nyina rdakungka.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu nyinami ngurrju karnta-kari nyanja-wangu.

Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri.  Pinarri-manu-nganta-jana yungulu nyinami ngurrju karnta-kari-kirli ngunanja-wangu.>
Kala jalangu ngaju karna-nyarra pinarri-mani nyampu: Karnta-kari-kijaku waparlku-nyinaya lirlki-nyanja-wangu manu manngi-nyanja-wangu!  Kajilpanpa lirlki-nyangkarla manu marri-pungkarla, ngulaju kula-nganta kanpala palka nguna wungu nyumpala.
Kula kanpa-nyanu marda warla-pajirni lirlki-nyanja-kujaku karnta-kari-kijaku.  Ngulaju maju!  Ngula-kujakuju milpalku-nyanu rdungkaly-manta nyanja-kujaku!  Milpa jinta-kurlu kajikanpa ngurrju-juku nyinami nyampurla walyangka.  Kala milpa-jarra-kurlurlu kajilpanpa lirlki-nyangkarla-juku karnta-kari, ngulaju God-rlu kajikangku kijirni warlu wiri-kirra tarnnga-juku.
Manngi-nyanyi marda kanpa karnta yungunpa marda ngamirlji-mardarni rdaka-jarrarlu.  Ngulaju maju!  Ngula-kujakuju rdaka-nyanu muruly-pajika karnta-kujakuju kapi jurntangku kijika! Rdaka jinta-mipa-kurlu kajikanpa ngurrju-juku nyinami nyampurla walyangka.  Kala rdaka-jarra-kurlurlu kajilpanpa ngamirlji-mardakarla karnta-kari, ngulaju God-rlu kajikangku kijirni warlu wiri-kirra.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu-jana mardarni kali-nyanu warlalja yilyanja-wangurlu.

Kujarlangu-jana wangkaja Jesus-ji, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi kuruwarri Moses-kurlangu.  Pinarri-manu-nganta-jana nyampu: <Kaji watingki jintangku yilyamirra kali-nyanu nyanungu-nyangu, ngulaku-ngarntirli pipa-nganta yungurla yinyi ngulaju kapu-pala-nyanu tarnnga-juku yampimilki.  Pipa yinja-wangurlaju ngulaju kulalpa yilyayarla.>  Kujanya-nganta-jana wangkaja Moses-ju.
Kala jalangu ngaju karna-nyarra wangkami nyampu:  Kali-nyanu kali-nyanu ngula kalu ngurrju nyina kalykuru-wangu, mardakalu-jana ngurrju-juku yilyanja-wangurlu!  Kajilpanpa yilyayarla yangka kalykuru-wangu, ngulaju maju.  Jinyi-jinyi-mani kanpa yungu wati-kari-kirra yani.  Nganangku-puka watingki kaji kanyi karnta yali, ngulanpa yilyaja, ngulaju maju-yijala.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu nyinami ngurrju yimirr-yinja-wangu.

Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi kuruwarri Moses-kurlangu kuja-jana pinarri-manu nyurru-wiyi. Pinarri-manu-nganta-jana nyampu:  <Kuja kanpa-jana wardinyi-mani yapaku yungunpa-jana-nganta yinyi, rdilyki-pinja-wangurlu-jana yungka yimirr-yinja-wangurlu.  Manu kuja kanpa wardinyi-mani God-ku yungunparla-nganta yinyi, rdilyki-pinja-wangurlurla yungka manu yimirr-yinja-wangurlu.> Kujanya-nganta-jana wangkaja Moses-ju.
Kala jalangu ngaju karna-nyarra wangkami nyampu:  kuja kanpa wardinyi-mani yapa-kari yungunparla-nganta yinyi, yungkarla wurulyparlu Wapirra yirdi-maninja-wangurlu.  Manu yinjaku-ngarntirli  Nguru-nyayirni-wangu yampiya yirdi-maninja-wangurlu.  Ngulangkaju-ka God nyinami.
Manu yinjaku-ngarntirli nguru nyampu yampiya yirdi-maninja-wangurlu.  Nguruju nyampuju God-kurlangu.  Manu yinjaku-ngarntirli Jerusalem yampiya yirdi-maninja-wangurlu.  Ngulaju kirri Jerusalem God-kurlangu Warlaljamarri Wiri-kirlangu.
Manu yinjaku-ngarntirli marnilpa yampiya nyuntu-nyangu yirdi-maninja-wangurlu.  Marnilpa maru kulalpanpa kurruly-yirrakarla layi-layi-kirra.  Manu marnilpa layi-layi kulalpanpa kurruly-yirrakarla maru-kurra.
Kajinparla ngungkurr-nyina jintaku yapaku, ngula-jurla wangkaya <yuwayi>.  Kajinparla ngungkurr-nyinanja-wangu nyinami, ngula-jurla wangkaya <lawa>.  Junga-jukulu-nyanu warrarda wangkaya jungarni nyiya-kanti-kanti yirdi-maninja-wangu.  Kajinkili-jana wardinyi-mani yapa-kari nyiya-kanti-kanti yirdi-maninja-karrarlu yungunkulu-jana-nganta yinyi, ngulaju maju.  Juju Wiri-jarlu ngula-piyaju-ka wangka yimirr-yinja-palka.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu nyinami ngurrju, pina kunka-maninja-wangu.

Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri.  Pinarri-manu-nganta-jana nyampu: <Nganangku-puka kajingki yapangku milpa rdirr-pakarni, nyanungulku rdirr-pakaka milpa-yijala!  Nganangku kajingki kartirdi rdilyki-pakarni, nyanungulku ngula-piya-yijala rdilyki-pakaka!> Ngulaju-nganta Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri.
Kala jalangu ngaju karna-nyarra wangkami nyampu:  Pina kunka-maninja-wangulu nyinaya!
