Kala nganangku-puka kajingki manyungku jikarr-pajirni, ngula-jangkarlu kajilpangku kujarlu rdakangku pakakarla lalypangku nyampu yangka wirlki jungarni-purdanji, ngulaju yampiya pina-pakarninja-wangurlu.  Yungkarla jampu-purdanjilki yungungku pakarni wirlki.
Nganangku-puka kajingki kuwurtu-kurra kanyi jaatiki puntarninjaku, ngula-jurla yungka manu wawardarlangu.
Kajingki warrmarlarlu jinyi-jinyi-mani jurnarrpaku kanjaku kutuku, ngula-jurla kangka parrparda wurnturu-nyayirni.
Nganangku-puka kajingki payirni nyiyaku, ngula-jurla yungka wilji-wangurlu.  Wurra-maninja-wangurlu kuturla yungkarla, kapungku pina-kanjarla yinyi.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungulu-jana yulkami panuku yapaku kula warlalja-mipaku yulkanjaku.

Wangkaja-jana kuja, <<Nyurrurlarlu kankulu milya-pinyi Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri.  Pinarri-manu-nganta-jana nyampu: <Yulkayalu-jana warlalja-mipaku.  Yapa-kari ngula kalu-nyarra nyuru-nyuru-jarri, ngula-piya-yijalalu-jana nyuru-nyuru-jarriya.> Kuja-nganta-jana wangkaja Moses.
Kala jalangu ngaju karna-nyarra wangkami kuja:  Ngana-puka kajingki nyuru-nyuru-jarri, kula waparlkurla yulkaya.  Nganangku-puka kajingki yapangku pakarni, ngulaku-jurlajinta Wapirraku wangkaya.
Kajinkili-jana yulkami yapaku ngula-piya, ngula-jangka God-rlu kapu-nyarra kurdu-kurdu-pajirni nyanungu-nyangu yangka ngula-ka nyina Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.  Wanta ngula karla marlaja-pardimirni, ngula-ka yilyamirni Wapirrarlu, kula ngurrju-mipaku yapaku, panuku-juku maju-majurlanguku.  Ngapa kuja-ka yilyamirni Wapirrarlu, ngulaju ngalipaku jintawarlayiki, kula ngalipa-mipaku yangka kuja karliparla jungarni-nyina, panu-karirlanguku yangka kuja kalurla jurnta-nyinami kuja-purda-kari.
Kajinkili-jana yulkami yapa-kariki ngula kalu-nyarra nyurrurla-mipaku yulkami, ngulaju marda ngula-juku.  God-rlu kula-nyarra ngurrju-pajirni ngula-kuju.  Ngula-piya-yijala kalu-jana yulkami yangka warrkirni-patu maniyi puntarninjaku-ngarduyu-patu. Kulalu-jana walaparrika!  Kajili-nyarra yapa-kari nyuru-nyuru-jarri, ngulaju kutulu-jana yulkaya pina, maniyi puntarninjaku-ngarduyu-piya-wangu.
Kajinkili-jana wangkami nyurrurla-nyangu-mipaku puntuku, ngula-junkulu panu-kari-piya ngula kalu God milya-pinja-wangu nyina waparlku.  Ngularrarlangu kalu-nyanu yulkami warlalja-mipa.  Kala nyurrurla ngula-piya-wangu yungunkulu-jana yulkami nyuru-nyuru-pururlanguju kajili-nyarra nyuru-nyuru-jarri.
Yuwayi, jungarnili nyinaya Wapirra God-piya ngula-ka nyinami Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.  Kutulu-jana yulkaya panuku yapaku ngula-piya God-piya.

[MAT  Matthew 6  Warlpiri  Swartz]
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu-jana yuuly-pinjarla yinyi yapaku marlajarra-watiki.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Ngula kankulu-jana yuuly-pinjarla yinyi, ngula-julu-jana yuuly-pungka parlangka.  Kulalu kulkurru-jarra milkarraku karriya yuuly-pinja-karra.  Kajinkili karrimi kulkurru-jarra yuuly-pinjarla, ngulaju Wapirrarlu kula-nyarra ngurrju-pajirni.
Kajinkili-jana yinyi maniyi marlajarra-watiki yapaku, yungkalu-jana parlangka yapa-kari-kijaku nyanja-kujaku.  Kulalu yangka kankarlu-kanunju-piya nyinaka.  Ngula kalu-jana yinyi maniyi marlajarra-watiki Jew-kurlangurla jaajirla manu yirdiyi-wana, ngulaju purlanja-karrarlu yungulu-jana yapa-karirli nyanyi yuuly-pinja-kurra jama ngurrju-nganta.  Pangkalalu-jana ngurrju-pajirni.  Junga karna-nyarra wangka:  God-rluju kulalpa-jana witarlanguju yarda yungkarla kuja kalu-jana milkarraku yuuly-pinyi, lawa!
Kulalu kankarlu-kanunju-piya nyinaka nyanungurra-piya! Kajinkili-jana yinyi nyiya-puka marlajarra-watiki yapaku, yungkalu-jana parlangkaju, ngulaju yapa-kari-kijaku nyanja-kujaku.
Kajinkili-jana yinyi yapaku marlajarra-watiki parlangkaju, Wapirra-miparlu kanyarra nyanyi ngula-ka nyina Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.  Ngula-warnuju yungu-nyarra ngurrju-pajirni.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu nyanungu-nyangu God-ku wangkanjaku.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kajinkilirla God-ku wangka, wangkaya-lurla jungarni-nyayirni milkarra-wangu yalirra-piya-wangu yangka kuja kalurla jungarni-nganta wangkami God-kuju.  Warrarda kalu karrimi kulkurrurni milkarraku Jew-kurlangurla jaajirla God-ku wangkanjaku, manu kalu karrimi yirdiyi-wana milparni-warrarla yapangka panungka ngula yungulu-jana yapa-karirli nyanyi ngula kalurla God-ku wangkami.  Kujaju maju-maju!  Junga karna-nyarra wangka:  God-rluju kulalpa-jana witarlanguju yarda yungkarla kaji-lirla kuja wangka God-kuju, lawa!
Kala kajinparla wangka Wapirraku, ngulaku-ngarntiji yuwarli-kirra-wiyi wurulypa-yukaya yungunparla yangarlu wangkami panu-wangurla.  Ngula-jangkaju, Wapirra-kurla wangkaya yangka ngula-ka Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla nyina.  Ngulaju kapungku nyanyi wuruly-wangkanja-kurra ngula kanparla wangkami, manu kajikangku yinyi nyiyaku ngula kanpa payirni.>>

<<Manu kajinkilirla wangkami God-ku, wangkaya-lurla yalirra-piya-wangu yangka ngula kalu ngurrpa-juku nyina God-kuju.  Ngula kalurla wangkami God-ku, ngulaju kalurla yarda-patu-patu wangkami warungka-piya.  Purda-nyanyi-nganta kajana God-rlu yangka kuja kalurla warrarda wangka tarnnga.  Kujaju yijardu-wangu!
Yalirra-piya-wangulu nyinaya!  God-rluju nyurru-juku-ka milya-pinyi nyiya-kanti-kanti nyurrurla-nyangu payirninja-wangurla-wiyi.>>

<<Junga-juku, kuja-nyalurla wangkaya God-kuju,
<Wapirra, nganimpaku-palangu kuja kanpa nyuntu Tarruku nyina ngurrararla nyuntu-nyangurla: nyuntu-nyangu yirdi yungurnangkulu yirri-yirrirli yirdi-mani, manurnangkulu pulka-pinyi jintawarlayirli-juku.

Nyuntu karnangkulu payirni, Warlaljamarri Wiri, yungunpa-nganpa Wiri nyina jintawarlayiki-juku manu nyiyarningkijarraku.  Ngurrara nyuntu-nyangurla, yangka kuja kangkulu warrarda ngungkurr-nyina wilji-wangu, ngula-piya-yijala yungulparnangkulu purda-nyanjarla ngungkurr-nyinayarla nyarrpa kajinpa-nganpa nyuntu wangka.

Wapirra, payirni karnangkulu, <Miyi-nganpa jalanguku yungka nganimpaku yungurnangkulu marlaja-ngarni.>

Wapirra, nganimpa yungurnalu-jana yawuru-jarri yapa-karirlanguku, ngula-piya-yijala nganimparlanguku-nganpa yawuru-jarriya wilji-jangkaku.

Wapirra, mardaka-nganpa muurlparlu Juju-kujaku Wiri-jarlu-kujaku, kalaka-nganpa yimirr-yinjarla karlirr-kanyi.>>


<<Junga kujaju!  Kajilpankulu-jana yawuru-jarriyarla yapa-karirlanguku nyiya-rlanguku maju-wana-wanaku, ngulaju kajika-nyarra God-ju yawuru-jarrimi-yijala nyurrurla-kuju wilji-jangka-kuju.
Kala kajilpankulu-jana jurnta-nyinakarla yawuru-jarrinja-wangu, ngulaju kula-nyarra God-ju yawuru-jarrimi-yijala.>> 
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu nyinami miyi ngarninja-wangu God-kurlanguku-ngarnti purlapaku-ngarnti.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kajinkili nyina miyi ngarninja-wangu purlapaku-ngarnti God-kurlanguku-ngarnti, kulalu yangka kankarlu-kanunju nyinaka.  Ngula kalu nyanungu nyina ngarninja-wangu purlapaku-ngarnti miyi-wangu, ngulaju kalu-nyanu maparni punangku yinngirri yungulu-jana yapa-karirli nyanjarla ngurrju-pajirni miyi ngarninja-wangu.  Pangkalalu-jana ngurrju-pajirni.  Kala Wapirrarlu kula-jana ngurrju-pajirni milkarra-jangkaju.
Kulalu kankarlu-kanunju-piya nyinaka nyanungurra-piya!  Ngula kankulu miyi ngarninja-wangu nyinami God-kurlanguku-ngarnti purlapaku-ngarnti, kulalu-nyanu punangku mapaka yinngirriji.  Parljikalu-nyanu ngapangku, ngula-warnurlu jarangkulu-nyanu mapaka marnilpa.
Puna-wangurlaju kulalpalu-nyarra yapa-karirli milya-pungkarla ngula kankulu miyi ngarninja-wangu nyina.  Kala Wapirra God ngula-ka nyina Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, nyanungu-miparluju kanyarra nyanyi miyi ngarninja-wangu.  Ngula-warnuju yungu-nyarra ngurrju-pajirni.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu maniyiki manu nyiya-kanti-kantiki jurnarrpaku nyampurla walyangkaku.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Ngirnirna-wangulu nyinaka!  Kulalu warru turnu-maninjarla rdanjarr-mardaka jurnarrpa nyampurla ngurungka.  Ngula-jangkaju, mulururlu kajika ngarni, manu kajika ngalkarr-ngalkarrpa-jarri nyiya-kanti-kantiji.  Ngula-jangkaju, purunjurlu kajika-nyarra jurnta-kanyi jurnarrpa.
Ngula-kujaku-julu-jana yuuly-pinjarla yungka yapa-karirlanguku.  Ngula-warnuju God-rlu yungu-nyarra rdanjarr-mardarni Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.  Ngulangkaju Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla kulalpalu mulururluju nganjarla.  Manu kulalpa ngalkarr-ngalkarrpa-jarriyarla.  Manu kulalpa purunjurlu yapangku mantarla.
Nyarrpararlankulu rdanjarr-mardarni nyiya-kanti-kantiji jurnarrpa?  Nyampurla ngurungka?  Marda Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla God-kurlangurla?  Kajinkili rdanjarr-mardarni jurnarrpa Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, ngulaju kankulu manngi-nyanyi tarnnga yali nguru.  Kala kajinkili ngirnirnarlu rdanjarr-mardarni nyampurla ngurungka, ngulaju kankulu manngi-nyanyi nguru nyampu-mipa.  Ngulaju maju!>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu God-kurlanguku Rdili-nyayirni-wanguku.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Ngalipa-nyangu milpa, ngulaju Rdili-nyayirni-wangu-piya ngula-ngalpa God-rlu yungu ngalipaku.  Kajinkili-jana jamangku yuuly-pinjarla yinyi yapaku jurnarrpa, ngulaju kankulu nyinami Rdili-nyayirni-wangurla God-kurlangurla.  
Kala kajinkili-jana ngirnirnarlu jurnta-mardarni yinja-wangurlu yapa-kari-kijaku, ngulaju maju.  Kula kankulu nyinami yalumpu Rdili-nyayirni-wangurla God-kurlangurla.  Kula-nganta kajikankulu pamparda nyinami nyanja-wangu nguru-wangu.

Kulalpankulu-jana jirramaku warrki-jarriyarla kuja-purda kuja-purda, walku!  Kajinkilirla jinta-kariki puntu yukami, ngulaju yali jinta-kariji yungunkulu wurra-mani.  Kajinkilirla yangkaku kamparru-warnuku ngungkurr-nyinami, ngulaju yali jinta-kari-kiji yungunkulurla ngungkurr-nyinanja-wangu nyinami.  Ngula-piyaju, yangka kuja kankulu maniyi-mipa manu jurnarrpa-mipa manngi-nyanyi, ngulaju nyurrurlaju kula kankulurla God-ku warrki-jarri jungarni, walku.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu nyinami ngampa-nyanja-wangu nyiya-kanti-kantiki.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kajinkilirla God-ku warrki-jarri, ngulangkuju yungu-nyarra muurlparlu wurdujarra-mani.  Nyurrurla kankulurla God-mipaku warlalja nyinami nyanunguku-juku.  Kula-nyarra waja-waja-maninjarla kijirni.  Kapu-nyarra kutu wurdajarra-mani.  Kujarlaju, yungunkulu ngampa-nyanja-wangu nyinami miyiki ngarninjaku manu wawardaku yukanja-wangu.  [changed from yukanjaku]
Nyangkalu-jana jurlpu kuja kalu warru-parnka ngurungka.  Milpa kula kalu yirrarni walyangka jurlpungkuju miyi wiri-maninjaku, walku.  Kula kalu warru turnu-maninjarla kanyirni ngurra-kurra ngaka-kariki ngarninjaku, walku.  Wapirra ngula-ka nyinami Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, ngulangkuju ngari kajana wurdujarra-mani kuja-kurra-juku, kula kalu payirni.  Kala nyurrurla-kuju, God-rlu kanyarra kururr-mani jurlpu-piya-wanguku yapa-kuju.  Ngula-warnuju, ngampa-nyanja-wangulu nyinaka miyi-kiji.
Kajinkili miyiki-juku ngampa-nyanyi, ngulangkuju kula-nyarra wankaru-mani ngari jintaku parraku.  Kala God-miparlu kanyarra wankaru-yinyi yungunkulu nyinami tarnngaju.>>

Wawardaku ngampa-nyanja-wangulu nyinaka!  Nyangkalu-jana jinjirla-wati.  Nganangku kajana warra-warra-kanjarla wiri-mani?  Kula kalu warrki-jarri yapa-piya, walku.  Manu kula kalu-nyanu wawarda ngurrju-mani.  Ngula-puruju ngurrju-juku kalu nyina.
Ngaju karna-nyarra junga wangkami:  Yangka wati King#Solomon ngulalpa nyurru-wiyi nyinaja tala-kurlu panu-jarlu-kurlu manu wawarda-kurlu ngurrju-nyayirni-kirli, nyanungu-nyangu wawarda kulalpa ngurrju-nyayirni nyinaja jinjirla-piya, walku.

God-rlu kajana warra-warra-kanjarla wiri-mani jinjirla-wati ngurrju-nyayirni kujaju.  Manu marna kajana wiri-mani kirrirdi-nyayirni.  Ngulaju kula kalu tarnnga-nyayirni nyinami, walku.  Wita-mipaku kalu nyinami.  Ngula-jangkaju, linji-jarri kalu.  Ngula-jangkaju, yapangku kalu-jana kijirni warlu-kurra.  Nyiya-jangka kankulurla Wapirraku kapuru-nyina?  Marda kankulu manngi-nyanyi kula kanyarra wawarda yinyi yukanjaku, kajika-nyarra jurnta-mardarni? Ngulaju junga-wangu!  Yungu-nyarra warra-warra-kanyi jinjirla-wati-piya, ngula-piya. [Jerry questioned this]
Ngampa-nyanja-wangulu nyinaya!  Payirninja-wangulu nyinaya: <Nyiyarlipa ngarni miyi kapi ngapa, manu nyarrpararlarlipa mani wawardaju mani yukanja-kuju?>> Kuja wangkanja-wangulu nyinaya!>
Yapa ngula kalu pina-wangu nyinami Wapirraku, ngulaju kujarnawu kalu wangkami ngampa-nyanja-karra.  Warrarda  kalu ngampa-nyanyi miyiki manu jurnarrpaku yungulu mardarni.  Kulalu yalirra-piya nyinaya!  Wapirra, ngula-ka nyinami Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, ngulangkuju kanyarra manngi-nyanyi ngula kankulu marda nyina miyi-wangu manu wawarda-wangu.
Nyampu-nyalu manngi-nyangka manu warrarda wangkaya: <Nyiyarlanguku ngula kangalpa Wapirra wangkami ngurrjuku nyinanjaku, purda-nyanyirlipa kapi ngurrjurliparla nyinami!>  Kajinkili manngi-nyanyi jungarnirli ngula-piya, ngulaju Wapirrarlu kapu-nyarra wurdujarra-mani miyiki kapi ngapaku kapi wawarda-kurlangu.
Yuwayi, Wapirrarlu kapu-nyarra wurdujarra-mani parra-kari parra-kari.  Kulalu manngi-nyanjarla ngampa-nyangka kujarlu, <Jukurra marda kajika-ngalpa nyiyarlangu maju-nyayirni rdipimi.>  Kuja-wangulu nyinaya wangkanja-wangu.   Jalangu marda, jukurra marda kajika-nyarra nyiyarlangu yangka maju-nyayirni rdipimirni nyurrurlaku, ngulaju kapu-nyarra Wapirrarlu warra-warra-kanyi-juku ngula-puruju.  


[MAT  Matthew 7  Warlpiri  Swartz  Australia]

Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu nyinami ngurrju yapa-kariki maju-pajirninja-wangu.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kuja kankulu maju nyinami ngurrju-nganta, kulalu-jana maju-pajika yapa-kari.
Kajinkili-jana warrarda maju-pajirni, ngulaju Wapirrarlu kapu-nyarra maju-pajirni-yijala.  Kala kajinkili-jana yawuru-jarrimi, ngulaju ngurrju.  Kapu-nyarra Wapirraju yawuru-jarrimi-yijala.>>

-4 <<Kajinpa-jana warrarda maju-pajirni yapa-kari ngurrjungku-nganta, ngulaju kanpa nyinami milkari.  Ngula kanpa mardarni watiya wiri milpangka nyuntu-nyangurla nyanungu-patu-piya ngula kalu watiya wita-nganta mardarni milpangka-yijala-nganta.  Watiya wiri milpangka-kurlu, kuja wangkanja-wangurlulu-jana yampiya:  <Watiya witarna wilypi-mani milpa nyuntu-nyangu-ngurlu.>  Kuja wangkanja-wangu nyinaya!
Nyuntu-junpa kankarlu-kanunju! Wilypi-maninjaku-ngarntiji, wilypi-manta-nyanu rdalyku wiri milpangka nyuntu-nyangu-ngurlu.  Ngula-jangkaju, ngurrjungkulku kanpa-jana nyanyi watiya wita milpangka nyanungurra-nyangurlaju.>>

<<Yimi Ngurrju Wapirra-kurlangu, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni kawurlu-piya.  Kajili yapangku jawirri-purda-nyanyi yirri-puranja-kurra, ngula-julu-jana yampiya warrarda yirri-puranja-wangurlu.  Yalumpu-patu ngula-julu maju-nyayirni maliki-piya wijini panu-kurlu manu nguurr-nguurrpa-piya palya, ngula-piya.  Kajinkili-jana warrarda yirri-pura Yimi Ngurrju, ngulaju kulalu nginyi-nginyi-kirra-mani, kajikalu walya-kurra kijirni katirninjaku nguurr-nguurrpa-piyaku, manu kajikalu-nyarra wajirli-pinjarla pinyi.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu payirni Wapirra nyiya-kanti-kantiki.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kajinkilirla Wapirraku wangkami, warrarda payikalu nyiya-kanti-kantiki, kapu-nyarra yinyi.  Warrarda wapal-nyangka-lurla, kapu-nyanu milki-yirrarni nyurrurla-kurra.  Warrarda tarlarlkarra-pakaka-lurla, kapu-nyarra lakarn-mani tuwa yungunkulu yukamirra.
Yuwayi, nganangku-puka kaji warrarda payirni nyiya-kanti-kantiki, ngulaju kapurla marlaja-mani.  Manu nganangku-puka kajirla warrarda wapal-nyanyi, ngulaju kapu palka-mani.  Manu nganangku-puka kajirla warrarda tarlarlkarra-pakarni, kapurla tuwaju marlaja lakarn-mani Wapirra-kurlangu-kurra yungu yukamirra.>>

<<Nyarrpa-jarrinpa kajingki nyuntu-nyangurlu ngalapi-nyanurlu payirninja-yanirni miyi-kiji ngarninjaku? Pulu mayi yungunparla yinyi?
Nyarrpa-jarrinpa kajingki payirninjinirni yawuku ngarninjaku?  Yinyi mayinparla warna kulu-parnta?  Walku! Yungunparla kantirri ngurrju manu yawu yinyi ngarninjaku.
Nyurrurlankulu maju, ngula-puruju yinyi-juku kankulu-jana kurdu-kurduku nyurrurla-nyanguku yarnunjuku ngarninjaku.  Wapirra, ngula-ka Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla nyinami, ngulaju ngurrju-nyayirni nyurrurla-piya-wangu.  Yinyi-jiki kanyarra nyiya-kanti-kanti ngurrju ngula kankulu payirni.>>

<<Nyiya-wiyi jinta kuruwarri Moses-kurlangu kuja-nyarra yirrarnu nyurrurlaku yapaku?  Manu nyiya-wiyi kuruwarri jinta-juku kujalu-nyarra jaruku-ngarduyu-paturlu Wapirra-kurlangu-paturlu yirri-puraja?  Ngulaju nyampunya: <Kajinpa-jana yapa-kariki ngampurrpa-nyina nyuntuku ngurrjuku nyinanjaku, nyuntu-wiyi-jana ngurrju nyinaya!> >>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yirdiyi-jarraku jirramaku.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Wuurnpa-wana wita-wana tuwa-wanaju  [unchecked change] jungarni-jikili yaninja-yanta Wapirra-kurlangu-kurra Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurra.  Karlirr-yaninja-wangurlu yampiyalu wantikiji tuwaji manu yirdiyi wantiki-yijala kuja-ka ngunamirra kuja-purda-kari.  Yirdiyi yalumpu ngulaju wantiki-nyayirni yaninjaku.  Panu kalu yanirra wiri-wana kuja kalu yangka yanirra, ngulaju tarnnga-juku palinjaku-ngarnti.
Kuja-kujakuju, yaninja-yanta-jukulu yirdiyirla wuurnparla ngula-ka ngunamirra Wapirra-kurlangu-kurra Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurra.  Ngulangka ngurungka kalu nyinami wankaru-juku tarnnga-nyayirni.  Tuwaju  [unchecked change] ngula-ka karrimi Wapirra-kurlanguju, ngulaju wuurnpa-nyayirni.  Manu yirdiyi ngula-ka ngunamirra, ngulaju wuurnpa-nyayirni yapaku yaninjaku.  Wuurnparlaju wirrkardu-mipa kalu yani tarnngaju nyinanjaku.>>
Jesus-rli-jana pinarri-manu yungulu-nyanu muurlparlu warra-warra-kanyi yimirr-yinja-palka-kujaku ngula kalu-nyanu ngarrirni Wapirra-kurlangu-nganta.

Wangkaja-jana, <<Muurlparlulu-nyanu warra-warra-kangka yimirr-yinja-palka-kujaku ngula kalu-nyanu ngarrirni Wapirra-kurlangu-nganta jaruku-ngarduyu-nganta.  Kuja kajinkili-jana purda-nyanyi jaru wangkanja-kurra, ngulaju-nganta yungunkulu-jana-nganta ngurrju-pajirni ngurrju-nganta pululu-nganta jiyipi-piya.  Walkungka!  Kari-nganta kulu-parnta-nyayirni pinja-panu maliki warnapari-piya.
Nyarrparlu yungunkulu-jana mii-mii-nyanjarla milya-pinyi yimirr-yinja-palka kajili yani-yanirni Wapirra-kurlangu-nganta?  Kajili yanirni ngulaju maju-maju kalu kanyirni, ngula-jangkaju yungunkulu-jana milya-pinyilki.  Kajilpa ngana-puka Wapirra-kurlangu nyinayarla jungarni, ngulangkuju ngurrju-mipa kajika kanyirni, kuja maju.  Kulanpa mani marnikiji jiri-parnta-ngurlu watiya-ngurlu, walku.  Kulanpa mani marrkirdi putunarri-ngirli, walku.  Ngula-piya-yijala kuruwarri Wapirra-kurlangu kulalu yimirr-yinja-palkarlu jungarnirli yirri-pura.
-18 Watiyarlu pirrjirdirli ngulaju ngurrju miyi-ka mardarni.  Watiyarlu rampakurlu ngulaju miyiji maju-nyayirni-ka mardarni.  Yangka-patu yimirr-yinja-palka ngula-julu maju-nyayirni watiya rampaku-piya maju-kurlu-piya.
Yangka rampakurla watiyarla kaji miyi maju pardimi, ngulaju karlipa watiya yawirr-pajirni, ngulaju kijirni karlipa warlu-kurra wiri-kirra.
Kajili yangka yanirni yimirr-yinja-palka, kajili maju yangka kanyirni jaru, ngula kankulu-jana milya-pinyi kula-jana Wapirrarlu yilyajarni.
Jesus kapi-jana wangkami panu-kariki yapaku <<Kula karna-nyarra milya-pinyi>>

Ngula-jangkaji, Jesus-jana wangkaja yapaku, <<Ngaka-kari kajirna nyinami ngaju-pala-kurlangurla Wapirra-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, ngula-jangkaji kularna-jana panu-jarlu mardarni yapaju.  yapa ngula kalu jalangu nyina ngurungka nyampurla manu ngula kalurla warrarda purda-nyanjarla ngungkurr-nyinami ngaju-nyangu Wapirraku, ngularra-mipa yingarna-jana rdakurl-kijirni.  Panu-jarlurlu yapangku ngarra-jili Wiri-nyayirni-pajirni.  Yapa-kariji ngarrarna-jana wurra-maninjarla yilyamirra.
Yuwayi, ngulangka Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla God-rlu yinga-jana mii-mii-nyanyi yapaju kuwutuku-ngarduyu-piyarlu nyanungu-nyangu japa, [unchecked change]marda walku.  Panu-karirli yapangku ngarra-jili kuja wangka, <Warlaljamarri Wiri, nyuntu-junpa-nganpa Warlaljamarri Wiri-nyayirni.  Yapa-kurnalu-jana yimi-ngarrurnu-jaru nyuntu-nyangu ngula-piyarlu jaruku-ngarduyurlu ngula kala-lurla God-ku marlaja-wangkaja.  Nganimparlurnalu-jana juju ngawu-ngawu yapa-ngurlu jurnta-yilyaja, manurnalu-jana parlpuru-manu nyurnu-jangka nyuntu-nyangurlu yirdi-nyayirni-wangurlu.> Ngarra-jili wangka kujanya.
Kala kuja ngarrarna-jana wangkami nyanunguku yapaku, <Yapa nyurrurla kulankulurla ngaju-nyangu Wapirraku God-ku.  Ngajuju, kula karna-nyarra milya-pinyi.  Yantalu nyampu-ngurluju ngula kankulu jungarni-wangu nyina.>>
Jesus-rli-jana yirri-puraja yapaku yimi-nyayirni-wangu jirrama wati-jarra-kurlu, jintaju pinangkalpa, jinta-kariji jiliwirri

Wangkaja-jana, <<Kajinkijili wangkanja-kurra purda-nyanyi manu ngungkurr-nyina, ngula-jinkili pinangkalpa-piya nyiya-kanti-kantiki.  Yungurna-nyarra yimi-ngarrirni wati nyampu pinangkalpa, nyanungurlu-nyanu nganturnu yuwarli kankarlarra-nyayirni pirlingka.
Ngaka-karirlaju, ngapa wantija pirrjirdi-nyayirni, ngawarralkulpa wiri-nyayirni parnkaja, mayawunparlu putalpa yurnku-yurnku-mani yuwarliji, manu kula wantija.  Pirrjirdi-jukulpa karrija pirlingkaju.
-27 Yalirlarlangu watilpa jinta nyinaja milya-pinja-wangu jiliwirri, ngulangku-nyangu nganturnu yuwarli walyirirla walyangka pirnti-pirntirla yulpayirla.  Ngula ngapalku wantija pirrjirdi-nyayirni, manu ngawarralkulpa parnkaja, ngula-puru-julpa mayawunpalku parnkaja.  Yuwarliji wurrmurr-wantija.  Kajinkijili jawirri-purda-nyanyi wangkanja-kurra, ngula-warnuju kajinkijili jaru marlaja-yampimi puranja-wangurlu, ngula-jinkili ngula-piya wati-piya ngula nganturnu yuwarli walyangka walyirirla.>>

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-ji wurdungu-jarrijalku.  yapaji-lirla marlaja paa-karrija nyanungu-nyanguku jaru-kuju.
Kula-jana pinarri-manu nyanungu-nyangu-piyarlu kuruwarriki-ngarduyu ngulaji kalu-nyanu nyanungurlu-mipa jama-yirrarni, walku.  Ngula kala-jana Jesus-rli pinarri-manu yapa, ngula-jilpa milya-pungu-nyayirni ngularra kuruwarri ngularla God-rlu yirri-puraja nyarrpa kaji wangka.


[MAT  Matthew 10  Warlpiri  Steve Swartz  Australia]
Nyampu-patu-julu Jesus-kirlangu yimi-kirli-patu.

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyanguku 12-pala puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku, <<Yantarnili nyampu-kurra.>>  Kuja-lurla yanurnu nyanunguku, wangkajalku-jana, <<Ngajulurlu karna-nyarra yinyi yartarnarri yingankulu-jana yapa-ngurlu jurnta-wilypi-maninjarla yilyamirra juju  Ngula-kurlu yartarnarri-kirli, nyurrurlarlu yingankulu-jana parlpuru-mani nyiya-kanti-kanti murru-murru-ngurlu.
-4 Nyampurraju yirdiji Jesus-kirlangu 12-pala Yimi-kirli-patu-kurlangu:  Simon (ngulaku-jurla yirdi-karilki yirrarnu <Peter>); Simon-ku-purdangka kukurnu-nyanu Andrew; James manu nyanunguku-purdangka kukurnu-nyanu John (Nyampu-jarraju-pala ngalapi-nyanu-jarra Zebedee-kirlangu); Philip manu Bartholomew; Thomas manu Matthew yangka maniyiki-ngarduyu; James ngulaju ngalapi-nyanu Alphaeus-kurlangu; Simon the Patriot; Judas Iscariot. (Nyampurlu Judas-rlu yangka kuja-jana ngaka yimi kangu Jew-patuku wiri-wiriki yungulu puuly-mardarninjarla pinyi Jesus.)
Jesus wangkaja-jana nyanungu-nyanguku 12-pala Yimi-kirli-patuku nyarrpa warrki-jarrinjaku

Kujanya-jana yangkaju wangkaja Jesus-ji ngula-jana ngarrurnu nyanungu-nyangu 12-pala Yimi-kirli-patuku yangka yilyanja-kuju murnmaku, kamparrurlaju, <<Kulalu yanta kirri-kirra manu jurrku-kurra Jew-wangu yapa-patu-kurlangu-kurra.  Manu kulalu yanta kirri-kirra yalirla kuja kalu yangka Samaria-wardingki yapa-patu nyina.
Yantalu jurrku-kurraju yalirla kuja kalu yangka Israel-wardingki yapa-patu nyina.  Nyanunguju kalu yangarlu nyina jiyipi-piya kuja kula kalu-jana [natural usage of 'kula'?] jiyipiki-ngarduyurlu mardarni, yangka wurdujarra-maninjaku nyanungu-patuju.
Kajinkili yani yalirra yapa-patuku, wangkayalu-jana kuja <God-kurlangu Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-ka yanirni ngaka!>
Kajili yapa murru-murru nyina, ngula-julu-jana parlpuru-manta.  Kajili yapa nyurnu-nguna, ngula-julu-jana pina wankaru-manta-yijala.  Kajili yapangku wijini-mardarni palkangka, ngula-julu-jana parlpuru-manta.  Kajili yapangku mardarni juju ngawu-ngawu kaninjarni palkangka, parlpuru-maninjarlalu-jana jurnta wilypi-maninjarla jurnta-yilyaya.  Ngajulurlurna-nyarra yungu ngaju-nyangu yartarnarri jutu-kurra.  Manu kajinkili-jana parlpuru-mani yapa, kulalu-jana pina-payika yinga-ngantalu-nyarra nyiya-kanti-kanti nyanungurlulku pina-yinyi nyurrurla-kuju.
Kulalu kangka tala, kawurlu, jilpa manu pirli-patu.
Kulalu kangka yakuju nyurrurlarluju, manu kulalu kangka wawarda manu wirliya-warnu.  Yantalu kuja-juku palkangka kuja kankulu wawarda mardarni.  Numulu kangka watiya wapanja-warnu nyurrurlarluju.  Kuja kankujulu ngajuluku warrki-jarri, yapa-karirli kapulu-nyarra yinyi kuja kankulu  nyiya-kanti-kantiki purda-jarrimi.>>

Kajinkili yukamirra kirri-kirraju, ngula-julu-jana yapaku ngurrjuku-wiyi warru-nyangka.  Yantalu manu nyinayalu yalirla yapa ngurrju-kurlangurla yuwarlirlaju, nyinanjarla yungunkulu yali-ngirli-jiki pina-yani.
-13 Ngula kankulu yuka ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurraju, rdakalu-jana warru-yungka yapaku yalirla yuwarlirlaju, manu wangkayalu-jana, <God-rlu kanyarra jina-mardarninjarla nyanyi nyurrurla yapa-patuju.>  Kaji numulu-nyarra rdaka yinyi nyurrurla-kuju, [Try 'Kaji-nyarra rdaka yinja-wangurlu wurra-mani nyurrurlaju,...'] kulalu-jana wangkaya ngurrju yimi God-kurluju nyanunguku.
Yuwayi, kajili-nyarra yapangku wurra-mani rdaka yinja-wangurlu manu purda-nyanja-wangurlu, ngula-jili yanta jurrku yali-ngirliji, manulu-jana jurdu yarri lurlurl-pungka wirliya-jangka.
Ngajulurlu karna-nyarra yirri-pura nyampuju junga-nyarrirni.  Yangka nyurru-wiyi, kuja-jana God-rlu kunka-manu yapa yangka kujalpalu nyinaja kirri-jarrarla Sodom-rla manu Gomorrah-rla, ngari pingkangku.  Kala ngaka-pardu-kari, kaji-jana God-rlu mii-mii-nyanyi yapa, nyarrpa kaji-lirla nyina nyanunguku, walku marda, kapu-jana kunka-mani kujanguju yapa karri-karri-wangurlu yangka ngula kajili-nyarra wurra-mani rdaka yinja-kuju nyurrurla-kuju.>>
Jesus-rli-jana yirri-puraja nyanungu-nyangu Yimi-kirli-patu yapangku kapulu-jana pakarni

Jesus-jana wangkaja Yimi-kirli-patuku, <<Purda-nyangka-jili!  Ngajulurlu karna-nyarra yilyamirra ngaju-nyangu yimi ngurrju-kurlu yapa-patu-kurra kulu-palka-kurra kuja kalu warnapari-piya nyina. Kapulu-nyarra pakarni, yangka ngula-ka warnaparirli jiyipi pakarni.  Ngula-warnu-nyalu-nyanu jaarl-nyangka kuja kanyanurla warnangku warru jaarl-jaarl-nyanyi manu pulya-nyayirni manu wurdungu-nyayirni nyinaya kurlukuku-piya.
Palju warra-warra-kangkalu-nyanu!  Kapulu-nyarra jangkardurnu yani Jew-patu, manu kapulu-nyarra puuly-mardarninjarla jirri-kanyi kuwutu-kurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurra.  Manu kapulu-nyarra ngalyipi-piyarlu pakarni nyanungu-nyangurla jaajirla.
Yangka kuja kankujulu ngaju purami, kujarlaju kapulu-nyarra karrinja-yirrarni kulkurru-jarra king-kari king-karirla manu wiri-wirirla yangka watiki-ngarduyurla.  Ngulangkanya kapunkulu-jana yimi-ngarrirni yimi ngurrju ngaju-kurlu manu Jew-wangu-paturlanguku.
-20 Yangka kajili-nyarra jangkardurnu yani maninjaku nyurrurlaku yungulu-nyarra kanyi kuwutu-kurra, ngulaju mirr-mirr-karrinja-wangulu karriya wangkanjaku-ngarntiji. Kulankulu-jana nyurrurla-nyangu jaru wangkami, kala God-kurlangu.  Kapu-nyarra yinyi wangkanjaku-ngarntiki, kapunkulurla marlaja-wangkami Pirlirrpaku Tarrukuku Wapirra-kurlanguku.>>

<<Ngula-puru-juku papardi-nyanu-kari papardi-nyanu-karirli kapulu-jana yinyi kukurnu-nyanu-kari kukurnu-nyanu-kari yurrkunyu-kuju pakarninjaku-ngarntiji ngulaju milyi-kirra-pinangu.  Manu ngula-jangkaju, kirda-nyanu-kari kirda-nyanu-karirli kapulu-jana yinyi nyanungu-nyangu kurdu-kurdu.  Manu ngula-jangkaju, kurdu-kurdurlu kapulu-jana ngamardi-nyanu-kari ngamardi-nyanu-kari manu kirda-nyanu-kari kirda-nyanu-kari yinyi pakarninja-kuju milyi-kirra-pinangu-juku.
Ngaju-nyangu kuja kankulu nyina, ngula-kuju kapulu-nyarra tarnnga-juku nyuru-nyuru-jarri yapa jintawarlayi.  Kala ngana-puka kajilpaju wala-juku nyinakarla ngajuku jika-jika-jarrinja-wanguju, God-rlu kapu [or 'kajika'?] muurlparlu mardarni kujanguju yapa.
Kajili-nyarra yapangku murru-murru-mani kirringka, ngula-julu-jana jurnta wuruly-parnkaya, manulu yanta kirri-kari-kirra.  Nyampu karna-nyarra yirri-purami nyurrurla-kuju yijardu-nyayirni.  God-kurlangu Yapa-nyayirni-wangu ngulaji-ka yanirni nyampu-kurra ngaka. Ngula-kuju murnma-juku yaninja-yaninja-kuju, nyurrurlarlu kulankulu walku-mani nyurrurla-nyangu warrkiji, kujarna-nyarra ngajulurlu yungu nyurrurlaku.  Kapunkulu warrurnu yani yimi-ngarrirninjarla God-kurlangu-kurlu Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu yapa-patu-kuju kirri-paturlaju Israel-rla.>>

Ngaju-julu purda-nyangka!  Kurdu wirriyaju kula-ka kirdarna-nyanu-piya nyina kuja karla jungarni-mani nyanungu-kuju nyiya-kanti-kanti.  Manu warrkirni wati kula karla nyanungu-nyanguku wiri-kiji wangka yinga-nganta nyiya-kanti-kanti ngurrju-mantarlarra, walku.
Yalirli kurdu wirriyarlu, purda-nyanyi-ka kirdarna-nyanuju yinga-ngarra nyina kirda-nyanu-piyalku. Manu yalirli warrkirni watingki, purda-nyanyi-ka nyanungu-nyangu wiri yinga-ngarra nyanungu-piyalku nyina.  Nyurrurla 12-pala wati, ngaju-nyangu kankujulu nyina warlalja, manulpankujulu purda-nyangkarlarra ngaju yingankulu nyina ngaju-piya-yijala.  Ngajuju-nganta kajili ngarrirni <Beelzebul> wiri juju ngawu-ngawu-patu-kurlangu kuja kajili ngaju-kuju yirdi maju-karilki yirrarni.  Ngula-piya-yijala kapulu-nyarra wangka maju-maju yimi nyurrurla-kuju.>>
Ngalipa kularlipa-jana lani-jarri yapa-kariki. Lani-jarrimirlipa jinta-kujaku ngulaju God-kujaku.

Wangkajalku-jana Jesus-ji nyanungu-nyangu Yimi-kirli-patuku, <<Kulalu-jana lani-jarriya yali-patuku yapa-patuku kajili-nyarra yanirni murru-murru-maninjaku nyurrurlaku.  Nganangku-puka kuja-ka wuruly-yirrarni nyiyarlangu, ngakalku-ka warraja-mani.  Nganangku-puka kuja-ka parnta-yirrarni nyiyarlangu, ngakaju-ka raa-pinyi.
Nyampurra karna-nyarra ngajulurlu jungarni-mani wurulyparlu yingankulu-jana nyurrurlarluju yaninjarla yimi-ngarrirni jaru nyampurra yarlungka.
Ngularnawu, kulalu-jana lani-jarriya yapa-patu-kuju kajili-nyarra yarri-yanirni pakarninjaku nyurrurlaku. Kajikalu-nyarra palka-mipa pakarni.  Kala kulalpalu-nyarra pirlirrpa pakakarlarra.  God-miparlu kajika-nyarra palka manu pirlirrpa pakarni yalirla jurrkungka warlu-piyarla ngurungkaju yirdingka Gehenna-rla.  Ngula-warnunya nyurrurlalpankulurla lani-jarriyarla jintaku nyanungu-kujaku God-ku.
God kanyarra warrarda yulkami-juku manu kanyarra mari-jarri nyurrurla-kuju.  God kajana mari-jarri jurlpu wita-wita-kuju kuja kankulu mani japungkaju talangku witangku.  Kaji jinta wanti walya-kurra manu palimirralku, God-rlu-juku-ka ngularraju muku milya-pinyi.
Manu kaji marda-ka yapa yanirni pakarninjaku nyuntuku, God-rlu-ka milya-pinyi ngularraju.  God-rlu kanyarra milya-pinyi nyajangu kankulu marnilpa mardarni jurrungkaju.
Yuwayi, God kanyarra yulka nyurrurla-kuju ngula-piya kuja kajana jurlpuku yulkami.  Ngula-warnunya kulalu lani-jarriya yapa-kari-kijaku.>>
Yapa-kariki yapa-kurlipa-jana yimi-ngarrirni kuja karlipa pura Jesus Christ

Ngula-jangkaji, Jesus wangkajalku, <<Nganangku-puka kuja kanyanu ngarrirni puranjaku-ngarduyu warrajarlu, ngakaju kajirna ngaju nyina ngaju-nyangu Kirdarna-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, kapurnarla wangka Kirdarna-kuju, <Nyampurlu yapangkulpaju warrarda puraja ngajuju yijardurlu.>
Yapa ngula kalu kuja wangka warraja, <Kularna ngajuju Wapirra-kurlangu Jesus-kirlangu puranjaku-ngarduyu, ngaka-pardu-karirla kajirna ngajulu nyina Kirdarna ngaju-nyangu-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla, kapurnarla kuja wangka Kirdarna ngaju-nyangu-kuju, <Ngajulurlu kula karna milya-pinyi nyampuju yapa.> >>
Jesus-ki kalu-nyanurla yapangkuju marlaja wilji-wilji-mani

Yali-jangkaji, Jesus-jana wangkaja, <<Marda kankujulu nyurrurla-paturlu yapangku ramparl-manngi-nyanyi ngajulu-ngantarna yanurnu nguru nyampu-kurra yingarna-jana warla-pajirni yapa kulu-kujaku.  Walku, kula junga-kula kujaju.  Ngajurna yanurnu nyampu-kurra yingarna-jana ngurrju-mani yapa pakarninjaku, yingalu-nyanu pakarni turnu-warnu-kari turnu-warnu-karirli.
Ngajurna yanurnu nyampu-kurra yingalu-jana ngalapi-nyanurlu pakarni kirdarna-nyanu, manu kanangkarlu yingalu-jana pakarni ngamardi-nyanu, manu yingalu-jana karnta-karntarlu pakarni kanajardu nyanungu-nyangu.
Yapa panu kuja kalu wati-kirlangurla yuwarlirla nguna, kapulu pakarni yaliji wati.

Nganangku-puka yapangku kaji pulka-pinyi nyanungu-nyangu kirdarna manu ngamardi-nyanu tarnngangku, ngula-pururlu kajiji pulka-pinyi ngaju wita-kari wita-karirli, kujangku yapa kulalpa nyarrpalku nyinakarla ngaju-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu.  Manu nganangku yapangku kuja-ka pulka-pinyi nyanungu-nyangu ngalapi-nyanu manu kanangka-nyanu, ngula-pururlu kajiji ngaju marri-pinyi wita-kari wita-karirli, kujangu yapa kulalpa nyarrpalku nyinakarla ngaju-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu.
Kaji nganangku yampimi watiya warnta-warnta nyanungu-nyangu jijangka kanja-wangurlu, manu kaji-ngantalpaju purayarla ngaju-nyangurla wirliyarla, kujangu yapa kulalpa nyarrpalku nyinakarla ngaju-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu.
Nganangku-puka yapangku kajilpa-nyanu muurlparlu-mardakarla palinja-kujaku nyanungu-miparlu, ngulaju kajika palimi.  Kala kajilpa-nyanu yungkarla ngaju-kurra, ngulaju kajikaju marlaja-nyinami wankaru-juku.>>

<<Kuja kanpa nyuntu warru-yani kirri-kari kirri-kari-kirra, warru ngarrirni kanpa-jana ngaju-nyangu yimi.  Manu nganangku-puka yapangku kajikangku nyuntu kanyi ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurra, ngajurlangu kaji kanyi yapangku yalirliji nyanungu-nyangu-kurra ngurra-kurraju. Nganangku-puka yapangku kajilpaju ngaju kangkarlarra ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurra, yalirli yapangku-ka God-rlangu kanyi ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurraju.  Jintangkuju ngaju yilyajarni nguru nyampu-kurra.
Ngana-puka yapa kajirla marlaja-wangkami jaruku-ngarduyu God-ku, manu kaji yapa-karirli yapangku kanyi jaruku-ngarduyu ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurra, yinga ngarra yalirla nguna, God-rlu kapu-palangu jirramaku-juku yinyi warntarri-nyayirni-wangu.  Manu kaji wati nyinanja-yani ngurrju-juku, manu kaji wati-karirli kanyi yali wati ngurrju palka ngurra nyanungu-nyangu-kurra, God-rlu kapu-palangu yinyi warntarri-nyayirni-wangu.
Ngajulurlu karna-nyarra yijardurlu yimi-ngarrirni.  Kajiji nganangku-puka yapangku ngajulu purami kurdu-piyarlu, manu kajirla yapa-karirli yapangku yinyi yaliki puranjaku-ngarduyuku ngapa walyka ngarninjaku, God-rlu kapurla yinyi yapaku yali-kiji warntarri-nyayirni-wangu.


[Matthew 17  Warlpiri  2nd draft  July 1991  Swartz]
Jesus-kirlangu palkaju, palka-karri-jarrija

Ngaka-karilki, jinta-jangka wiyiki-jangkarla, Jesus-ji jirrnganja-jana yanu pirli-kirra kankarlarra marnkurrpaku puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku Peter-ku manu James-ki manu nyanunguku-purdangka kukurnu-nyanu John-ku. Ngulangka-jilpalu yangarlu-patu nyinaja.
Ngula-puruju, Jesus-kirlanguju palkaju, palka-kari-jarrijalku.  Nyanungu-nyangu yinngirri-jilpa wanta-piya mirily-mirily-jarrija, manu nyanungu-nyangu wawardaju kardirri-jarrijarla palkangkaju.

Ngula-puru-juku, Elijah manu Moses-pala warraja-jarrija, wangkajalpa-palarla Jesus-ki.
Ngula-jangkaju, Peter-rla wangkaja Jesus-ki, <<Warlaljamarri Wiri, ngurrju-nyayirni nyampuju ngurra. Nganimpa-paturlu kapurnalu-nyarra kaliku ngantirni marnkurrpa:  jinta-kari nyuntuku, jinta-kari Moses-ku, jinta-kari Elijah-ku.>>

Ngula-puru-juku, mangkurdulkurla wapirrija wanta-kuju. Yali-ngirli mangkurdu-ngurlu, God-ju wangkaja, <<Nyampuju ngajuku Ngalapi-nyanu marulu.  Nyanungurlu kaju wardinyi-mani.  Ngula-julu purda-nyangka wangkanja-kurra!>>

Kujalu marnkurrparlu puranjaku-ngarduyu-paturlu purda-nyangu wangkanja-kurra, lani-jarrijalu, manulu wantija walya-kurra.
Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-jana yanurralku nyanungu-patu-kuju, manu marnpurnu-jana.  Nyanunguju-jana wangkaja, <<Karrinja-pardiyalu, kulalu lani-jarriya!>>
Kujalu marnkurrparlu puranjaku-ngarduyu-paturlu nyangu, ngulangku-julu nyangu Jesus karrinja-kurra, jintalpa yangarlu karrija.

Ngula-jangkaju, pinalkulu jitinja-yanu pirli-ngirliji. Kulkurru wangkaja-jana Jesus-ji, <<Nyampuju yimi, mardakalu nyurrurla-miparlu yimi-ngarrirninja-wangurlu kujankujulu jalangurlu nyangu ngaju mirirl-mirirl-jarrinja-kurra yangka Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu.  Kajirna nyurnu-jangka pina wankaru-jarrinjarla yakarra-pardi, ngakalu-jana ngula-jangkarlanya yimi-ngarrika ngajuju.>>

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-jili payurnu yangka-paturluju marnkurrparlu, <<Yangka kuruwarriki-ngarduyu-patu, wangka kalu-nganpa Elijah-kurlu <kapu kamparru-yani-nganta yangkaku-ngarnti Messiah-ku-ngarnti?>  Nyarrpaku-yijala kalu-nganpa kujaju wangka?>>

Jesus-rli-jana jangku-manu, <<Junga kujaju kapu Elijah-wiyi pina-yanirni yungu nyiya-kanti-kanti jungarni-mani Messiah-ku.
Junga karna-nyarra wangka:  Elijah nyurru-juku pina-yanurnu.  Yapa-karirli nyurru-jukulu murru-murru-manu kuja-lurla yarri jala-jala-jarrija maju-maninjaku.  Kulalu milya-pungu nganalpa nyanunguju nyinaja.  God-kurlangu Yapa-nyayirni-wangu kaji yanirni nyampu-kurra, yangka-paturlu yapangku kapulu murru-murru-mani nyanunguju kuja-yijalalu murru-murru-manu Elijah-ju.>>
Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-kirlangurlu puranjaku-ngarduyurlu milya-pungulu kujalpa nyarrpa Jesus wangkaja.  Kulalpa Elijah-kurlu wangkaja. Nyanungu-julpa-jana wangkaja John the Baptist-kirli.
Jesus-rli parlpuru-manu kurdu juju-kurlu

Yali-jangkaju, Jesus manu yangka marnkurrpa puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu, jitinja-yanurnulu pirli-ngirli, manu parlu-pungulu-jana yapa turnu-kurra yalirlaju.  Wati jinta yaninja-yanu Jesus-kirra-pinangu, manu parntarrunjunurla kamparru Jesus-ki.
Ngula-jangkaju, wangkajalkurla Jesus-kiji, <<Warlaljamarri Wiri, parlparu-manta ngaju-nyangu ngalapi. Nyanunguju murru-murru-nyayirni, manu japaku-japaku-ka rdalji-jarri.  Purda-nyanyi kanyanu maju-nyayirni.  Japaku-japaku-ka wantimirra warlu-kurraju wanti manu ngapa-kurra, manu murru-murru-mani kanyanu.
Nyurrurna-jana kamparrurlu-wiyi payurnu nyuntu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yungu parlpuru-mani.  Walku, rampaku-juku kalu nyina.>>

Jesus wangkaja-jana, <<Kari nyurrurla-junkulu kapurunju-panu!  Nyurrurla yapa kankulu nyinami yunjumu-kari!  Nyangurla-karrarna-nyarra jirrnganja-nyina nyampurlaju?  Tarnnga-juku mayi?  Nyarrpaku-yijala karna-nyarra nyampurlaju jirrnganja-nyina kapuru wita-wangu-kuju?  Kangkarni-jili yali kurdu ngajuku.>>
Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-rli ngarrurnu juju ngawu-ngawu kujalpa kurdungka kaninjarni palkangka nyinaja. Ngula-jangkaju, juju-jurla jurntalku wilypi-pardija kurdu-kuju, manu yali-jangkaju kurdu-julpa ngurrju-jarrijalku.

Ngaka-pardu-karilki, kuja Jesus-lpa yangarlulku nyinaja, nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu yanurnu, manulu payurnu nyanunguju, <<Nyarrparlarnalurla puta-yilyaja jurnta jujuju nyampu-kuju kurduku?>>

-21 Jesus-rli-jana jangku-manu, <<Nyurrurlarlu kulankulu jurnta-yilyayarla jujuju kurdu-ngurluju, nyiya-jangka?  Kulankulurla wala-nyinaja God-kuju.  Ngaju karna-nyarra junga wangka:  nyiyaku-puka kajilpankulurla wala-nyinakarla God-ku kapuru-wangu, ngulaju kajika-nyarra purda-nyanyi nyanungurluju, manu kajika-nyarra jangku-mani nyiyaku-puka kajilpankulu payikarla.  Kajilpankulurla wala-nyinakarla God-ku ngari wita, ngulaju kajikankulu-jana pirli-kiji wangkami <Yanta kirri-kari-kirra!>  Ngularrarlu pirlingki kapingkili purda-nyanyi kajinparla nyuntu wala-nyina God-kuju. Kulalpangku nganangkulku warla-pajikarla nyuntuju.>>
Jesus-rli-nyanu muurr-pungu kapu ngaka palimi-nganta

Ngaka-karilki, Jesus manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu turnu-jarrijalu wungu ngurungkaju Galilee-rla.  Wangkajalku-jana nyanungu-patu-kuju, <<Ngakaju, watingki jintangku kapu-jana yimi kanyi ngajulu Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu, kapuju ngaju yapa-kari-kirra yinyi.
Ngula-jangkaju, kapu-julu pinyi ngajuju tarnnga-kurra.  Ngula-jangkaju, ngurra jirrama-jangka kapurnarla marlaja wankaru-jarri pina.>>  Kujalu Jesus-kirlangurlu puranjaku-ngarduyu-paturlu purda-nyangu kuja-kurra,nyanungu-julu yirraru-jarrija.
Jesus-rli-jana yungu tala yungulu wurdujarra-mani Jew-kurlangu yuwarli maralypi

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu, yanulu kirri-kirra Capernaum-kurra.  Ngulangkaju, ngalya-kari wati-lirla yanurnu Peter-ku.  Nyanungurlu wati-paturlulpalu warru-manu tala yingalu wurdujarra-mani Jew-kurlangu yuwarli-maralypi.   Payurnulu Peter-ju, <<Nyuntu-nyangurlu pinangkalparlu yinga-nganpa tala yinyi wurdujarra-maninjaku Jew-kurlangu maralypi?>>

Peter-rlu-jana jangku-manu, <<Yuwayi, Jesus-rli kajana warrarda yinyi talaji yurlyurrpu-kari yurlyurrpu-karirla yapa-kuja kuja kalu wurdujarra-mani maralypiji.>> Yali-jangkaju, Peter-ju yanu yuwarli-kirra kujalpa yalirla Jesus ngunaja jurrkungka.  Peter-rlu yinga-nganta payikarla nyanunguju talaku yungu-ngantarla wangkayarla.
Jesus-rli kamparnirli payurnu nyanunguju, <<Wati kuja-ka king nyina kankarlu-nyayirni yapa panu-kuju, kula kajana kurdu-kurdu nyanungu-nyangu jinyi-jinyi-mani yungu-nganta-lurla tala yinyi, walku.  Nyanungurlu kajana yapa-kari-mipa yapaju jinyi-jinyi-mani yinga-lurla nyanungu-kuju tala yinyi.  Ngulaju junga-ngarra Peter?>>

Peter-rluju jangku-manu, <<Yapa-kari-miparlu kalurla talaji yinyi yali-kiji king-kiji kuja kajana jinyi-jinyi-mani yapaju.>>
Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-rla wangkaja Peter-kuju, <<Ngulaju junga Peter, kurdu-kurdu warlaljarlu king-kirlangurlu, kula kalurla nyanungu-kuju yinyi talaji.
Yuwayi, ngulaji marda junga, kala ngajulurlu kajilparna-jana tala yinja-wangurlu jurnta-mardakarla nyampurraku watiki yingalu wurdujarra-mani maralypi, ngulaju kajikajulu kulu-jarrimilki ngaju-kuju. Kuja-kujakuju, yanta mangkuru-kurra yawuku maninjaku. Kajinpa rdarri-mardarni kamparru-warnu yawu, lakarn-pungkarla nyanungu-nyangu lirraju.  Kaninjarni nyanungu-nyangurla lirrangkaju kapinpa nyuntulurluju pirli pardany-parami. Kangka ngulaju pirli, manu yungka-jana wati yali-patuku. Ngula-jangkaju, kulalu-ngalpa payirnilki tala-kuju nyampu-warnurla yurlyurrparlaju.>>


[Matthew 19 2nd draft Nov 1991 Warlpiri]

Jesus-kirlangu kuruwarri yupukarra-kurlu manu karlirr-mardarninja-kurlu

Yali-jangkaju, Jesus yanurnulku nguru-ngurluju Galilee-ngirli, manu yanu kurlarra nguru-kurra Judea-kurra.  Ngulangkaju, parlpardany-yanu kakarrara pirnti-pirntirla-juku karru Jordan-wana-juku.

Yapaju-lurla panu-juku yanurnu nyanungu-kuju ngula-kurraju, manu ngalya-kari-jili murru-murru.   Nyampurra yapa murru-murru, ngulaju-jana parlparu-manu nyanungurluju.

Ngula-kurra-julurla Pharisee-patulku yanurnu yungulu-nganta Jesus yimirr-yungkarla jarungku yungu-nganta-jana milki-wangkayarla jaru warntarla.[Emily bt'd 'straight stories', not 'wrong ones]  Payurnulu Jesus, <<Nyarrpa-ka wangka Moses-kurlangu kuruwarriji?  Ngurrju mayi kujaju kaji Jew-ngku watingki nganimpa-piyarlu yampimi nyanungu-nyangu karntaju nyiya-kanti-kanti-ngirliji kaji-nyanu nyanungurlu purda-nyanyi?>>

Jesus-rli-jana jangku-manu nyanungurraju, <<Nyurrurlu kankulu milya-pinyi yangkaju kuja Moses-rlu yirrarnu-ngalpa ngalipaku Bible-rla.   Nyampurnawu-ka wangka, <Nyurru-wiyi, kuja God-rlu ngurrju-maninjarla yirrarnu nyiya-kanti-kanti, ngulaji-palangu yirrarnu wati manu karnta.>
Ngula-jangkaju, God-rla wangkaja Moses-ku, <<Ngajulurlurna-jana ngurrju-manu yapa wati manu karnta.  Manu ngula-warnurlu, watingki kapu yampimi nyanungu-nyangu kirdana manungamardi-nyanu manuyanilki yinga-ngarra wungulku yina nyanungu-nyangu karnta-kurlu.   Ngula-jangkaju, ngana-jarra kuja kapala nguna ngurrangka, ngula-jarraju jungu kapala nyinami jintalku.>
Ngula-jangkaju, kula kapala-nyanu jarnku jurnta-nyina yitingka-jarra, ngulaju kapala jintangka-juku nyina wungu-juku.   Junga-juku, jalangu-jarraju wati manu karnta kuja kapalangu God-rlu jinta-mani, ngula-julu-palangu yapa-karirliji karlirr-mardarninja-wangurlu yampimi.>>

Ngula-jangkaju, Pharisee-paturlulu payurnu Jesus, <<Kaji kujaji marda junga, nyarrpalku-nganpa Moses-rluju yungu nganimpa-kuju nyampuju kuruwarri karlirr-mardarninja-kurlu?  Nyanungurluju-nganpa yimi-ngarrurnu nganimpa-kuju kujaju-nganta junga wati-kiji yinga-nganta yirrarni yimi karlirr-mardarninja-kurlu pipangka manu yingarla yinyi nyanungu-nyanguku karntaku kamparru-juku karlirr-mardarninja-kuju.   Nyiya-kulku Moses-rluju yirrarnu kujaju kuruwarriji?>>

Jesus-rli-jana jangku-manu nyanunguju, <<[re-ordered] Nyurrurlarlu kula kankulu pirrjirdirli ngungu-mani manu purda-nyanyi nyarrpa God kanyarra wangka nyurrurla-kuju.  Kujarlanya-jurla Moses-rlu-nyarra yungu yali kuruwarri karlirr-mardarninja-kurlu nyurrurlaku yapa-patukku.  Kuja God-rlu ngurrju-manu kamparru-warnu wati manu karnta, nyanungurlu-palangu jinta-manu yinga-pala wungu-jarralku nyina tarnnga-juku.   Ngula-warnunya, nyurrurlalpankulu nyinayarla wungulku nyurrurla-nyangu-kurlu karnta-karnta-kurluju.   Kulalu-jana karlirr-mardaka karnta-karntaju.
Purda-nyangka-julu ngaju!  Kaji wati-kirlangu karntaju warru kalykuru-jarri wati-kari kurlu, ngulaju ngula-juku yali-kiji karnta-kurlanguku kali-nyanu-kuju karlirr-mardarninja-kuju nyanungu-nyangu ngapuju-nyanu-kuju.   Kala kaji karntaju kalykuru-wangu nyina, manu kaji nyanungu-nyangu kali-nyanurlul karlirr-mardarni, manu kaji yurlparanyirralku nyiya-warnurlaju, manu kaji jinta-karilki karnta yupukarra-mani, ngulaju maju-nyayirni!>>

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-kurlangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu-lurla wangkaja nyanungu-kuju, <<Nyuntu-nyangu jaru yupukarra-kurluju junga.   Marda ngurrju-juku nganimpa yingarnalu jangkayirla-juku nyina yupukarra-wangu.>>

Jesus-jana wangka nyanungu-kuju, <<Kulalpalu panu-juku nyinayarla pinaju, manu kulalpalu nginyi-nginyi-kirra mantarlarra nyampuju jaru yupukarra-kurluju.   Kajilparla God-rlu yungkarla nyampu jaru watiki, ngula-julpa jangkayirla-juku nyinayarla yupukarra-wangu. [retranslated but Emily didn't bt it]
Ngalya-kari watiji kalu jangkayirla nyina nyiya-warnu kulalpalu mardakarlarra kurdu-kurduju nyiya-warnu.  Ngalya-kari wati-jilpalu palka-jarrija murru-murru-kurlu palkangka-kurlu.   Ngalya-kari wati kalu jangkayirla nyina maju.  [still need to get in that some made are made eunuchs]  Ngalya-kari wati kalu jangkayirla nyina yinga-ngarra-lurla God-ku warrki-jarri, manu yingalu-jana yimi-ngarrirni yapaku God-kurlangu Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu.   Kajingki God wangka nyuntuku nyinanjaku jangkayirla, nyinaya jangkayirla yupukarraku-purda-jarrinja-wangu>>
Jesus-rlu-jana kurdu-kurdu ngamirn-kujurnu, manu yati-wangkarla God-ku kurdu-kurduku

Ngakalku, kangurnlpalu-jana yapangku ngalya-karirli kurdu-kurdu Jesus-kirlangu-kurra yungu-jana rdakangku marnpirni, manu yungu-janarla yati-wangka God-ku kurdu-kurduku.   Ngula-kujakuju, puranjaku-ngarduyu-paturlulu-jana puta warla-pajurnu wiri-wiriji kanjarni-panuju, manulu-jana kurnta-ngarrurnu.
Kuja-jana Jesus-rli nyangu, ngula-kuju-jana kulu-jarrinjarla wangkaja puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu-kuju, <<Ngana-puka yapa jalangu kuja-ka nyinami nyampu-patu-piya kurdu-kurdu-piya, ngulaju kalurla jirrnganja-nyinami God-ku Ngurrara-nyayirni-wangurla nyanungu-nyangurla. [order changed] Kujarlaju, pangkala-julu yanirni kurdu-kurduju ngajuku, yampiyalu-jana warla-pajirninja-wangurlu.   >>
Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-rlu-nyanu rdaka yirrarnu kurdu-kurdu-kurlangurla jurrungka, manu yati-wangkajalku-janarla [unchecked change] God-ku.  Ngula-jangkaju, karrinja-pardinjarla yarnkajarralku.
Wati jurnarrpa panu-kurlu kujarla yanurnu wangkanjaku Jesus-ki

Watirla yanurnu Jesus-ki manu payurnu nyanunguju, <<Pinangkalpa, nyarrpa-jarrirna ngurrju [unchecked change] ngajuju yingaju God-rlu wankaru-juku mardarni nyanungu-nyangurla jukurrarnurla ngurrararla?>>

Jesus-rlu jangku-manu nyanunguju, <<Nyiyaku kanpaju payirni ngajuju yinga-ngantanpa ngurrju-juku nyina? [change to 'about what is good and bad?']  God-mipa-ka nyina ngurrjuju.   Kajinpa nyuntu God-ku-purda-jarrimirni yingangku wankaru-juku mardarni tarnnga, ngulaku-ngarntirliji Moses-kurlangu kuruwarri puranja-yanta tarnngangku-juku.>>

Ngula-jangkarluju, watingkilki payurnu Jesus, <<Nyarrpa kuruwarriji Moses-kurlangurna purami?>>

Jesus-rlu jangku-manu nyanunguju,  <<Linjarrpa [Emily bt'd this word as steal] pinja-wangu nyinaya! Wati-kari-kirlangu karnta ngulaju yampiya jurnta-kanja-wangurlu!  Wiji-wangu nyinaya!   Warlka-ngarrirninja-wangu nyinaya kajinpa nyuntu kuwuturla nyina! [Emily bt'd this as 'covering yourself up in court]
Linpangku-palangu purda-nyangka kirda-nyanu manu ngati-nyanu wilji-wangurlu!  Yulkaya-jana nyuntu-nyangu yapaju warlalja nguruku-ngarduyuju kuja kanpa-nyanu nyuntulurlu yulka.>>

Watingkilki jangku-manu Jesus, <<Ngajulurlulparna tatungku-juku puraja nyampurraju kuruwarriji.   Nyarrparalku kuruwarri-kari-jilparna ngajulurlurlu puraryarl?>>

Jesus-rla wangkaja nyanungu-kuju, <<Kajinpa nyuntulu ngurrjuku nyinanjaku-purda-jarrimi, ngajulu-piya, kujaku-ngarntiji, yanta, jurnarrpa manu nyiya-kanti-kanti manta nyuntu-nyangu, ngulaju-jana pina jali-manta nyiya-kanti-kanti maniyiki-ngarntirliji, manu ngula-jangkaju, maniyiji-jana warru-yungka marlajarraku rdilyki-watiki.   Ngula-jangkanya, pina-yaninjarla [unchecked change] puranjaku-ngarduyu-jarriya ngaju-nyanguju!  Kajinpa-jana nyiya-kanti-kanti muku yinyi yapa-kariki, ngula-jangkaju kapunparla jirrnganja-nyina nyiya-kanti-kanti-kirliji God-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.>>

Kuja wati jurnarrpa panu-kurlurlu purda-nyangu kuja-kurra, nyanunguju yirraru-jarrija-nyayirni, manu yarnkajarralku Jesus-kijaku.   Nyanunguju yirraru-jarrija kujalpa panu jurnarrpa mardarnu, manu yinga mardarni-nganta yinja-wangurlu.   Kuja wati jurnarrpa panu-kurlurlu purda-nyangu kuja-kurra, nyanunguju yirraru-jarrija-nyayirni, manu yarnkajarralku Jesus-kijaku.   Nyanunguju yirraru-jarrija kujalpa panu jurnarrpa mardarnu, manu yinga mardarni-nganta yinja-wangurlu.

Ngula-jangkaju, Jesus-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu-kuju, <<Junga karna-nyarra wangka, yangka jurnarrpa panu-kurlu yapaju kulalu panu yuka Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurraju God-kurlangu-kurraju. [add:  'it will be very hard for them to enter']
Ngaju karna-nyarra yarda wangka yangka-yijala, <<Kulalpa kamurluju jingi-jingi yantarla yangkangkaju nitilirla pantirniinja-kurlangurla rdilypirrpa-kurlurla witangkarrarlaju, walku.   Kuja-piyarlu-yijala kulalpa-nyanu jurnarrpa panu-kurlurluju yapangkuju yirrakarla God-kurlangu-kurraju Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurraju!>>

Kujalu Jesus-kirlangu puranjuku-ngarduyu-paturlu kuja-kurra purda-nyangu, ngulaju-lurla paa-karrija.   Ngula-jangkaju, payurnulu Jesus, < Kujalu Jesus-kirlangu puranjuku-ngarduyu-paturlu kuja-kurra purda-nyangu, ngulaju-lurla paa-karrija.   Ngula-jangkaju, payurnulu Jesus, <<Kajilpa God-rlu yampiyarla yangka yapa jurnarrpa-kurlu panu-kurlu muurlpa-mardarninja-wangurlu, kujarlaju nganalku kajika muurlpa-mardarni?>>

 Jesus-rlilki-jana nyangu jungarnirli, manu wangkaja-jana,<<Kulalpa-nyanu nganangku yapangku muurlpa-mardarni, walku.   God-miparlu kajika muurlpa-mardarni yapaju.>>God-miparlu kajika muurlpa-mardarni yapaju.>>

Ngula-jangkaju, Pe Ngula-jangkaju, Peter-rlu payurnu Jesus, <<Yuwayi, nyiya-kanti-kantirnalu yampinja-yanu purda-ngirli yungurnangkulu nyuntulku puraja.   Nyiyalku-nganpa God-rluju yinyi nganimpa-kuju?>  Nyiyalku-nganpa God-rluju yinyi nganimpa-kuju?>>

Jesus-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku, <<Jesus-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku, <<Junga karna-nyarra wangka:  Ngaka-pardu-kari, kajirna ngaju Yapa-nyayirni-wangu wirilki nyina nyiya-kanti-kantiki God-kurlangurla Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla.  Nyurrurla puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu, ngulaju kapunkulu wiri-wiri-yijala nyina God-kurlanguku yapa-kuju, manu kapunkulu-jana mii-mii-nyan nyurrurla puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu, ngulaju kapunkulu wiri-wiri-yijala nyina God-kurlanguku yapa-kuju, manu kapunkulu-jana mii-mii-nyanyi.
 Junga kujaju!  Ngajuku puranjaku-ngarntirli kajinkili yampinja-yani yuwarli nyurrurla-nyangu manu marda nyurrurlaku-purdangka-patu manu marda nyurrurlaku-palangu-jarra manu marda kurdu-kurdu manu marda nguru nyurrurla-nyangurlangu, ngula-wana-wanaju God-rlu kapu-nyarra jaya-kurra-nyayirni yarda yinyi, manu kapunkulurla tarnnga-juku jirrnganja-nyina wankaru-nyayirni-juku.
Jalangu kuja kalu nyina kamparrurla wiri yapa, ngulaju ngakaju kapulu purda-ngirlilki nyina.   Jalangu kuja kalu nyina purda-ngirli yapa, ngulaju ngakaju kapulu kamparrurla wirilki-yijala nyina.>>



[Matthew 21 2nd draft 6-11-91 Warlpiri Swartz ]


Jesus-rlu-jana ngarrurnu yimi warrkirni-patu-kurlu 

Nyanungu-jana wangkaja, <<Ngajulurlu yingarna-nyarra jaru yimi-ngarrirni God-kurlangu-kurlu Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu. Watingki kalalpa katini mardarnu. Ngulangka katinirla, nyanungurlu kalalpa grapes mardarnu katinirlaju. Mungalyurru-nyayirni nyanunguju yanu kirri-kirra maninjaku ngalya-kari wati yungu-lurla grapes kaji-mani nyanunguku. 
Wangkaja-jana nyanungurra-kuju, <<Kajinkijili grapes kaji- pajirni parrangka jintangka, ngulaju kapurna-nyarra jilpa warru-yinyi _larrki-larrki|_ (WHAT DOES THIS WORD MEAN?) nyurrurla-kuju. (Ngurrangka yalirlaju kalalu watiji warkki-jarrija parra wiri jinta- parduku jilpaku pirliki, ngaulaju-jana nyanungu-nyangu kuruwarri.) Junga-juku, wati yali-patu-lurla _yaya-wangka|_ (WHAT DOES THIS WORD MEAN?) yali-kiji katiniki-ngarduyu wiri-kiji yungulu-nganta warrki-jarri parra wiri jinta jilpaku. Manu junga-juku, katiniki- ngarduyurlu-jana yilyaja nyanungu-nyangu katini-kirraju yungu-lurla mani nyanungu-kuju. 
Ngaka-karilki parra jintangka-juku, wanta kankarlarra-puru mungalyurrurla, yali katiniki-ngarduyu pina-yanu kirri-kirra, manu parlu-pungu-jana wati-patu kujalpalu warru-karrija warrki-wangu- patu. 
Nyanungu-jana wangkaja nyanungu-patu-kuju, <<Nyurrurla wati-patulu yanta, manulu warrki-jarriya ngaju-nyangurla katinirla. Ngaka-kari jalangurla ngajulurlu kapurna-nyarra payi-mani talangku warrki-warnuju.>> 
Junga-juku, yangka-patu wati-patu yarnkajarralkulu katini-kirra, manulu warrki-jarrijalku. Ngakalku, wanta kujalpa kankarlarra nyinaja kulkurrurla manu yarda parrparda-jarrija wuraji-kirralku, yangka katiniki-ngarduyu yarda-yanu kirri-kirra, manu-jana yarda- manu wati-patu-kari-yijala manu yingalu warrki-jarri nyanunguku. 
Ngakalku, kujalpa wantaju _karnturlku|_ (WHAT DOES THIS WORD MEAN?) karlarra nyinaja yukanjaku-ngarntilki, yangka katiniki-ngarduyu yarda-yanu kirri-kirra-yijala. Parlu-pungu-jana wati-patu-kari kujalpalu karrija yalumpurla-juku warrki-wangu, manu-jana nyanunguju wangkaja, <<Nyiya-warnu kankulu nyurrurla wati-patu yalumpurla-juku karrimi parra wiri warrki-wangu?>> 

Jangku-manulu nyanunguju, <<Kula-nganpa ngana yanurnu nganimpa-kuju, manu kula-nganpa nganangku payurnu nganimpaju warrki-jarrinja-kuju.>> 
Junga-juku, nyanungulku-jana wangkaja, <<Yuwayi, yantalkulu, manulu warrki-jarriya ngaju-nyangurla katinirla.>> 

Kujalpa wantaju jitinja-yanu kaninjarra-karilki, yali katiniki- ngarduyu wangkajarla nyanungu-nyanguku warrkirniki-ngarduyuku- patu-kurlanguku, <<Turnu-manta-jana warrkini-patuju jintangka-juku, manu payi-manta-jana jinta-kari jinta-kari kujalu warrki-jarrija. Yangka wati-patu kujarna-jana ngajulurlu yarnkanjarla manunjunu wurajirli, payi-manta-jana nyanungu kamparnu-wiyi. Manu yangka wati-patu kujarna-jana ngajulurlu kamparrurlu yangka mungalyurru- nyayirnirli jalangurlu manunjunu, payi-manta-jana pirda-ngirli ngulaju.>> 
Junga-juku, yangkanku warrkirniki-ngarduyu-patu-kurlangurlu- jana yungu jinta-kari jinta-kari jilpaju warrkirni-patu-kuju kujalpalu yangka wita-juku warrki-jarrija. 
Yangka yali-patu warrkirni kujalpalu yangka parra wiri warrki- jarrija, nyanungu-paturlu ngula-julu-nyanu ramparlparlu purda- nyangu yinga-ngantalu mantarlarra panu talaju warrki-jarrinja- warnurluju. Nyiyaku-nganta jintaju jilpa. Kala walku! Yalirli warrkirniki-ngarduyu-patu-kurlangurlu-jana nyanungu-patuku-jana yungu jinta-kari jinta-kari jilpaju. 
-12 Yuwayi, yangka-patu warrkirni-patu, kujalpalu warrki- jarrija ngutu-ngutu parra wiri, ngula-julpalu nginji-wangkanjaku rdurru-yungu. Wangkaja-lurla yali-kiji katiniki-ngarduyuku, <<Nyampurra wati-patu kujanpa-jana nyunturlurlu manunjunu wurajirlilki, nyanungurra-julu wita-kuju warrki-jarrija. Kala nganimpa-patu, ngula-jurnalu ngutu-ngutu warrki-jarrija parra wiri wantangkaju. Nyunturlurlulpanpa-nganpa payi-mantarla nganimpaju talangkuju panungku, yali-patu-kuju wirrkardu!>>, yali-patu-kuju wirrkardu!>> 

Yali katiniki-ngarduyu-jana wangkaja nyanungu-patu-kuju, <<Purda-nyangka-julu ngajuluku. Ngajulurlu kularna-nyarra nyurrurlaju yapa-patu|_ (THIS SENTENCE SHOULD READ "I DID NOT CHEAT YOU PEOPLE OUT OF ANY MONEY." TO CHEAT SOMEONE OUT OF MONEY MEANS TO HOLD MONEY BACK FROM SOMEONE THAT YOU OWE THEM.) Nyurrurlankulu yuwayi-wangkaja warrki-jarrinja-kuju parra wiriki ngajuluku warrki- jarrinjaku jinta-mipaku pirli-kiji. (THIS SENTENCE SHOULD READ "I DID NOT CHEAT YOU PEOPLE OUT OF ANY MONEY." TO CHEAT SOMEONE OUT OF MONEY MEANS TO HOLD MONEY BACK FROM SOMEONE THAT YOU OWE THEM.) Nyurrurlankulu yuwayi-wangkaja warrki-jarrinja-kuju parra wiriki ngajuluku warrki-jarrinjaku jinta-mipaku pirli-kiji. 
Kala kangkalu-nyanu talaju, manulu yanta ngurra-kurra. Nyampurra wati-patu kujarna-jana ngajulurlu yarnkanjarla manunjunu wurajirli, ngajulurlu yingarna-jana yinyi tala kujarna-nyarra nyurrurlaku yungu, ngula-piya-yijala kapurna-jana yinyi jilpa jinta- kari jinta-kari. 
Kala kangkalu-nyanu talaju, manulu yanta ngurra-kurra. Nyampurra wati-patu kujarna-jana ngajulurlu yarnkanjarla manunjunu wurajirli, ngajulurlu yingarna-jana yinyi tala kujarna-nyarra nyurrurlaku yungu, ngula-piya-yijala kapurna-jana yinyi jilpa jinta- kari jinta-kari. 
Kapi maju kujaju mayi kajilparna-jana yungkarla tala kujarna- nyarra nyurrurlaku yungu? Ngaju-nyangu warlalja talaji, ngajulurlu kajikarna-jana yinyi ngana-pukaku yapa-kuju kajirna ngaju yinjaku- purda-jarri! Mardarnkulu nyurrurlaju miyalu rampaku nyampurra- kuju ngularna-jana wardinyirli yungu talaju, kujarna-nyarra nyurrurlaku yungu? kajirna ngaju yinjaku-purda-jarri! Mardarnkulu nyurrurlaju miyalu rampaku nyampurra-kuju ngularna-jana wardinyirli yungu talaju, kujarna-nyarra nyurrurlaku yungu?>> 
Ngula-jangkaju, wangkajalku-jana Jesus-ji, <<Ngajulurna- nyarra ngula-juku yimi-ngarrurnu yaliji jaru.> 

<<Jalangu kuja kalu nyina kamparrurla wiri yapa, ngulaju ngakaju kapulu purda-ngirlilki nyina. Jalangu kuja kalu nyina purda-ngirli yapa, ngulaju ngakaju kapulu kamparrurla wirilki-yijala nyina.>> 
Jesus-rli muurr-pungu-nyanu yarda kujarlu, <Ngakaju kapu-julu yapangku pinyiJesus-rli muurr-pungu-nyanu yarda kujarlu, <Ngakaju kapu-julu yapangku pinyi>> 

Kuja Jesus manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu- patulpalu yaninja-yanu yirdiyirla, yapa-karirlangurlpalu yapa yalirla- yijala yaninja-yanu nyanungurra-kurlu. Ngula-julu pirli-wana yanu nguru-kurra-pinangu Jerusalem-kurra. yalirlaju, Jesus-rlu-jana puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu kangu wakirti-kirra yirdiyirla yapa-kari yapa-patu-kujaku, manu-jana nyanunguju wangkaja,-jana nyanunguju wangkaja, 
<<Purda-nyangka-julu! Nyampuju karlipa Jerusalem-kurraju murnma-juku yani, ngaka karlipa yukamirra. Ngaju kuja karna Yapa- nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu nyina, yalumpurla-juku kapu-julu yapa-karirli rdarri-mardarni. Ngula-jangkaju, kapulu-jana yinyi maralypiki-ngarduyu-patuku manu kuruwarriki-ngarduyuku. Nyampu-paturluju kapu-julu maju-pajirni. 
Kapulu-jana yapa-kari-kilki ngajuju yinyi Jew-wangu-patuku yungu-julu pinyi tarnnga-kurra. Pakarninjaku-ngarntirli kapu-julu manyu-pinyi, manu kapu-julu wipi-kirlirli pinti-kirlirli wilykarra- pakarni, manu kapu-julu tarnnga-kurra pinyi watiya warnta-warntarla. Ngula-jangkaju, jirrama-jangkarla ngurra-jarra-jangkarla kapurna pina wankaru-jarrimi.>> 
_Ngatingki|_ (SHOULD THIS BE "NGATI-NYANURLU"?) James manu John-kurlangu payurnu Jesus yungu-palangu wiri-yirrakarla kamparrurla nyanungu-jarra 

Yali-jangkaju, ngati-nyanu puranjaku-ngarduyu-jarra-kurlangu, 
kamparru-juku Jesus-kiji. Nyanungu-julpa nyinaja Zebedee-kirlangu ngapuju-nyanu. 

Jesus-rli payurnu nyanunguju, <<Nyiya-kunpaji payirni ngajuju?>> 
Karnta-jirla wangkaja nyanungu-kuju, <<Kajinpa nyuntu wiri- nyinami yangkangka Nguru-nyayirni-wangurla nyuntu-nyangurla, yirraka-palangu ngaju-nyangu-jarra ngalipa-nyanu-jarra, yinga-pala nyina watinyarra nyuntu-nyangurla yitipi-jarra, jinta jungarni- purdanji jinta jampu-purdanji.>> 

Jesus-palangu wangkaja karnta-kurlanguku ngalalpi-nyanu- jarraku, <<Ngurrpangku kanpaju-pala payirni. Maju kaji kamparruju ngaju-kuju nguna Jerusalem-rla, kula-nganta karna ngajulurlu wirrpirni kartaku-ngurlu wingki.
<<Jangku-manu-pala Jesus-ji, <<Yuwayi, lani-wangu karlijarra nyina nyuntu-kuju puranja-kuju.>> 

Jesus wangkaja-palangu, <<Junga, kari-nganta kapunpaju-pala purami ngaju. Maju-yijala kapungkupala nguna. Kula-nganta kankulu wirrpirni yangka kartaku-ngurlu wingkiji. Kala Nguru- nyayirni-wangurla God-kurlangurla kulalparna-jana ngajulurlu milarninjarla yirrakarla yapaju nyinanja-kuju jampu-purdanjiki manu junga-purdanjiki. God-rlu nyanungu-miparlu kajika-jana milarni yapa nyinanja-kuju ngaju-wana-kuju.>> 

Kujalu-jana puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu-kariyi-nyanurlu purda- nyangu papardi-rlangu kuja-kurra wangkanja-kurra, ngula-jarraku- julu-jana kulu-jarrija-nyayirni purda-nyanjarla. 
Kujarlaju, Jesus-rli-jana turnu-manu jintawarlayilki-jiki puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuju, ngula-jana kuja wangkaja, <<_Yapangku kula kalu milya-pinyi God, nyanungurra- kurlangurlu wiri-wirirli kalu-jana warrarda jinyi-jinyi-mani nyiya- kanti-kantiki. Kuja kalu-jana wiri-wirirli jinyi-jinyi-mani yapaju nyiya-kanti-kantiki, ngulaju kalu-jana kapanku-juku warrki-jarrimik. 
-27 Kala nyurrurla puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu ngaju-nyangu, kula kankulu kuja-piya nyina jin-jininja-palka. Kaji ngana-puka nyurrurla nyina wiriji parrpardarla, ngula-julu-nyanu yirraka pirda-ngirli manu warrki-jarriyalu-nyanu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku pirijina-piya. 
Ngajurlangu yangka Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu, kujarna yanurnu nyampu-kurra walya-kurra, kularna yanurnu jinyi- jinyi-maninjaku panuku yapaku, walku. Ngajurna yanurnu nyampu- kurraju yungurna-jana yapaku warrki-jarri yirnkilypa-wangu manu yungurna-jana muurl-mardarni wilji-warnu panu-jarlu palinja- kujaku.>> 
Jesus-rli parlparu-manu wati-jarra milpaku-purda 

Ngaka-pardu-kaarilki, Jesus manu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku- ngarduyu-patu, yarnkajarralu Jericho-ngurlu, manu yapangku panungkulpalul-jana puranja-yanu. 
Yalirlalpa-pala nyinaja wati-jarra milpaku-purda-jarra pirnti- nyarra yirdiyirla. Yapangku nganangku-japa-palangu yimi-ngarrurnu Jesus kujalpa wapanja-yanu yali-wana-yijala. Junga-juku-palarla wapal-purlaja, <<Jesus, Ngalapi-nyanu King David-kirlangu! Mari- jarriya-jarrangku wiyarrpaku!>> 

Yangka yapa-paturlu, kujalpalu puranja-yanu Jesus, ngulangku- julu-jana kurnta-ngarrurnu, manulu-jana puta wurdungu-manu. Nyanungu-jarra-julpa-pala ngari yarda-yarda purlaja kilji-nyayirni manulpa warrarda yirdi-manu Jesus, <<Wayinpa! King David- kirlangu Ngalapi-nyanu, mari-jarriya-jarrangku!>> 

Junga-juku, Jesus july-karrija purda-nyanjarla, manu-palangu purlajarra wati-jarra-kuju, <<Nyiya-kunpajupala purlaja?>> 

Yangka-jarraju-palarla milpa-parnta-jarra pampa-jarra wangkaja, <<Yanurnurarrangku milpaku yungurlijarra nyanyilki.>> 

Jesus-palangu mari-jarrija yangka-jarra-kuju milpaku-purda- jarra-kuju, milpaji. Junga-juku, milpangkuju-pala nyangulku, manu-pala pirda- ngirli puranja-yanu nyanunguju. 

[MAT  Matthew 24  Warlpiri  1st draft  Swartz  Australia]

Jesus-jana wangkaja nyanungu-nyanguku puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku ngulaju, <maralypi yuwarli ngakaju kapu pirl-pirl-wantimi>

Kuja-jana Jesus jirrnganja wilypi-pardija nyanungu-nyanguku puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku kaninjarni-jangka yuwarli maralypi-jangka Jew-kurlangu-ngurlu, ngula-jangkaju-lurla wangkaja, <<Pinangkalpa, nyampu nyangka maralypirla yuwarli-kari yuwarli-kari marrka-nyayirni!>>
Jesus-rla wangkaja, <<Nyanyi kanpa-jana nyampurraju kuja kalu karrinja-yani yuwarli-kari yuwarli-kari manu kuja-ka karri nyampu maralypi Jew-kurlangu? Ngularraju kulalu tarnnga-karri nyampurraju.  Manu kulalu-nyanu nyampurraju yarturluju kuja-piya ngamantu-karrinja-yani; ngakaju kapulu-jana yapa-karirli muku pirl-pirl-kijirni walya-kurra.>>
Jesus-rli-jana yimi-ngarrurnu nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu <maju-nyayirni kapu yanirni kamparruju>

Ngula-jangkaju, kuja Jesus yanurra Maralypi Yuwarli-ngirli, yangka-kurra-yijalalu kulpari-yanu pirli-kirra yirdi-kirraju Mount#of#Olives-kirra.  Ngulangkaju, nyanungu-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu-lurla yanurnu nyanungu-kuju wurulyparla, manu wangkaja-lurla nyanungu-kuju, 
 <<Wangkaya-nganpa.  Nyangurlalu-jana nyampurraju yuwarli pirl-pirl-kijirni yapangkuju yungurnalu nganimparlangurlu milya-pinyi?  WHAT WILL HAPPEN BEFORE YOU RETURN HERE AND THE WORLD IS DESTROYED?>>

Ngula-jangkaju, wangkaja-jana Jesus-ji kuja, <<Warra-warra-kangkalu-nyanu yapa-kari-kijaku, kajikalu-nyarra yapa-karirli yimirr-yinyi.
Panu kapulu yani-yanirni nyurrurla-nyangu-kurraju kirri-kari-kirra manu kirri-kari-kirra, kapulu-nyarra wangkami ngaju-nyangurla-nganta yirdingka kuja, <Ngaju-jurna Messiah yangka kuja-nyarra God-rlu jangku-pungu [SHOULD MAYBE THIS WORD BE 'YIMI-NGARRURNU'--'THE MESSIAH WHICH GOD TOLD YOU ABOUT LONG AGO'?  IF SO, MAKE THE CHANGE] nyurru-wiyi yilyanjarniki-ngarntirli!>  Ngula-jangka kujarlu wangkanjarlu kapulu-jana yapa-kari panu-kari yimirr-yinyi, kula-nganta ngajulurlu-kula.
Wajampa-wangulu nyinaya kajinkili-jana purda-nyanyi linjarrpa wiri-kirra manu kajinkili yangka jaru mani yapa-kari-kirlangu kajili-nyanu ngurrara-karirlarlu linjarrparlu luwarni.  Ngula-puruju, wurrangkulu mardaka langangku, wurra-juku kula-nyarra nguruju mujuny-karri. [THIS SHOULD BE, 'DON'T BE AFRAID BECAUSE OF THAT BAD NEWS.  THESE BAD THINGS WILL HAPPEN BEFORE THE WORLD ENDS.']
Mujuny-karrinjaku-ngarntirliji kapulu-nyanu linjarrparlu-wiyi luwarni ngurrara-kari-warnurlu ngurrara-kari-warnurlu, manu nguru-kari-jangka nguru-kari-jangka kapulu-nyanu rdilykarra-yirrarni linjarrpaku wiriki luwarninjaku.  Ngula-jangkaju, kapu walya yurnku-yurnku-jarri nguru-jarrarranpa.  Manu ngula-warnuju ngurrara-kari ngurrara-kari kapurla mangarri-kiji walku-karrimi.
Nyampu-kuju linjarrpaku manu nguruku mujuny-karrinja-kuju wurra-juku kapunkulurla pirr-pardimi, yangka kuja-ka karnta murru-murru-jarri wartardi, ngula-piya-kunya kuja kanyanu yangka purda-nyanyi wartardirli murru-murru kurduku-ngarntirli.  Ngula-piya-kunya kapunkulurla pardarni.>>

<<Palju warra-warra-kangkalu-nyanu!  Kapulu-nyarra jangkardurnu yani yurrkunyu, manu kapulu-nyarra puuly-mardarninjarla jirri-kanyi kuwutu-kurra murru-murru-maninjaku manu tarnnga-kurra pinjarla-yirrarninjaku nyurrurlaku.  Kuja kankulu ngaju-nyangu puranjaku-ngarduyu nyina, ngulaju kapulu-nyarra nyuru-nyuru-mani. 
Ngula-puruju, yapangku panungku kuja kajulu jalangurlu ngaju purami, [RIGHT HERE YOU NEED TO ADD, 'THEY WILL STOP FOLLOWING MY WAY'--THEN JOIN IT UP WITH THE REST OF THE VERSE] kapulu-nyanu jarnku-jarnkurlulu nyuru-nyuru-mani, manu kapulu-nyanu jarnku-jarnkurlu yinyirra yurrkunyu-kurraju.
Yapa panungku kuja kalu-nyanu-nganta ngarrirni God-kurlangu jaruku-ngarduyu, ngulaju kapulu yanirni, manu kapulu-jana yimirr-yinyi yapa panu-kariji nyanungu-nyangu jaru-kurlurluju.
Yapa kapulu nyina wingki-nyayirni nguru-wanaju.  Ngula-piya-yijala ngaju-nyangu-patu puranjaku-ngarduyu-patu kapulu-nyanu yulkanja-wangu jurnta-nyinami.
Kala ngana-puka yapa kajiji wala-juku nyina ngajuku jika-jika-jarrinja-wanguju, God-rlu kapu muurlparlu-mardarni kujanguju yapa.
Yimi Ngurrju God-kurlangu Nguru-nyayirni-wangu-kurlu, yapangku kapulu yaninjarla yimi-ngarrirni nguru-wanaju yingalu yapa-karirlangurlu purda-nyanyi.  Ngula-jangkaju kapu nguruju lawa-jarrimilki.>>
Jesus-jana wangkaja kuja, <kapunkulu nyanyi nyiya mayi punku lani-maninja wita-wangu Maralypirla>

Jesus-jana yarda wangkaja puranjaku-ngarduyu-patuku, <<Ngakaju kapunkulu nyanyi nyampurlaju Maralypirla, kapu karri nyiya mayi maju-nyayirni lani-maninja wita-wangu, kapu karrimi kaninjarni Yuwarli Maralypirla.  Nyampu maju-nyayirni, ngulaju jaruku-ngarduyurlu Daniel-rlu yirrarnu nyurru-wiyi.>>  (Kajinkili ngaka nyanyi nyampu jaru Bible-rla, ngula-julu langa-kurra-manta!) 
<<Yangkangka ngana-puka kaji  Judea-rla nyina, ngula-warnuju kajirla lani-jarri kaji karrimi maralypirla, ngulaju pirri-parnkayarla pirli-wana-kurra.
Ngana-puka kaji nyanungu-nyangurla yuwarlirla kankarlarni, ngulaju yuwarli yukanja-wangu kutu pirri-parnkayarla jurnarrpa maninja-wangu-juku.
Yangka kaji wurnturu warrki-jarri manangkarra-wana, ngulaju kulpari-parnkanjarni-wangurlu yampiyarla wawardaju.  Kala ngari wawarda purda-nyanja-wangu pirri-parnkayarla-puka waparlku.
Yangka nyanungu-puru maju-puru, kaji yangka maju-nyayirni karrimi maralypirla, ngula-puruju kapurla karrimi maju-nyayirni karnta-kuju yangka wartardi-kiji, manu karntaku wita pirltirrkaku-palanguku kapurla karrimi maju-nyayirni, wiyarrpaku.
Kuja-kujakuju wangkaya-lurla God-ku yungu warla-pajirni nyanungu maju karrinja-kurra, kajika marda karri pirriya-puru, marda Sabbath-puru yangka Parra-nyayirni-wangu-puru.  Nyarrpalkulpankulu parnkayarla maju-puruju? 
Yangka kuja God-rlu nguru manu walya nyurru-wiyi ngurrju-manu, nyurru-wiyi-ngirli jalangu-kurra kula nganangku nyangu nyanunguju majuju.  Manu kaji yali maju yarda rdirri-yinyi, ngula-jangkaju, kula nganangku yapangku nyanyi-yijala.
Kaji yali maju yarda rdirri-yinyi, kula tarnngaku.  God-kujaku kapu witaku-juku rdirri-yinyi.  Maju-nyayirni-puruju, God-rlu kapu-jana muurl-mardarni yapa nyanungu-nyangu kuja-jana kamparrurlu milarnu.  Kala kajilpa-jana muurl-mardarninja-wangurlu yampiyarla, ngulaju kajikalu muku palimi.>>

<<Kajinkili yangka waparlku-nyina, ngula-kurraku kajili-nyarra yapa-karirli jily-ngarrirni kujarlu, <Nyangka yinya Messiah yanurnulku kuja-ka karrimi yinya Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu!> Manu kajili-nyarra yapa-karirli jily-ngarrirni kujarlu, <Nyampu-kula Messiah yanurnu nyampu-kurra!> Kuja kajili-nyarra wangka, ngulaju jawirri purda-nyangkalu-jana langa-miparlu.
Nyiya-kujaku kuja? Panu kapulu yani-yanirni jinta-kari jinta-kari kula-nganta yangka jinta God-kurlangu Messiah.  Manu panu-kari kapulu yani-yanirni jinta-kari jinta-kari kula-nganta God-kurlangu jaruku-ngarduyu.  Nyampurra-julu ngulaju warlkanju yijardu-wangu! Kapulu-nyarra yaninjarla yapa-kuju milki-yirrarni nyiya-kanti-kanti yartarnarri manu maparnpa-piya manu yajiki ngangkari-kirli-piyarlu, ngulaju kula-nganta God-kurlangu, kala walku.  Kapulu-nyarra puta-puta yimirr-yinyi yapa nyurrurlaju milarninja-warnu-patu God-kurlangu.  Kala walku, kapu-nyarra muurl-mardarni God-rluju.
Purda-nyangka-julu ngaju!  Yimi-ngarrurnurna-nyarra nyiya-kanti-kanti yangka kamparru-juku yungunkulu milya-pinyi nguru kaji mujuny-karrinja-yani.>>

<<Marda ngana-japa kapu yanirni , manu kapu-nyarra yimi-ngarrirni Messiah kuja-ka manangkarrarla mirra-nyina [what does this word mean?] [You forgot the rest of verse 26; here it is:  If someone tells you that,  don't go out looking for the Messiah in the desert!  Or maybe someone will come and tell you that the Messiah is hiding somewhere close by.   If someone tells you that, don't believe them!]
Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu kula nyina manangkarrarlaju, kula wuruly-nyina-japa, lawa.  Kuja-ka yalkirirla jarra-pardi kakarrara-ngurlu karlarra-kurra, ngula-piya-yijala yangka Yapa-nyayirni-wangu kapu kapanku yanirni.>>

<<Junga kujaju:  kuja-ka puluku nyurnu warru-nguna walyangka, purla-purlaju kalu warru-parnka yalkirirla warru-kirdi-kirdi>>
Jesus wangkaja-jana kuja, <kapurna pina-yanirni nyampu-kurra yalkiri-ngirli mangkurdurla>

Jesus-jana yarda wangkaja, <<Yangka kujarna-nyarra yimi-ngarrurnu jaru kamparru-wiyi nyiya-kanti-kanti-kirli, ngula-jangkarlanya kapu ngakaju wantaju maru-jarrimi, manu kirntangiji kapu mirirl-mirirl-karrinja-wangulku-yijala maru-jarri.   Ngula-puruju yalkiri-ngirliji kapulu yanjilypiriji pata-pata-karri.  Manu ngula-puruju yalkiriji kapurla God-ku marlaja yurnku-yurnku-jarri.
Ngula-puruju yapangku kapulu nyanyi nyiya mayi yalkirirla, manu kapu-julu milya-pinyi Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu kuja karna yanirni.
Kapurna warraja-jarrimirni mangkurdurla, kapurna kulpari-yanirni nyampu-kurra pirrjirdi-nyayirni, manu kapurna mirirl-mirirl-karrinjarni-yani.   Kaji-jili yapangku nguru-wana-ngurluju nyanyi ngaju yaninjarni-kirra, kapulu rdirri-yinyi yulanja-kulku.
Ngajuju kapurna jamaru-karrinjarni-yani kilji-nyayirni pampu-piya-kurluju, manu kapurna-jana ngaju-nyangu marra-marra-wati kurlarra-purda, yatijarra-purda, karlarra-purda, manu kakarrara-purda yapaku warru turnu-maninjaku, turnu-maninjarla kanjarniki yangka kuja-nyanu God-rlu yapa yajarni.>>
Jesus-ji-jana wangkaja jaru watiya-kurlu miyi-kirli fig-kirli

Jesus-jana yarda wangkaja, <<Pinarri-jarriyalu yangka kuja-ka watiya <fig> kirrirdi-jarrinja-yani.  Jalyirrpalku-ka purrulyun-pardinja-yani, manu jinjirlaku-ngarnti wujulypa-wiyi-ka palka-jarrinja-yani, ngula-jangkaju jinjirlalku-ka wilypi-pardi.  Ngula-jangkaju, kankulu milya-pinyi kuja-ka yangka karapurda-jarrinjarni-yani.
Ngula-piya-yijala kajinkili nyanyi walya manu yalkiri yurnku-yurnku-jarrinja-kurra, ngula-jangkaju kujarlaju kapunkulu pinalku nyina kuja karla karrinjarni yani kutulku walyaku lawa-nyinanjaku.
Langa-kurra-mantalu kuja kalu yapa nyampurla jalangu-jalangu nyina.  Ngulaju kulalu pali nyanja-wangu-wiyi ngalya-kariji nyampurra-kuju nyiya-kanti-kanti-kiji maju-maju-nyayirniki, ngulangkuju kapulu nyanyi-wiyi muku palinjaku-ngarntirliji.
Walya manu yalkiri kapu-pala yawu-pardimi.  Kala ngaju-nyangu yimi ngulaju kapu palka-juku karrimi yawu-pardinja-wangu-juku.>>
Kula-ka nganangku yapangku milya-pinyi nyangurla kaji Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu  pina-yanirni

<<Kula-ka nganangku milya-pinyi nyangurla kajirna kulpari-yanirni.  Kula kalu milya-pinyi marra-marrarlangurlu, yangka kuja kalu marra-marraju nyina kankarlarra; kula karna ngajurlangurlu milya-pinyi Ngalapi-nyanurlu; yangka nyanungu-miparlu Wapirra God-rlu-ka milya-pinyi
Kajirna Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu pina yanirni, ngulaku kamparruju yapaju kapulu nyina yangka-piya-yijala kujalpalu yapaju nyinaja nyurru-wiyi Noah-puru, kujalpa Noah-ju wankaru-wiyi nyinaja. 
Kuja ngawarrarlu jakarr-pungu nguruju, ngulaku kamparruju yapaju kalalu nyinaja ngarninjarla pamangka, manu kalalu yupukarra-jarrija, kuja kalu yapa nyina jalangu-jalangu.  Kuja-kulanya kalalu yapaju nyinaja nyurru-wiyiji, kujalpalu Noah-ju mardungkalku yukanjarla nyinaja
Kuja ngapa-julpa wantijalku manulpa kankarlu-jarrinja-yanulku, kulalu yapangkuju milya-pungu kujalpa nyarrpa-jarrija.  Kuja-jana ngawarrarluju kangurralku, miyiki-nyangulpalu-nyanu kapulu palimi.  Kuja-yijala kapu yarda rdirri-yinyi kajirna Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu pina-yanirni.
Kajirna ngaju pina-yanirni, ngula-puruju marda kalaka-pala wati jirrama warrki-jarrimi yuwurrkurla.  Ngaju-nyangu marra-marrarlu kapu jintaju kanyi, manu jinta-kariji kapulu yampimi purda-ngirli.
Karnta jirramarlu marda kajika-pala ngurlu yurrparni pulawa-karda ngalikirri-jarra-kurlurlu wita-jarra-kurlurlu.  Ngaju-nyangu marra-marrarlu kapulu jintaju kanyi, manu kapulu yampimi jinta-kariji purda-ngirli.
Purda-ngirli yampinja-warnu-kujaku, warra-warra-kangka-julu muurlparlu jarda-wangurlu ngajuku Warlaljamarriki nyurrurla-nyanguku kajirna nyangurla pina-yanirni.  Kula kankulu milya-pinyi nyangurla kajirna ngaju pina-yanirni.
Kaji watingki milya-pinyi nyangurla mungangka kapu wiji-palkaju yuwarli-kirraju yukamirni manu wijingki nyiya-kanti-kanti wijingki-mani, ngula wati nyinayarlalpa yakarra munga wiri.  Kajika nyanungurluju warla-pajirni wiji-palkaju yuwarli-kirra yukanja-kujaku.  Milya-pinyi kankulu kujaju yijardu-nyayirni.
Kuja-piyarlu-yijala, nyurrurlarlu-julu warra-warra-kangka kajirna yanirni-pina.  Kajilparna ngaju Yapa-nyayirni-wangu God-kurlangu kapanku pina-yantarlarni, ngulaju kalakarna-nyarra parlu-pinyi jarda-kurra.  Ngula-kujaku-julu warra-warra-kangka ngajuku!>>
Ngana warrkirniji ngurrju God-kuju?

Jesus-jana yarda wangkaja nyanungurra-kuju, <<Ngana warrkirni ngurrjuju God-kuju?  Kuja-ka warrkirniki-ngarduyu wurnaku-purda-jarrimi, nyanungurlu kanyanu jinta-mipa warrkirni yiringi-mani yingarla yapa-kari-patu warrkirni warra-warra-kanyi, yinga-jana yarnunjuku-kurlangu yinyi kajilpalu yarnunjuku-jarriyarla.
Kaji warrkirniki-ngarduyu pina-yanirni wurna-jangka, kaji parlu-pinyi jinta warrkirni warrki-jarrinja-kurra ngutu-ngutu, [GOOD CHOICE OF WORDS, EMILY!] yali warrkirniki-ngarduyuju kapu yijardu-nyayirni wardinyi-jarrimi.
Nyanungurluju kapu yirrarni yaliji warrkirni wiri nyiya-kanti-kantiki manu yuwarli-patuku yungurla kaji wurdujarra-mardarni.
Marda yali warrkirni watiji maju.  Marda kajika-nyanu nyanungurluju manngi-nyanyi nyanungu-nyangu wiriji kapu nyinamirra wurnturuju tarnngaju.
Manu marda nyanungurlu warrkirni watingki kapu-jana pakarninjarrangu yapa-kariji warrkirni-patu-kariji, manu marda kajika nyanunguju yanirra kuja kalu pama-jangka yapa nyina, manu kajika yalirlaju ngarni yarnunjuku manu pama nyanungurra-kurluju.
Nyanungurlu marda kajika-nyanu manngi-nyanjarla wangkami nyanunguku yangarluku, <Ngaju-nyangu wiriji, kula marda pina-yanirni jalanguju.  Ngajulurlu kapurna wurrangku-juku pamaju ngarni manu nyinami warrki-wangu.>  Lawa!  Yali wiriji kapu pina-yanirni-yijala!
Nyanungurluju kapu pinjarla yirrarni yaliji warrkirni wati ngutu-nguturlu, manu kapu yilyamirra kuja kalu ngawu-ngawu yapa nyina.  Ngulangkanya kapu yulanjarrangu manu kartirdi pajirni murru-murru-jarrinjarla.


[philemon 1st:cw 14-3-91 Steve Swartz Warlpiri ]

Philemon 
Nyampu jaru wita, ngulaju Paul-rlu yirri-puranjarla yilyajarla wati-kariki yirdiki Philemon-ki. 

Ngaju karnarla Paul-ju warrki-jarrimi Jesus#Christ-ki mata-karda-nyayirni nyampurla rdakungkaju. Ngajulurlu manu Timothy-rli karnalu-nyarra yilyamirra jaru nyampu nyurrurlaku. Nyanunguju-ka nyina Kirijini-yijala ngalipaku-purdangkaju. Ngulaju karnangkulu jaru yilyamirra nyuntuku wungu-warnuku Philemon-ki, nyuntu kuja kanpa-jarrangku jirrnganja warrki-jarrimi God-kurlu. 
Nyuntu-parntarlanguku karna nyampuju wangka Apphias-ku Kirijini-kariyirlangu-kuju, manu yangka Archippus-rlanguku. Nyanunguju kajarrangku warrarda jirrnganja warrki-jarrimi God-kurlu rdily-parnkanja-wanguju. Manu karna-jana nyampuju wangka panu-karirlanguku Kirijiniki yangka kuja kalu turnu-jarrimi yuwarlirla nyuntu-nyangurla. 
Ngajarra karnalu-nyarrarla wangka God-kuju ngalipaku-palangu-kuju manu Jesus#Christ-ki kuja kangalpa Wiri nyina ngalipaku jintawarlayi-kiji. Payirni karnalu-nyarrarla yungu-nyarra yimiri-nyina manu yungunkulurla marlaja-nyinami pululu-nyayirni ngurrju. 
Philemon kala-jana yulkaja-nyayirni Kirijini-kariyi-nyanuku, kujarlaju Paul-jurla wardinyi-jarrinjarla pulka-pungu God-kuju. 

-5 Nyuntu Philemon, jaru wita karna purda-nyanyi warrarda nyuntu-kurluju yangka kuja kanpa-jana-nganta yulkami Kirijini-kariyi-nyanuku jintawarlayiki, manu karna purda-nyanyi yangka kuja kanparla wala-nyinami Warlaljamarriki Wiriki Jesus#Christ-ki parra-kari parra-kari-nganta. Kujarlaju, warrarda karnangku manngi-nyanyi nyuntu, manu karnangkurla kuja-piya-kuju yati-wangka God-ku. 
Payirni karnangkurla God yungungku pirrjirdi-mani Jesus#Christ-ki yungunparla tarnnga-juku wala-nyinami manu yungunpa milya-pinyi nyiya-kanti-kanti ngurrju-nyayirni yangka kuja kangalpa warrarda yinyi ngalipaku Kirijini-patuku. Ngula-jangkaju, yungunpa-jana jirrnganja-nyinami Kirijini-kariyi-nyanuku jintangka-juku. Kujarlaju, nyanungu-paturlangurlu yungulu wiri-pajirni Jesus#Christ. 
Tarnnga-jukulpanpa-jana yulkaja panu-kari-kiji yapa-kuju God-kurlangu-kuju, manulpanpa-jana wardinyi-maninjarla pirrjirdi-manu. Kujarna jaru purda-nyangu nyuntu-nganta kuja kanpa-jana yulkami-nganta, ngulangku-juju miyaluju raa-pungu-nyayirni. Ngularlangu-kuju karnarlajinta God-kuju pulka-pinyi. 
Paul-jurla wangkaja Philemon-ki yungurla Philemon-ju rarralypa-nyinami marinji Onesimus-ku warrkirniki nyanungu-nyanguku. 

Philemon, nyuntu kanpaju milya-pinyi ngajuju Jesus#Christ-kirlangu Yimi-kirli-kurlu kuja karna nyina jaajiki-ngarduyuju. Kujarlaju, kapurnangku ngurrju-mantarla ngaju-kuju purda-nyanja-kuju. Kala walku, milya-pinyi karnangku nyuntuju yulkanja-panu God-kurlangu, kujarlaju ngayi karnangku wangka marinji. 
Ngaju karna nyinami Paul-ju ngulaju purlka-nyayirni, ngulaju karna-jana marlaja-nyinami pirijina rdakungka Yimi Ngurrju yirri-puranja-warnu. Ngularlanguku karnangkurla ngayi-wangka yangkaku Onesimus-ku. 
Nyanunguju, ngula-juju marlaja Kirijini-jarrija ngaju-kuju nyampurla rdakungkaju, ngulaju karnarla nyinami kirda-nyanu-piya nyanungu-kuju.
